trans-unit.source: This class provides the functionality of a key agreement (or key exchange) protocol.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了密钥协议(或密钥交换)协议的功能。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the functionality of a secret (symmetric) key generator.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了一个秘密(对称)密钥生成器的功能。

trans-unit.target: 该类提供了豁免机制的功能,其例子有

trans-unit.source: This class provides the main application entry point for printing and parsing and provides common implementations of DateTimeFormatter:
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了用于打印和解析的主要应用程序入口点，并提供了 DateTimeFormatter 的常见实现：

trans-unit.source: This class provides the method normalize which transforms Unicode text into an equivalent composed or decomposed form, allowing for easier sorting and searching of text.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 normalize 方法，该方法将Unicode文本转换为等效的组合或分解形式，从而使文本的排序和搜索更加容易。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the method normalize which transforms Unicode text into an equivalent composed or decomposed form, allowing for easier sorting and searching of text. The normalize method supports the standard normalization forms described in Unicode Standard Annex #15 — Unicode Normalization Forms.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 normalize 的方法，该方法将Unicode文本转换为等效的组合或分解形式，从而使文本的排序和搜索更加容易。该 normalize 方法支持中所述的标准归一化形式的Unicode标准第15号附件- Unicode范式。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the method normalize which transforms Unicode text into an equivalent composed or decomposed form, allowing for easier sorting and searching of text. The normalize method supports the standard normalization forms described in Unicode Standard Annex #15 — Unicode Normalization Forms.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供 normalize 方法，该方法将Unicode文本转换为等效的组合或分解形式，从而使文本的排序和搜索更加容易。该 normalize 方法支持中所述的标准归一化形式的Unicode标准第15号附件- Unicode范式。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the methods necessary for creating, starting, stopping, and destroying recordings.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了创建、启动、停止和销毁录音的必要方法。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the validation mechanism for Swing components.
trans-unit.target: 该类为Swing组件提供了验证机制。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the validation mechanism for Swing components. GUIs often need to ensure that the components are in a valid state before allowing the user to navigate the input focus. To do this, clients create a subclass of InputVerifier and, using JComponent's setInputVerifier method, attach an instance of their subclass to the JComponent which is the source of the focus transfer operation. The InputVerifier also provides the possibility to validate against the target of the focus transfer which may reject the focus. Before focus is transferred from the source Swing component to the target Swing component, the input verifier's shouldYieldFocus(source, target) method is called. Focus is transferred only if that method returns true.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了Swing组件的验证机制。 GUI通常需要在允许用户导航输入焦点之前确保组件处于有效状态。为此，客户端创建 InputVerifier 的子类，并使用 JComponent 的 setInputVerifier 方法将其子类的实例附加到 JComponent ，后者是焦点转移操作的源。所述 InputVerifier 还提供验证针对其可以拒绝焦点的焦点转移的目标的可能性。在将焦点从源Swing组件转移到目标Swing组件之前，输入验证者的 shouldYieldFocus(source, target) 方法被调用。仅当该方法返回 true 时，才转移焦点。

trans-unit.source: This class provides thread-local variables.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了线程本地变量。

trans-unit.source: This class provides thread-local variables. These variables differ from their normal counterparts in that each thread that accesses one (via its get or set method) has its own, independently initialized copy of the variable. ThreadLocal instances are typically private static fields in classes that wish to associate state with a thread (e.g., a user ID or Transaction ID).
trans-unit.target: 此类提供线程局部变量。这些变量与普通变量不同，因为每个访问一个线程（通过其 get 或 set 方法）的线程都有其自己的，独立初始化的变量副本。 ThreadLocal 实例通常是希望将状态与线程关联的类中的私有静态字段（例如，用户ID或事务ID）。

trans-unit.source: This class provides three levels of API:
trans-unit.target: 该类提供三个层次的API。

trans-unit.source: This class provides two forms of linkage methods: a simple version (makeConcat(java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles.Lookup, String, MethodType)) using only the dynamic arguments, and an advanced version (makeConcatWithConstants(java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles.Lookup, String, MethodType, String, Object...) using the advanced forms of capturing the constant arguments. The advanced strategy can produce marginally better invocation bytecode, at the expense of exploding the number of shapes of string concatenation methods present at runtime, because those shapes would include constant static arguments as well.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供两种形式的链接方法：仅使用动态参数的简单版本（ makeConcat(java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles.Lookup, String, MethodType) ）和高级版本（ makeConcatWithConstants(java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles.Lookup, String, MethodType, String, Object...) 使用捕获常量参数的高级形式高级策略可以产生略微更好的调用字节码，但代价是会增加运行时出现的字符串连接方法的形状数量，因为这些形状也将包含恒定的静态参数。

trans-unit.source: This class provides two forms of linkage methods: a standard version (metafactory(MethodHandles.Lookup, String, MethodType, MethodType, MethodHandle, MethodType)) using an optimized protocol, and an alternate version altMetafactory(MethodHandles.Lookup, String, MethodType, Object...)). The alternate version is a generalization of the standard version, providing additional control over the behavior of the generated function objects via flags and additional arguments. The alternate version adds the ability to manage the following attributes of function objects:
trans-unit.target: 此类提供两种形式的链接方法：使用优化协议的标准版本（ metafactory(MethodHandles.Lookup, String, MethodType, MethodType, MethodHandle, MethodType) ）和替代版本 altMetafactory(MethodHandles.Lookup, String, MethodType, Object...) ）。替代版本是标准版本的概括，它通过标志和附加参数对生成的函数对象的行为提供附加控制。备用版本增加了管理功能对象的以下属性的能力：

trans-unit.source: This class provides two forms of linkage methods: a standard version (metafactory(MethodHandles.Lookup, String, MethodType, MethodType, MethodHandle, MethodType)) using an optimized protocol, and an alternate version altMetafactory(MethodHandles.Lookup, String, MethodType, Object...)). The alternate version is a generalization of the standard version, providing additional control over the behavior of the generated function objects via flags and additional arguments. The alternate version adds the ability to manage the following attributes of function objects:
trans-unit.target: 此类提供两种形式的链接方法：使用优化协议的标准版本（ metafactory(MethodHandles.Lookup, String, MethodType, MethodType, MethodHandle, MethodType) ）和备用版本 altMetafactory(MethodHandles.Lookup, String, MethodType, Object...) ）。替代版本是标准版本的概括，它通过标志和附加参数对生成的函数对象的行为提供附加控制。备用版本增加了管理功能对象的以下属性的能力：

trans-unit.source: This class relies on the data fetching and setting methods of Raster, and on the color characterization methods of ColorModel.
trans-unit.target: 此类依赖于 Raster 的数据获取和设置方法以及 ColorModel 的颜色表征方法。

trans-unit.source: This class replaces the deprecated SAX1 HandlerBase class.
trans-unit.target: 此类替换不推荐使用的SAX1 HandlerBase 类。

trans-unit.source: This class replaces the now-deprecated SAX1 AttributeListImpl class; in addition to supporting the updated Attributes interface rather than the deprecated AttributeList interface, it also includes a much more efficient implementation using a single array rather than a set of Vectors.
trans-unit.target: 此类替换了现在不推荐使用的SAX1 AttributeListImpl 类；除了支持更新的Attributes接口而不是不推荐使用的 AttributeList 接口之外，它还包括使用单个数组而不是一组Vector的更有效的实现。

trans-unit.source: This class represents Universal Object Identifiers (Oids) and their associated operations.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示通用对象标识符(Oids)及其相关操作。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a "most-trusted CA", which is used as a trust anchor for validating X.509 certification paths. A most-trusted CA includes the public key of the CA, the CA's name, and any constraints upon the set of paths which may be validated using this key. These parameters can be specified in the form of a trusted X509Certificate or as individual parameters.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示“最受信任的CA”，它用作验证X.509认证路径的信任锚。最受信任的CA包括CA的公钥，CA的名称以及使用此密钥可以验证的对路径集的任何约束。可以以受信任的 X509Certificate 的形式指定这些参数，也可以将其指定为单独的参数。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a "provider" for the Java Security API, where a provider implements some or all parts of Java Security.
trans-unit.target: 这个类代表了Java Security API的 "提供者",在这个类中,一个提供者实现了Java Security的部分或全部内容。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a "provider" for the Java Security API, where a provider implements some or all parts of Java Security. Services that a provider may implement include:
trans-unit.target: 这个类代表了Java Security API的 "提供者",在这个类中,提供者实现了Java Security的部分或全部内容。提供者可以实现的服务包括:

trans-unit.source: This class represents a Network Interface address.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个网络接口地址。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a Network Interface address. In short it's an IP address, a subnet mask and a broadcast address when the address is an IPv4 one. An IP address and a network prefix length in the case of IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示一个网络接口地址。简而言之就是一个IP地址,一个子网掩码,当地址是IPv4地址时,是一个广播地址。如果是IPv6地址,则是一个IP地址和一个网络前缀长度。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a Network Interface made up of a name, and a list of IP addresses assigned to this interface.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个由名称组成的网络接口,以及分配给该接口的IP地址列表。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a Network Interface made up of a name, and a list of IP addresses assigned to this interface. It is used to identify the local interface on which a multicast group is joined. Interfaces are normally known by names such as "le0".
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个由名称和分配给该接口的IP地址列表组成的网络接口。它用来标识加入组播组的本地接口。接口的名称通常为 "le0 "等。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a Reference whose contents is a name, called the link name, that is bound to an atomic name in a context.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示一个Reference,其内容是一个名称,称为链接名,在上下文中与原子名绑定。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a Socket Address with no protocol attachment.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个没有协议附件的Socket地址。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a Socket Address with no protocol attachment. As an abstract class, it is meant to be subclassed with a specific, protocol dependent, implementation.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示一个没有协议附件的Socket地址。作为一个抽象类,它的意思是要用一个特定的、依赖于协议的子类来实现。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a builder that creates a default MBeanServer implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示一个创建器，该创建器创建默认的 MBeanServer 实现。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a builder that creates a default MBeanServer implementation. The JMX MBeanServerFactory allows applications to provide their custom MBeanServer implementation by providing a subclass of this class.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示一个创建器，该创建器创建默认的 MBeanServer 实现。JMX MBeanServerFactory 允许应用程序通过提供此类的子类来提供其自定义MBeanServer实现。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a check box that can be included in a menu.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个可以包含在菜单中的复选框。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a check box that can be included in a menu. Selecting the check box in the menu changes its state from "on" to "off" or from "off" to "on."
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个可以包含在菜单中的复选框。在菜单中选择该复选框可将其状态从 "开 "变为 "关 "或从 "关 "变为 "开"。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a composite name -- a sequence of component names spanning multiple namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个复合名称--一个跨越多个命名空间的组件名称序列。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a composite name -- a sequence of component names spanning multiple namespaces. Each component is a string name from the namespace of a naming system. If the component comes from a hierarchical namespace, that component can be further parsed into its atomic parts by using the CompoundName class.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个复合名称 ----一个跨越多个命名空间的组件名称序列。每个组件都是来自命名系统命名空间的字符串名称。如果组件来自一个层次化的命名空间,那么可以通过使用CompoundName类将该组件进一步解析成其原子部分。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a compound name -- a name from a hierarchical name space.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示一个复合名称--来自一个层次名称空间的名称。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a compound name -- a name from a hierarchical name space. Each component in a compound name is an atomic name.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个复合名称--一个来自层次名称空间的名称。复合名称中的每个组件都是一个原子名称。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a datagram packet.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个数据报包。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a default implementation for javax.security.auth.login.Configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示 javax.security.auth.login.Configuration 的默认实现。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a distinguished name as specified by RFC 2253.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示RFC 2253指定的专有名称。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a distinguished name as specified by RFC 2253. A distinguished name, or DN, is composed of an ordered list of components called relative distinguished names, or RDNs. Details of a DN's syntax are described in RFC 2253.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示RFC 2253指定的专有名称。可分辨名称或DN由称为有序可分辨名称 s或RDN 的组件的有序列表组成。DN语法的详细信息在RFC 2253中进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a distinguished name as specified by RFC 2253.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示RFC 2253指定的专有名称。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a distinguished name as specified by RFC 2253. A distinguished name, or DN, is composed of an ordered list of components called relative distinguished names, or RDNs. Details of a DN's syntax are described in RFC 2253.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示RFC 2253指定的专有名称。可分辨名称或DN由称为有序可分辨名称s或RDN的组件的有序列表组成。DN语法的详细信息在RFC 2253中进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a factory for secret keys.
trans-unit.target: 这个类代表了一个秘密密钥的工厂。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a heterogeneous collection of Permissions.
trans-unit.target: 这个类代表了一个异构的权限集合。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a heterogeneous collection of Permissions. That is, it contains different types of Permission objects, organized into PermissionCollections. For example, if any java.io.FilePermission objects are added to an instance of this class, they are all stored in a single PermissionCollection. It is the PermissionCollection returned by a call to the newPermissionCollection method in the FilePermission class. Similarly, any java.lang.RuntimePermission objects are stored in the PermissionCollection returned by a call to the newPermissionCollection method in the RuntimePermission class. Thus, this class represents a collection of PermissionCollections.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示权限的异构集合。也就是说，它包含组织为PermissionCollections的不同类型的Permission对象。例如，如果将任何 java.io.FilePermission 对象添加到此类的实例，则它们全部存储在单个PermissionCollection中。它是对FilePermission类中的 newPermissionCollection 方法的调用返回的PermissionCollection 。同样，任何 java.lang.RuntimePermission 对象都存储在PermissionCollection中，该对象是通过调用RuntimePermission类中的 newPermissionCollection 方法返回的。因此，此类表示PermissionCollections的集合。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a modification item.
trans-unit.target: 该类代表一个修改项目。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a modification item. It consists of a modification code and an attribute on which to operate.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示一个修改项。它由一个修改代码和一个操作的属性组成。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a name-to-object binding found in a context.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示在上下文中发现的名到对象的绑定。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a proxy setting, typically a type (http, socks) and a socket address.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示一个代理设置,通常是一个类型(http,socks)和一个socket地址。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a proxy setting, typically a type (http, socks) and a socket address. A Proxy is an immutable object.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示代理设置，通常是类型（http，袜子）和套接字地址。甲 Proxy 是一个不可变的对象。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a public or private key in encoded format.
trans-unit.target: 该类以编码格式表示一个公钥或私钥。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a reference to an object that is found outside of the naming/directory system.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示对命名/目录系统之外的对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a relative distinguished name, or RDN, which is a component of a distinguished name as specified by RFC 2253.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示相对专有名称或RDN，它是RFC 2253指定的专有名称的组成部分。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a relative distinguished name, or RDN, which is a component of a distinguished name as specified by RFC 2253. An example of an RDN is "OU=Sales+CN=J.Smith". In this example, the RDN consist of multiple attribute type/value pairs. The RDN is parsed as described in the class description for LdapName.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示相对专有名称或RDN，它是RFC 2253指定的专有名称的组成部分。RDN的一个示例是“ OU = Sales + CN = J.Smith”。在此示例中，RDN由多个属性类型/值对组成。如 LdapName 的类描述中所述解析RDN 。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a relative distinguished name, or RDN, which is a component of a distinguished name as specified by RFC 2253. An example of an RDN is "OU=Sales+CN=J.Smith". In this example, the RDN consist of multiple attribute type/value pairs. The RDN is parsed as described in the class description for LdapName.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示一个相对专有名称或RDN，它是RFC 2253指定的专有名称的组成部分。RDN的一个示例是“ OU = Sales + CN = J.Smith”。在此示例中，RDN由多个属性类型/值对组成。如 LdapName 的类描述中所述解析RDN 。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a relative distinguished name, or RDN, which is a component of a distinguished name as specified by RFC 2253.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示一个相对专有名称或RDN，它是RFC 2253指定的专有名称的组成部分。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a relative distinguished name, or RDN, which is a component of a distinguished name as specified by RFC 2253. An example of an RDN is "OU=Sales+CN=J.Smith". In this example, the RDN consist of multiple attribute type/value pairs. The RDN is parsed as described in the class description for LdapName.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示一个相对专有名称或RDN，它是RFC 2253指定的专有名称的组成部分。RDN的一个示例是“ OU = Sales + CN = J.Smith”。在此示例中，RDN由多个属性类型/值对组成。如 LdapName 的类描述中所述解析RDN 。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a scope for identities. It is an Identity itself, and therefore has a name and can have a scope. It can also optionally have a public key and associated certificates.
trans-unit.target: 这个类代表了一个身份的作用域。它本身就是一个身份,因此它有一个名字,也可以有一个作用域。它也可以选择拥有一个公钥和相关的证书。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a single LoginModule entry configured for the application specified in the getAppConfigurationEntry(String appName) method in the Configuration class.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示为 Configuration 类的 getAppConfigurationEntry(String appName) 方法中指定的应用程序配置的单个 LoginModule 条目。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a single LoginModule entry configured for the application specified in the getAppConfigurationEntry(String appName) method in the Configuration class. Each respective AppConfigurationEntry contains a LoginModule name, a control flag (specifying whether this LoginModule is REQUIRED, REQUISITE, SUFFICIENT, or OPTIONAL), and LoginModule-specific options. Please refer to the Configuration class for more information on the different control flags and their semantics.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示为 Configuration 类的 getAppConfigurationEntry(String appName) 方法中指定的应用程序配置的单个 LoginModule 条目。每个相应的 AppConfigurationEntry 都包含一个 LoginModule 名称，一个控制标志（指定此 LoginModule 是REQUIRED，REQUISITE，SUFFICIENT还是OPTIONAL），以及LoginModule特定的选项。请参考 Configuration 类，以获取有关不同控制标志及其语义的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a socket for sending and receiving datagram packets.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个用于发送和接收数据报数据包的套接字。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a storage facility for cryptographic keys and certificates.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示加密密钥和证书的存储设施。

trans-unit.source: This class represents access to a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示对文件或目录的访问。

trans-unit.source: This class represents access to a file or directory. A FilePermission consists of a pathname and a set of actions valid for that pathname.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示对文件或目录的访问。一个FilePermission由一个路径名和一组对该路径名有效的操作组成。

trans-unit.source: This class represents access to a network via sockets.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示通过套接字访问网络。

trans-unit.source: This class represents access to a network via sockets. A SocketPermission consists of a host specification and a set of "actions" specifying ways to connect to that host. The host is specified as
trans-unit.target: 该类表示通过套接字对网络的访问。一个SocketPermission由一个主机规格和一组 "动作 "组成,这些动作指定了连接到该主机的方式。主机被指定为

trans-unit.source: This class represents an X500PrivateCredential.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示一个 X500PrivateCredential 。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an X500PrivateCredential. It associates an X.509 certificate, corresponding private key and the KeyStore alias used to reference that exact key pair in the KeyStore. This enables looking up the private credentials for an X.500 principal in a subject.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示一个 X500PrivateCredential 。它将X.509证书，对应的私钥和用于引用KeyStore中该确切密钥对的KeyStore别名相关联。这样可以在主题中查找X.500主体的专用凭据。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an Internet Protocol (IP) address.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个互联网协议(IP)地址。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) address.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个互联网协议版本4(IPv4)地址。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) address. Defined by RFC 790: Assigned Numbers, RFC 1918: Address Allocation for Private Internets, and RFC 2365: Administratively Scoped IP Multicast
trans-unit.target: 此类表示Internet协议版本4（IPv4）地址。定义为RFC 790：分配的编号，RFC 1918：专用Internet的地址分配和RFC 2365：管理范围内的IP组播

trans-unit.source: This class represents an Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) address. Defined by RFC 790: Assigned Numbers, RFC 1918: Address Allocation for Private Internets, and RFC 2365: Administratively Scoped IP Multicast
trans-unit.target: 此类表示Internet协议版本4（IPv4）地址。定义为RFC 790：分配的编号，RFC 1918：专用Internet的地址分配和RFC 2365：管理范围内的IP组播

trans-unit.source: This class represents an Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) address.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个互联网协议版本6(IPv6)地址。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) address. Defined by RFC 2373: IP Version 6 Addressing Architecture.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示Internet协议版本6（IPv6）地址。由RFC 2373定义：IP版本6寻址体系结构。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) address. Defined by RFC 2373: IP Version 6 Addressing Architecture.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示Internet协议版本6（IPv6）地址。由RFC 2373定义：IP版本6寻址体系结构。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an X.500 Principal.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示X.500 Principal 。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an X.500 Principal. X500Principals are represented by distinguished names such as "CN=Duke, OU=JavaSoft, O=Sun Microsystems, C=US".
trans-unit.target: 此类表示X.500 Principal 。 X500Principal 由专有名称表示，例如“ CN = Duke，OU = JavaSoft，O = Sun Microsystems，C = US”。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an error that has occurred when using SASL.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示使用SASL时发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an event fired by a naming/directory service.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示命名/目录服务所触发的事件。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an event fired in response to an unsolicited notification sent by the LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示响应LDAP服务器发送的主动通知而触发的事件。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an event fired when the procedures/processes used to collect information for notifying listeners of NamingEvents threw a NamingException.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示当用于收集用于通知侦听器 NamingEvent 的信息的过程/过程引发 NamingException 时触发的事件。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an event fired when the procedures/processes used to collect information for notifying listeners of NamingEvents threw a NamingException. This can happen, for example, if the server which the listener is using aborts subsequent to the addNamingListener() call.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示当用于收集用于通知侦听器 NamingEvent 的信息的过程/过程引发 NamingException 时触发的事件。例如，如果侦听器使用的服务器在 addNamingListener() 调用之后中止，则可能会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an item in the NamingEnumeration returned as a result of the DirContext.search() methods.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示DirContext.search()方法返回的NamingEnumeration中的一个项目。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an observable object, or "data" in the model-view paradigm.
trans-unit.target: 这个类代表一个可观察的对象,或者说模型-视图范式中的 "数据"。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an observable object, or "data" in the model-view paradigm. It can be subclassed to represent an object that the application wants to have observed.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示一个可观察的对象,或模型-视图范式中的 "数据"。它可以被子类化来表示应用程序想要观察的对象。

trans-unit.source: This class represents identities: real-world objects such as people, companies or organizations whose identities can be authenticated using their public keys. Identities may also be more abstract (or concrete) constructs, such as daemon threads or smart cards.
trans-unit.target: 这一类代表身份:现实世界中的对象,如人、公司或组织,他们的身份可以使用他们的公钥进行认证。身份也可以是更抽象(或具体)的结构,如守护进程线程或智能卡。

trans-unit.source: This class represents image data which is stored in a band interleaved fashion and for which each sample of a pixel occupies one data element of the DataBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示以带状交错方式存储的图像数据,每个像素的样本占据DataBuffer的一个数据元素。

trans-unit.source: This class represents image data which is stored in a band interleaved fashion and for which each sample of a pixel occupies one data element of the DataBuffer. It subclasses ComponentSampleModel but provides a more efficient implementation for accessing band interleaved image data than is provided by ComponentSampleModel. This class should typically be used when working with images which store sample data for each band in a different bank of the DataBuffer. Accessor methods are provided so that image data can be manipulated directly. Pixel stride is the number of data array elements between two samples for the same band on the same scanline. The pixel stride for a BandedSampleModel is one. Scanline stride is the number of data array elements between a given sample and the corresponding sample in the same column of the next scanline. Band offsets denote the number of data array elements from the first data array element of the bank of the DataBuffer holding each band to the first sample of the band. The bands are numbered from 0 to N-1. Bank indices denote the correspondence between a bank of the data buffer and a band of image data. This class supports TYPE_BYTE, TYPE_USHORT, TYPE_SHORT, TYPE_INT, TYPE_FLOAT, and TYPE_DOUBLE datatypes
trans-unit.target: 此类表示图像数据，该图像数据以带交错的方式存储，并且每个像素像素样本都占据DataBuffer的一个数据元素。它是ComponentSampleModel的子类，但与ComponentSampleModel所提供的相比，它提供了一种用于访问带交错图像数据的更有效的实现。在处理将每个波段的样本数据存储在DataBuffer的不同库中的图像时，通常应使用此类。提供了访问器方法，以便可以直接处理图像数据。像素跨度是同一条扫描线上同一频段的两个样本之间的数据阵列元素的数量。 BandedSampleModel的像素跨度为1。扫描线跨度是给定样本与下一条扫描线的同一列中的对应样本之间的数据阵列元素的数量。带偏移表示从保存每个带的DataBuffer的存储体的第一个数据阵列元素到该带的第一个样本的数据阵列元素的数量。频段从0到N-1编号。存储体索引表示数据缓冲器的存储体与图像数据带之间的对应关系。此类支持 TYPE_BYTE ， TYPE_USHORT ， TYPE_SHORT ， TYPE_INT ， TYPE_FLOAT 和 TYPE_DOUBLE 数据类型

trans-unit.source: This class represents image data which is stored in a pixel interleaved fashion and for which each sample of a pixel occupies one data element of the DataBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示以像素交错方式存储的图像数据,每个像素的样本占据DataBuffer的一个数据元素。

trans-unit.source: This class represents image data which is stored in a pixel interleaved fashion and for which each sample of a pixel occupies one data element of the DataBuffer. It subclasses ComponentSampleModel but provides a more efficient implementation for accessing pixel interleaved image data than is provided by ComponentSampleModel. This class stores sample data for all bands in a single bank of the DataBuffer. Accessor methods are provided so that image data can be manipulated directly. Pixel stride is the number of data array elements between two samples for the same band on the same scanline. Scanline stride is the number of data array elements between a given sample and the corresponding sample in the same column of the next scanline. Band offsets denote the number of data array elements from the first data array element of the bank of the DataBuffer holding each band to the first sample of the band. The bands are numbered from 0 to N-1. Bank indices denote the correspondence between a bank of the data buffer and a band of image data. This class supports TYPE_BYTE, TYPE_USHORT, TYPE_SHORT, TYPE_INT, TYPE_FLOAT and TYPE_DOUBLE datatypes.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示图像数据，该图像数据以像素交错方式存储，并且像素的每个样本都占据DataBuffer的一个数据元素。它是ComponentSampleModel的子类，但提供了比ComponentSampleModel提供的更有效的访问像素交错图像数据的实现。此类将所有频带的样本数据存储在DataBuffer的单个存储库中。提供了访问器方法，以便可以直接处理图像数据。像素跨度是同一条扫描线上同一频段的两个样本之间的数据阵列元素的数量。扫描线跨度是给定样本与下一条扫描线的同一列中的对应样本之间的数据阵列元素的数量。带偏移表示从保存每个带的DataBuffer的存储体的第一个数据阵列元素到该带的第一个样本的数据阵列元素的数量。频段从0到N-1编号。存储体索引表示数据缓冲器的存储体与图像数据带之间的对应关系。此类支持 TYPE_BYTE ， TYPE_USHORT ， TYPE_SHORT ， TYPE_INT ， TYPE_FLOAT 和 TYPE_DOUBLE 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: This class represents image data which is stored such that each sample of a pixel occupies one data element of the DataBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示存储的图像数据,每个像素的样本占据DataBuffer的一个数据元素。

trans-unit.source: This class represents image data which is stored such that each sample of a pixel occupies one data element of the DataBuffer. It stores the N samples which make up a pixel in N separate data array elements. Different bands may be in different banks of the DataBuffer. Accessor methods are provided so that image data can be manipulated directly. This class can support different kinds of interleaving, e.g. band interleaving, scanline interleaving, and pixel interleaving. Pixel stride is the number of data array elements between two samples for the same band on the same scanline. Scanline stride is the number of data array elements between a given sample and the corresponding sample in the same column of the next scanline. Band offsets denote the number of data array elements from the first data array element of the bank of the DataBuffer holding each band to the first sample of the band. The bands are numbered from 0 to N-1. This class can represent image data for which each sample is an unsigned integral number which can be stored in 8, 16, or 32 bits (using DataBuffer.TYPE_BYTE, DataBuffer.TYPE_USHORT, or DataBuffer.TYPE_INT, respectively), data for which each sample is a signed integral number which can be stored in 16 bits (using DataBuffer.TYPE_SHORT), or data for which each sample is a signed float or double quantity (using DataBuffer.TYPE_FLOAT or DataBuffer.TYPE_DOUBLE, respectively). All samples of a given ComponentSampleModel are stored with the same precision. All strides and offsets must be non-negative. This class supports TYPE_BYTE, TYPE_USHORT, TYPE_SHORT, TYPE_INT, TYPE_FLOAT, TYPE_DOUBLE,
trans-unit.target: 此类表示图像数据，其存储方式是：像素的每个样本都占据DataBuffer的一个数据元素。它将构成像素的N个样本存储在N个单独的数据数组元素中。不同的频段可能位于DataBuffer的不同存储区中。提供了访问器方法，以便可以直接处理图像数据。此类可以支持不同类型的交织，例如，频带交织，扫描线交织和像素交织。像素跨度是同一条扫描线上同一频段的两个样本之间的数据阵列元素的数量。扫描线跨度是给定样本与下一条扫描线的同一列中的对应样本之间的数据阵列元素的数量。带偏移表示从保存每个带的DataBuffer的存储体的第一个数据阵列元素到该带的第一个样本的数据阵列元素的数量。频段从0到N-1编号。此类可以表示图像数据，其中每个样本都是一个无符号整数，可以以8、16或32位（使用 DataBuffer.TYPE_BYTE ， DataBuffer.TYPE_USHORT 或 DataBuffer.TYPE_INT ），每个样本为带符号整数的数据（可以使用16个位存储（使用 DataBuffer.TYPE_SHORT ）），或者每个样本为带符号float的数据或两倍数量（分别使用 DataBuffer.TYPE_FLOAT 或 DataBuffer.TYPE_DOUBLE ）。给定ComponentSampleModel的所有样本都以相同的精度存储。所有步幅和偏移量必须为非负数。此类支持 TYPE_BYTE ， TYPE_USHORT ， TYPE_SHORT ， TYPE_INT ， TYPE_FLOAT ， TYPE_DOUBLE ，

trans-unit.source: This class represents pixel data packed such that the N samples which make up a single pixel are stored in a single data array element, and each data data array element holds samples for only one pixel.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示像素数据打包,使组成一个像素的N个样本存储在一个数据数组元素中,每个数据数组元素只保存一个像素的样本。

trans-unit.source: This class represents pixel data packed such that the N samples which make up a single pixel are stored in a single data array element, and each data data array element holds samples for only one pixel. This class supports TYPE_BYTE, TYPE_USHORT, TYPE_INT data types. All data array elements reside in the first bank of a DataBuffer. Accessor methods are provided so that the image data can be manipulated directly. Scanline stride is the number of data array elements between a given sample and the corresponding sample in the same column of the next scanline. Bit masks are the masks required to extract the samples representing the bands of the pixel. Bit offsets are the offsets in bits into the data array element of the samples representing the bands of the pixel.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示打包的像素数据，使得构成单个像素的N个样本存储在单个数据阵列元素中，每个数据数据阵列元素仅保留一个像素的样本。此类支持 TYPE_BYTE ， TYPE_USHORT ， TYPE_INT 数据类型。所有数据数组元素都位于DataBuffer的第一存储区中。提供了访问器方法，以便可以直接处理图像数据。扫描线跨度是给定样本与下一条扫描线的同一列中的对应样本之间的数据阵列元素的数量。位掩码是提取表示像素带的样本所需的掩码。位偏移是表示样本的频带的样本数据数组元素中的位偏移。

trans-unit.target: 此类表示根据ASN.1类型 PrivateKeyInfo 进行编码的私钥的ASN.1编码。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the ASN.1 encoding of a public key, encoded according to the ASN.1 type SubjectPublicKeyInfo.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示根据ASN.1类型 SubjectPublicKeyInfo 进行编码的公用密钥的ASN.1编码。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the ASN.1 encoding of a public key, encoded according to the ASN.1 type SubjectPublicKeyInfo. The SubjectPublicKeyInfo syntax is defined in the X.509 standard as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此类表示根据ASN.1类型 SubjectPublicKeyInfo 进行编码的公用密钥的ASN.1编码。所述 SubjectPublicKeyInfo 进行语法在X.509标准定义如下：

trans-unit.source: This class represents the address of a communications end-point.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示通信端点的地址。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the address of a communications end-point. It consists of a type that describes the communication mechanism and an address contents determined by an RefAddr subclass.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示通信端点的地址,它由描述通信机制的类型和由RefAddr子类确定的地址内容组成。它由描述通信机制的类型和由RefAddr子类确定的地址内容组成。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the binary form of the address of a communications end-point.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示通信端点地址的二进制形式。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the contents of the MLET tag.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示 MLET 标记的内容。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the contents of the MLET tag. It can be consulted by a subclass of MLet that overrides the MLet.check method.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示 MLET 标记的内容。可以通过覆盖 MLet.check 方法的 MLet 子类进行查询。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the contents of the MLET tag. It can be consulted by a subclass of MLet that overrides the MLet.check method.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示 MLET 标记的内容。可以通过覆盖 MLet.check 方法的 MLet 子类进行查询。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the meta data for ModelMBeans.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示ModelMBeans的元数据。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the meta data for ModelMBeans. Descriptors have been added on the meta data objects.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示ModelMBeans的元数据。元数据对象上已经添加了描述符。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the metadata set for a ModelMBean element.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示一个ModelMBean元素的元数据集。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the metadata set for a ModelMBean element. A descriptor is part of the ModelMBeanInfo, ModelMBeanNotificationInfo, ModelMBeanAttributeInfo, ModelMBeanConstructorInfo, and ModelMBeanParameterInfo.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示一个ModelMBean元素的元数据集。描述符是 ModelMBeanInfo、ModelMBeanNotificationInfo、ModelMBeanAttributeInfo、ModelMBeanConstructorInfo 和 ModelMBeanParameterInfo 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the object name and class name pair of a binding found in a context.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示在上下文中发现的绑定的对象名和类名对。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the result of resolution of a name.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示一个名字的解析结果。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the result of resolution of a name. It contains the object to which name was resolved, and the portion of the name that has not been resolved.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示名称的解析结果。它包含名称被解析的对象,以及名称中未被解析的部分。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the set of symbols (such as the decimal separator, the grouping separator, and so on) needed by DecimalFormat to format numbers.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示 DecimalFormat 格式化数字所需的符号集（例如，十进制分隔符，分组分隔符等）。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the set of symbols (such as the decimal separator, the grouping separator, and so on) needed by DecimalFormat to format numbers. DecimalFormat creates for itself an instance of DecimalFormatSymbols from its locale data. If you need to change any of these symbols, you can get the DecimalFormatSymbols object from your DecimalFormat and modify it.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示 DecimalFormat 格式化数字所需的符号集（例如，十进制分隔符，分组分隔符等）。 DecimalFormat 的创建本身的实例 DecimalFormatSymbols 从它的语言环境数据。如果需要更改这些符号中的任何一个，则可以从 DecimalFormat 中获取 DecimalFormatSymbols 对象并对其进行修改。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the state of a horizontal or vertical scrollbar of a ScrollPane.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示 ScrollPane 的水平或垂直滚动​​条的状态。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the state of a horizontal or vertical scrollbar of a ScrollPane. Objects of this class are returned by ScrollPane methods.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示 ScrollPane 的水平或垂直滚动​​条的状态。此类的对象由 ScrollPane 方法返回。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the string form of the address of a communications end-point.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示通信端点地址的字符串形式。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the string form of the address of a communications end-point. It consists of a type that describes the communication mechanism and a string contents specific to that communication mechanism. The format and interpretation of the address type and the contents of the address are based on the agreement of three parties: the client that uses the address, the object/server that can be reached using the address, and the administrator or program that creates the address.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示通信端点地址的字符串形式,由描述通信机制的类型和该通信机制特有的字符串内容组成。它由描述通信机制的类型和该通信机制特有的字符串内容组成。地址类型和地址内容的格式和解释基于三方的约定:使用该地址的客户端、使用该地址可以到达的对象/服务器、创建该地址的管理员或程序。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the successful result of the PKIX certification path builder algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示PKIX认证路径构建算法的成功结果。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the successful result of the PKIX certification path builder algorithm. All certification paths that are built and returned using this algorithm are also validated according to the PKIX certification path validation algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示PKIX认证路径构建算法的成功结果。所有使用该算法建立并返回的认证路径也都按照PKIX认证路径验证算法进行验证。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the successful result of the PKIX certification path validation algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示PKIX认证路径验证算法的成功结果。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the triplet (prime, exponent, and coefficient) inside RSA's OtherPrimeInfo structure, as defined in the PKCS#1 v2.2 standard.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示PKCS＃1 v2.2标准中定义的RSA OtherPrimeInfo结构中的三元组（素数，指数和系数）。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the triplet (prime, exponent, and coefficient) inside RSA's OtherPrimeInfo structure, as defined in the PKCS#1 v2.2 standard. The ASN.1 syntax of RSA's OtherPrimeInfo is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此类表示PKCS＃1 v2.2标准中定义的RSA OtherPrimeInfo结构中的三元组（素数，指数和系数）。RSA的OtherPrimeInfo的ASN.1语法如下：

trans-unit.source: This class represents the triplet (prime, exponent, and coefficient) inside RSA's OtherPrimeInfo structure, as defined in the PKCS#1 v2.1.
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示RSA的OtherPrimeInfo结构中的三联体(质数、指数和系数),如PKCS#1 v2.1中所定义。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the triplet (prime, exponent, and coefficient) inside RSA's OtherPrimeInfo structure, as defined in the PKCS#1 v2.1. The ASN.1 syntax of RSA's OtherPrimeInfo is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 这个类表示RSA的OtherPrimeInfo结构中的三联体(质数、指数和系数),在PKCS#1 v2.1中定义。RSA的OtherPrimeInfo的ASN.1语法如下。

trans-unit.source: This class represents whether or not a LoginModule is REQUIRED, REQUISITE, SUFFICIENT or OPTIONAL.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示 LoginModule 是必需的，必需的，足够的还是可选的。

trans-unit.source: This class resolves a few ambiguities found in RFC 2253 as follows:
trans-unit.target: 这个类解决了RFC 2253中发现的一些歧义,具体如下。

trans-unit.source: This class returns the DSAKeyValue and RSAKeyValue elements as objects of type DSAPublicKey and RSAPublicKey, respectively. Note that not all of the fields in the schema are accessible as parameters of these types.
trans-unit.target: 此类返回的 DSAKeyValue 和 RSAKeyValue 元素类型的对象 DSAPublicKey 和 RSAPublicKey 分别。请注意，并非架构中的所有字段都可以作为这些类型的参数进行访问。

trans-unit.source: This class serves as a factory for other important GSS-API classes and also provides information about the mechanisms that are supported.
trans-unit.target: 这个类作为其他重要的GSS-API类的工厂,也提供了有关支持的机制的信息。

trans-unit.source: This class serves as a factory for other important GSS-API classes and also provides information about the mechanisms that are supported. It can create instances of classes implementing the following three GSS-API interfaces: GSSName, GSSCredential, and GSSContext. It also has methods to query for the list of available mechanisms and the nametypes that each mechanism supports.
trans-unit.target: 此类用作其他重要GSS-API类的工厂，并且还提供有关支持的机制的信息。它可以创建实现以下三个GSS-API接口的类的实例： GSSName ， GSSCredential 和 GSSContext 。它还具有查询可用机制列表和每种机制支持的名称类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class serves as a parameter block to the Instrumentation.redefineClasses method.
trans-unit.target: 此类用作 Instrumentation.redefineClasses 方法的参数块。

trans-unit.source: This class serves as a parameter block to the Instrumentation.redefineClasses method. Serves to bind the Class that needs redefining together with the new class file bytes.
trans-unit.target: 此类用作 Instrumentation.redefineClasses 方法的参数块。用于将需要重新定义的 Class 与新的类文件字节绑定在一起。

trans-unit.source: This class should be treated as a "protected" inner class.
trans-unit.target: 这个类应该被当作一个 "受保护 "的内类。

trans-unit.source: This class should be treated as a "protected" inner class. Instantiate it only within subclasses of BasicColorChooserUI.
trans-unit.target: 此类应被视为“受保护”内部类。仅在 BasicColorChooserUI 的子类中实例化它。

trans-unit.source: This class should be treated as a "protected" inner class. Instantiate it only within subclasses of BasicListUI.
trans-unit.target: 此类应被视为“受保护”内部类。仅在 BasicListUI 的子类中实例化它。

trans-unit.source: This class should be treated as a "protected" inner class. Instantiate it only within subclasses of BasicOptionPaneUI.

trans-unit.source: This class supports an optional fairness policy for ordering waiting producer and consumer threads. By default, this ordering is not guaranteed. However, a queue constructed with fairness set to true grants threads access in FIFO order.
trans-unit.target: 此类支持可选的公平性策略，用于订购等待的生产者和使用者线程。默认情况下，不保证此排序。但是，将公平性设置为 true 构造的队列将按FIFO顺序授予线程访问权限。

trans-unit.source: This class supports an optional fairness policy for ordering waiting producer and consumer threads. By default, this ordering is not guaranteed. However, a queue constructed with fairness set to true grants threads access in FIFO order. Fairness generally decreases throughput but reduces variability and avoids starvation.
trans-unit.target: 此类支持可选的公平性策略，用于订购等待的生产者和使用者线程。默认情况下，不保证此排序。但是，将公平性设置为 true 构造的队列将按FIFO顺序授予线程访问权限。公平通常会降低吞吐量，但会减少可变性并避免饥饿。

trans-unit.source: This class supports both the short and extended forms of length encoding for Ne and Nc. However, note that not all terminals and Smart Cards are capable of accepting APDUs that use the extended form.
trans-unit.target: 该类支持Ne和Nc的短和扩展形式的长度编码。但是,请注意,并非所有的终端和智能卡都能接受使用扩展形式的APDU。

trans-unit.source: This class supports either or both a default exclusive mode and a shared mode. When acquired in exclusive mode, attempted acquires by other threads cannot succeed. Shared mode acquires by multiple threads may (but need not) succeed. This class does not "understand" these differences except in the mechanical sense that when a shared mode acquire succeeds, the next waiting thread (if one exists) must also determine whether it can acquire as well. Threads waiting in the different modes share the same FIFO queue. Usually, implementation subclasses support only one of these modes, but both can come into play for example in a ReadWriteLock. Subclasses that support only exclusive or only shared modes need not define the methods supporting the unused mode.
trans-unit.target: 此类支持默认排他模式和共享模式之一或两者。当以独占方式进行获取时，其他线程尝试进行的获取将无法成功。由多个线程获取的共享模式可能（但不一定）成功。该类不“理解”这些差异，只是从机械意义上说，当共享模式获取成功时，下一个等待线程（如果存在）还必须确定它是否也可以获取。在不同模式下等待的线程共享相同的FIFO队列。通常，实现子类仅支持这些模式之一，但例如可以在 ReadWriteLock 中发挥作用。仅支持互斥模式或仅共享模式的子类无需定义支持未使用模式的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class supports methods to determine whether locks are held or contended. These methods are designed for monitoring system state, not for synchronization control.
trans-unit.target: 这个类支持确定锁是否被持有或争夺的方法。这些方法是为了监控系统状态而设计的,而不是为了同步控制。

trans-unit.source: This class supports two different programming interfaces to represent Unicode ranges for script-specific digits: bit mask-based ones, such as NumericShaper.ARABIC, and enum-based ones, such as NumericShaper.Range.ARABIC. Multiple ranges can be specified by ORing bit mask-based constants, such as:
trans-unit.target: 此类支持两种不同的编程接口来表示脚本特定数字的Unicode范围：基于位掩码的数字接口（例如 NumericShaper.ARABIC ）和基于枚举的数字接口（例如 NumericShaper.Range.ARABIC )。可以通过对基于位掩码的常量进行“或”运算来指定多个范围，例如：

trans-unit.source: This class tracks the validity of the key and implements cancellation.
trans-unit.target: 该类跟踪密钥的有效性并实现取消。

trans-unit.source: This class trivially implements the handleNotification methods to return CONTINUE so that all notifications are consumed and the channel continues to try and receive a message.
trans-unit.target: 此类简单地实现了 handleNotification 方法以返回 CONTINUE ,以便使用所有通知，并且通道继续尝试接收消息。

trans-unit.source: This class uses 32-bit integers to store its location and dimensions. Frequently operations may produce a result that exceeds the range of a 32-bit integer. The methods will calculate their results in a way that avoids any 32-bit overflow for intermediate results and then choose the best representation to store the final results back into the 32-bit fields which hold the location and dimensions. The location of the result will be stored into the x and y fields by clipping the true result to the nearest 32-bit value. The values stored into the width and height dimension fields will be chosen as the 32-bit values that encompass the largest part of the true result as possible. Generally this means that the dimension will be clipped independently to the range of 32-bit integers except that if the location had to be moved to store it into its pair of 32-bit fields then the dimensions will be adjusted relative to the "best representation" of the location. If the true result had a negative dimension and was therefore non-existent along one or both axes, the stored dimensions will be negative numbers in those axes. If the true result had a location that could be represented within the range of 32-bit integers, but zero dimension along one or both axes, then the stored dimensions will be zero in those axes.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用32位整数存储其位置和尺寸。通常，操作可能会产生超出32位整数范围的结果。这些方法将以避免中间结果出现任何32位溢出的方式计算其结果，然后选择最佳表示形式以将最终结果存储回保存位置和尺寸的32位字段中。通过将真实结果裁剪为最接近的32位值，结果的位置将存储在 x 和 y 字段中。将值存储到 width 和 height 选择维度字段作为32位值，该值应尽可能包含真实结果的最大部分。通常，这意味着尺寸将被独立地裁剪为32位整数的范围，除了如果必须移动位置以将其存储到其32位字段对中，则尺寸将相对于“最佳表示形式”进行调整”的位置。如果真实结果的尺寸为负数，因此在一个或两个轴上都不存在，则存储的尺寸将在这些轴上为负数。如果真实结果的位置可以在32位整数范围内表示，但沿一个或两个轴的尺寸为零，则存储的尺寸将在这些轴上为零。

trans-unit.source: This class uses HostnameVerifier and SSLSocketFactory. There are default implementations defined for both classes. However, the implementations can be replaced on a per-class (static) or per-instance basis. All new HttpsURLConnections instances will be assigned the "default" static values at instance creation, but they can be overridden by calling the appropriate per-instance set method(s) before connecting.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用 HostnameVerifier 和 SSLSocketFactory 。这两个类都有默认的实现。但是，可以在每个类（静态）或每个实例的基础上替换这些实现。创建实例时，将为所有新的 HttpsURLConnection 实例分配“默认”静态值，但可以通过在 connect 之前调用适当的基于实例的set方法来覆盖它们。

trans-unit.source: This class uses HostnameVerifier and SSLSocketFactory. There are default implementations defined for both classes. However, the implementations can be replaced on a per-class (static) or per-instance basis. All new HttpsURLConnections instances will be assigned the "default" static values at instance creation, but they can be overriden by calling the appropriate per-instance set method(s) before connecting.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用 HostnameVerifier 和 SSLSocketFactory 。这两个类都有默认的实现。但是，可以按每个类（静态）或每个实例替换这些实现。创建实例时，将为所有新的 HttpsURLConnection 实例分配“默认”静态值，但可以通过在 connect 之前调用适当的基于实例的set方法来覆盖它们。

trans-unit.source: This class uses a provider-based architecture. To create a CertPathBuilder, call one of the static getInstance methods, passing in the algorithm name of the CertPathBuilder desired and optionally the name of the provider desired.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用基于提供程序的体系结构。要创建 CertPathBuilder ，请调用静态 getInstance 方法之一，传入所需的 CertPathBuilder 的算法名称以及可选的所需提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: This class uses a provider-based architecture. To create a CertPathValidator, call one of the static getInstance methods, passing in the algorithm name of the CertPathValidator desired and optionally the name of the provider desired.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用基于提供程序的体系结构。要创建 CertPathValidator ，请调用静态 getInstance 方法之一，传入所需 CertPathValidator 的算法名称以及可选的所需提供者的名称。

trans-unit.source: This class uses a provider-based architecture. To create a CertStore, call one of the static getInstance methods, passing in the type of CertStore desired, any applicable initialization parameters and optionally the name of the provider desired.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用基于提供程序的体系结构。要创建 CertStore ，请调用静态 getInstance 方法之一，传入所需的 CertStore 的类型，任何适用的初始化参数以及所需的提供者的名称。

trans-unit.source: This class uses an affine transform to perform a linear mapping from 2D coordinates in the source image or Raster to 2D coordinates in the destination image or Raster.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用仿射变换来执行从源图像或 Raster 中的2D坐标到目标图像或 Raster 中的2D坐标的线性映射。

trans-unit.source: This class uses an affine transform to perform a linear mapping from 2D coordinates in the source image or Raster to 2D coordinates in the destination image or Raster. The type of interpolation that is used is specified through a constructor, either by a RenderingHints object or by one of the integer interpolation types defined in this class.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用仿射变换来执行从源图像或 Raster 中的2D坐标到目标图像或 Raster 中的2D坐标的线性映射。使用的插值类型通过 RenderingHints 对象或此类中定义的整数插值类型之一通过构造函数指定。

trans-unit.source: This class was introduced as a part of an early proposal during the JSR-206 standardization process. The proposal was eventually abandoned but this class accidentally remained in the source tree, and made its way into the final version.
trans-unit.target: 该类是在JSR-206标准化过程中作为早期提案的一部分引入的。该提案最终被放弃,但该类意外地保留在源树中,并进入了最终版本。

trans-unit.source: This class works with the deprecated Parser interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类与不建议使用的 Parser 接口一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class works with the deprecated DocumentHandler interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类与不推荐使用的 DocumentHandler 接口一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class works with the deprecated DocumentHandler interface. It has been replaced by the SAX2 DefaultHandler class.
trans-unit.target: 此类与不推荐使用的 DocumentHandler 接口一起使用。它已被SAX2 DefaultHandler 类替代。

trans-unit.source: This class wraps a SAX1 Parser and makes it act as a SAX2 XMLReader, with feature, property, and Namespace support. Note that it is not possible to report skippedEntity events, since SAX1 does not make that information available.
trans-unit.target: 此类包装SAX1 Parser 并使其充当SAX2 XMLReader ，并具有功能，属性和命名空间支持。请注意，由于SAX1不会提供该信息，因此不可能报告 skippedEntity 事件。

trans-unit.source: This class wraps a SAX2 XMLReader and makes it act as a SAX1 Parser. The XMLReader must support a true value for the http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace-prefixes property or parsing will fail with a SAXException; if the XMLReader supports a false value for the http://xml.org/sax/features/namespaces property, that will also be used to improve efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 此类包装SAX2 XMLReader ,并使其充当SAX1 Parser 。XMLReader必须为http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace-prefixes属性支持一个真值，否则解析将因 SAXException 而失败；如果XMLReader支持http://xml.org/sax/features/namespaces属性的错误值，则该值也将用于提高效率。

trans-unit.source: This class, State, is intended to be used for such situations. Simply implement the abstract #isInState method. It returns true if the given JComponent is "in this state", false otherwise. This method will be called many times in performance sensitive loops. It must execute very quickly.
trans-unit.target: 此类（状态）旨在用于这种情况。只需实现抽象的#isInState方法。如果给定的JComponent为“处于此状态”，则返回true，否则返回false。这种方法将被调用很多的时候性能敏感的循环。它必须非常迅速地执行。

trans-unit.source: This clock is based on the best available system clock. This may use System.currentTimeMillis(), or a higher resolution clock if one is available.
trans-unit.target: 该时钟基于最佳可用系统时钟。它可以使用 System.currentTimeMillis() ，或者使用更高分辨率的时钟（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: This clock is based on the best available system clock. This may use System.currentTimeMillis(), or a higher resolution clock if one is available.
trans-unit.target: 该时钟基于最佳可用系统时钟。它可以使用 System.currentTimeMillis() ，或者使用更高分辨率的时钟（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: This clock simply returns the specified instant. As such, it is not a clock in the conventional sense. The main use case for this is in testing, where the fixed clock ensures tests are not dependent on the current clock.
trans-unit.target: 这个时钟只是返回指定的瞬间。因此,它不是传统意义上的时钟。它的主要用例是在测试中,固定时钟确保测试不依赖于当前时钟。

trans-unit.source: This clock will always have the nano-of-second and second-of-minute fields set to zero. This ensures that the visible time ticks in whole minutes. The underlying clock is the best available system clock, equivalent to using system(ZoneId).
trans-unit.target: 此时钟将始终将纳秒和秒分钟字段设置为零。这样可以确保可见时间在整分钟内滴答作响。基础时钟是最佳的可用系统时钟，等效于使用 system(ZoneId) 。

trans-unit.source: This clock will always have the nano-of-second and second-of-minute fields set to zero. This ensures that the visible time ticks in whole minutes. The underlying clock is the best available system clock, equivalent to using system(ZoneId).
trans-unit.target: 此时钟将始终将纳秒和秒的字段设置为零。这样可以确保可见时间在整分钟内滴答作响。基础时钟是最佳的可用系统时钟，等效于使用 system(ZoneId) 。

trans-unit.source: This clock will always have the nano-of-second field set to zero. This ensures that the visible time ticks in whole seconds. The underlying clock is the best available system clock, equivalent to using system(ZoneId).
trans-unit.target: 此时钟将始终将纳秒字段设置为零。这样可以确保可见时间以整秒为单位滴答。基础时钟是最佳的可用系统时钟，等效于使用 system(ZoneId) 。

trans-unit.source: This clock will always have the nano-of-second field set to zero. This ensures that the visible time ticks in whole seconds. The underlying clock is the best available system clock, equivalent to using system(ZoneId).
trans-unit.target: 此时钟将始终将纳秒字段设置为零。这样可以确保可见时间以整秒计。基础时钟是最佳可用系统时钟，等效于使用 system(ZoneId) 。

trans-unit.source: This clock will always have the nano-of-second field truncated to milliseconds. This ensures that the visible time ticks in whole milliseconds. The underlying clock is the best available system clock, equivalent to using system(ZoneId).
trans-unit.target: 此时钟将始终将毫微秒的字段截断为毫秒。这样可以确保可见时间以毫秒为单位。基础时钟是最佳的可用系统时钟，等效于使用 system(ZoneId) 。

trans-unit.source: This clock will only tick as per the specified duration. Thus, if the duration is half a second, the clock will return instants truncated to the half second.
trans-unit.target: 这个时钟只会按照指定的持续时间滴答作响,因此,如果持续时间是半秒,时钟将返回截断到半秒的实例。因此,如果持续时间是半秒,时钟将返回截断到半秒的实例。

trans-unit.source: This clock wraps another clock, returning instants that are later by the specified duration. If the duration is negative, the instants will be earlier than the current date and time. The main use case for this is to simulate running in the future or in the past.
trans-unit.target: 这个时钟包装另一个时钟,返回指定持续时间后的实例。如果持续时间为负值,则这些实例将比当前日期和时间早。主要用途是模拟在未来或过去运行。

trans-unit.source: This clock, rather than systemDefaultZone(), should be used when you need the current instant without the date or time.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要不带日期或时间的当前时刻时，应使用此时钟，而不是 systemDefaultZone() 。

trans-unit.source: This clock, rather than systemDefaultZone(), should be used when you need the current instant without the date or time.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要不带日期或时间的当前时刻时，应使用此时钟，而不是 systemDefaultZone() 。

trans-unit.source: This code does not represent a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 该代码不代表特定类型。

trans-unit.source: This code does not represent a specific type. An evaluation of an XPath expression will never produce this type. If this type is requested, then the evaluation returns whatever type naturally results from evaluation of the expression.
trans-unit.target: 这段代码并不代表一个特定的类型。对 XPath 表达式的计算绝不会产生这种类型。如果要求这个类型,那么评估将返回从表达式的评估中自然产生的任何类型。

trans-unit.source: This code unnecessarily uses side-effects. If executed in parallel, the non-thread-safety of ArrayList would cause incorrect results, and adding needed synchronization would cause contention, undermining the benefit of parallelism. Furthermore, using side-effects here is completely unnecessary; the forEach() can simply be replaced with a reduction operation that is safer, more efficient, and more amenable to parallelization:
trans-unit.target: 此代码不必要地使用了副作用。如果并行执行，则 ArrayList 的非线程安全性将导致错误的结果，而添加所需的同步将导致争用，从而损害了并行性的好处。此外，这里完全没有必要使用副作用。所述 forEach() 可以简单地与归约运算是更安全，更有效，并且更适合于并行替换：

trans-unit.source: This code will create a LinearGradientPaint which interpolates between red and white for the first 20% of the gradient and between white and blue for the remaining 80%.
trans-unit.target: 此代码将创建一个 LinearGradientPaint ，在渐变的前20％处在红色和白色之间进行插值，在其余80％处在白色和蓝色之间进行插值。

trans-unit.source: This code will have the side effect of altering the original ParameterBlock, since the getSources operation returned a reference to its source Vector. Both pb and pb1 share their source Vector, and a change in either is visible to both.
trans-unit.target: 此代码将具有更改原始 ParameterBlock 的副作用，因为getSources操作返回对其源Vector的引用。pb和pb1都共享其源向量，并且两者中的任何一个都可见。

trans-unit.source: This color model is similar to an X11 TrueColor visual. The default RGB ColorModel specified by the getRGBdefault method is a DirectColorModel with the following parameters:
trans-unit.target: 此颜色模型类似于X11 TrueColor视觉效果。由 getRGBdefault 方法指定的默认RGB ColorModel是具有以下参数的 DirectColorModel ：

trans-unit.source: This combines the era and year-of-era into the single proleptic-year field.
trans-unit.target: 这就把年代和年代年结合起来,变成了单一的丙申年字段。

trans-unit.source: This combines this local date with the specified time and offset to calculate the epoch-second value, which is the number of elapsed seconds from 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z. Instants on the time-line after the epoch are positive, earlier are negative.
trans-unit.target: 这将本地日期与指定的时间和偏移量结合起来,计算出epoch-second值,即从1970-01-01T00:00:00Z开始的经过的秒数。纪元之后的时间线上的瞬时为正值,更早的为负值。

trans-unit.source: This combines this local date-time and the specified offset to calculate the epoch-second value, which is the number of elapsed seconds from 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z. Instants on the time-line after the epoch are positive, earlier are negative.
trans-unit.target: 这结合了本地的日期-时间和指定的偏移量来计算epoch-second值,即从1970-01-01T00:00:00Z开始的经过的秒数。纪元之后的时间线上的瞬间为正值,之前的为负值。

trans-unit.source: This combines this local date-time and the specified offset to form an Instant.
trans-unit.target: 它将这个本地日期时间和指定的偏移量结合起来以形成 Instant 。

trans-unit.source: This combines this local time with the specified date and offset to calculate the epoch-second value, which is the number of elapsed seconds from 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z. Instants on the time-line after the epoch are positive, earlier are negative.
trans-unit.target: 这将当地时间与指定的日期和偏移量结合起来,计算出epoch-second值,即从1970-01-01T00:00:00Z开始的经过的秒数。纪元之后的时间线上的瞬时为正值,更早的为负值。

trans-unit.source: This combines this offset time with the specified date to calculate the epoch-second value, which is the number of elapsed seconds from 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z. Instants on the time-line after the epoch are positive, earlier are negative.
trans-unit.target: 将此偏移时间与指定的日期相结合,计算出epoch-second值,即从1970-01-01T00:00:00Z开始的经过的秒数。纪元之后的时间线上的瞬时为正值,更早的为负值。

trans-unit.source: This command may be used as the first step in building a tree (or trees) of the existing thread groups.
trans-unit.target: 该命令可以作为建立现有线程组树的第一步。

trans-unit.source: This comparator differs from the comparison in compareTo(java.time.chrono.ChronoLocalDate) in that it only compares the underlying date and not the chronology. This allows dates in different calendar systems to be compared based on the position of the date on the local time-line. The underlying comparison is equivalent to comparing the epoch-day.
trans-unit.target: 此比较器与 compareTo(java.time.chrono.ChronoLocalDate) 中的比较的不同之处在于，它仅比较基础日期，而不比较年代。这允许根据本地时间线上日期的位置来比较不同日历系统中的日期。基本的比较等同于比较时代。

trans-unit.source: This comparator differs from the comparison in compareTo(java.time.chrono.ChronoLocalDateTime<?>) in that it only compares the underlying date-time and not the chronology. This allows dates in different calendar systems to be compared based on the position of the date-time on the local time-line. The underlying comparison is equivalent to comparing the epoch-day and nano-of-day.
trans-unit.target: 此比较器与 compareTo(java.time.chrono.ChronoLocalDateTime<?>) 中的比较的不同之处在于，它仅比较基础日期时间，而不比较年代。这允许根据本地时间线上日期时间的位置来比较不同日历系统中的日期。基本的比较等同于比较时代和毫微秒。

trans-unit.source: This comparator differs from the comparison in compareTo(java.time.chrono.ChronoZonedDateTime<?>) in that it only compares the underlying instant and not the chronology. This allows dates in different calendar systems to be compared based on the position of the date-time on the instant time-line. The underlying comparison is equivalent to comparing the epoch-second and nano-of-second.
trans-unit.target: 此比较器与 compareTo(java.time.chrono.ChronoZonedDateTime<?>) 中的比较的不同之处在于，它仅比较基础时刻，而不比较年代。这允许根据即时时间线上日期时间的位置来比较不同日历系统中的日期。基本的比较等效于比较纪元和毫微秒。

trans-unit.source: This comparator differs from the comparison in compareTo(java.time.chrono.ChronoLocalDate) in that it only compares the underlying date and not the chronology. This allows dates in different calendar systems to be compared based on the position of the date on the local time-line. The underlying comparison is equivalent to comparing the epoch-day.
trans-unit.target: 此比较器与 compareTo(java.time.chrono.ChronoLocalDate) 中的比较的不同之处在于，它仅比较基础日期，而不比较年代。这允许根据本地时间轴上日期的位置来比较不同日历系统中的日期。基本的比较等同于比较时代。

trans-unit.source: This comparator differs from the comparison in compareTo(java.time.chrono.ChronoLocalDateTime<?>) in that it only compares the underlying date-time and not the chronology. This allows dates in different calendar systems to be compared based on the position of the date-time on the local time-line. The underlying comparison is equivalent to comparing the epoch-day and nano-of-day.
trans-unit.target: 此比较器与 compareTo(java.time.chrono.ChronoLocalDateTime<?>) 中的比较的不同之处在于，它仅比较基础日期时间，而不比较年代。这允许根据本地时间线上日期时间的位置来比较不同日历系统中的日期。基本的比较等同于比较时代和毫微秒。

trans-unit.source: This comparator differs from the comparison in compareTo(java.time.chrono.ChronoZonedDateTime<?>) in that it only compares the underlying instant and not the chronology. This allows dates in different calendar systems to be compared based on the position of the date-time on the instant time-line. The underlying comparison is equivalent to comparing the epoch-second and nano-of-second.
trans-unit.target: 此比较器与 compareTo(java.time.chrono.ChronoZonedDateTime<?>) 中的比较的不同之处在于，它仅比较基础时刻，而不比较年代。这允许根据即时时间线上日期时间的位置来比较不同日历系统中的日期。基本的比较等效于比较纪元和毫微秒。

trans-unit.source: This compares the instants of each transition. The offsets are ignored, making this order inconsistent with equals.
trans-unit.target: 这比较了每个转换的实例。忽略了偏移量,使得这个顺序与等号不一致。

trans-unit.source: This component has capabilities not found in the java.awt.TextArea class. The superclass should be consulted for additional capabilities. Alternative multi-line text classes with more capabilities are JTextPane and JEditorPane.
trans-unit.target: 该组件具有 java.awt.TextArea 类中未找到的功能。应该咨询超类以获得更多功能。具有更多功能的替代多行文本类是 JTextPane 和 JEditorPane 。

trans-unit.source: This component models paragraphs that are composed of runs of character level attributes. Each paragraph may have a logical style attached to it which contains the default attributes to use if not overridden by attributes set on the paragraph or character run. Components and images may be embedded in the flow of text.
trans-unit.target: 该组件对由字符级属性运行组成的段落进行建模。每个段落都可以附加一个逻辑样式,其中包含了默认的属性,如果没有被段落或字符运行上设置的属性所覆盖的话。组件和图像可以嵌入到文本流中。

trans-unit.source: This component represents an iconified version of a JInternalFrame.
trans-unit.target: 该组件表示 JInternalFrame 的图标化版本。

trans-unit.source: This component represents an iconified version of a JInternalFrame. This API should NOT BE USED by Swing applications, as it will go away in future versions of Swing as its functionality is moved into JInternalFrame. This class is public only so that UI objects can display a desktop icon. If an application wants to display a desktop icon, it should create a JInternalFrame instance and iconify it.
trans-unit.target: 该组件表示 JInternalFrame 的图标化版本。该API不应由Swing应用程序使用，因为随着其功能被移至 JInternalFrame ，它将在以后的Swing版本中消失。此类仅是公共的，因此UI对象可以显示桌面图标。如果应用程序要显示桌面图标，则应创建一个 JInternalFrame 实例并对其进行图标化。

trans-unit.source: This component uses implementations of the EditorKit to accomplish its behavior. It effectively morphs into the proper kind of text editor for the kind of content it is given. The content type that editor is bound to at any given time is determined by the EditorKit currently installed. If the content is set to a new URL, its type is used to determine the EditorKit that should be used to load the content.
trans-unit.target: 该组件使用 EditorKit 的实现来完成其行为。它可以有效地变型为适合给定内容类型的文本编辑器。编辑器在任何给定时间绑定的内容类型由当前安装的 EditorKit 确定。如果内容设置为新的URL，则其类型用于确定应用于加载内容的 EditorKit 。

trans-unit.source: This component's locale. If this component does not have a locale, the locale of its parent is returned.
trans-unit.target: 这个组件的locale。如果该组件没有locale,则返回其父体的locale。

trans-unit.source: This computes, in a single pass, the count of people, as well as the minimum, maximum, sum, and average of their ages.
trans-unit.target: 它可以一次性计算出人的数量,以及年龄的最小值、最大值、总和和平均值。

trans-unit.source: This computes, in a single pass, the count of people, as well as the minimum, maximum, sum, and average of their number of dependents.
trans-unit.target: 在一次计算中,它可以计算人的数量,以及被抚养人数量的最小值、最大值、总和和平均值。

trans-unit.source: This computes, in a single pass, the count of people, as well as the minimum, maximum, sum, and average of their weights.
trans-unit.target: 它可以一次性计算出人的数量,以及他们权重的最小值、最大值、总和和平均值。

trans-unit.source: This concept can seem surprising at first, as the natural way to globalize an application might initially appear to be to abstract the calendar system. However, as explored below, abstracting the calendar system is usually the wrong approach, resulting in logic errors and hard to find bugs. As such, it should be considered an application-wide architectural decision to choose to use this interface as opposed to LocalDate.
trans-unit.target: 刚开始时，此概念可能令人惊讶，因为全球化应用程序的自然方法最初可能看起来是抽象日历系统。但是，如下所述，抽象日历系统通常是错误的方法，从而导致逻辑错误并很难发现错误。因此，应该选择使用此接口而不是 LocalDate 来作为应用程序范围的体系结构决策。

trans-unit.source: This concept is described in the cookie specification. To understand the concept, some terminologies need to be defined first:
trans-unit.target: 这个概念在cookie规范中有所描述。为了理解这个概念,需要先定义一些术语。

trans-unit.source: This concrete method has been added to this previously-defined abstract class. (For backwards compatibility, it cannot be abstract.)
trans-unit.target: 这个具体方法已经被添加到这个之前定义的抽象类中。为了向后兼容,它不能是抽象的)。

trans-unit.source: This concrete method has been added to this previously-defined abstract class. (For backwards compatibility, it cannot be abstract.) It may be overridden by a provider to initialize the key pair generator. Such an override is expected to throw an InvalidAlgorithmParameterException if a parameter is inappropriate for this key pair generator. If this method is not overridden, it always throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
trans-unit.target: 这个具体方法被添加到这个之前定义的抽象类中。(为了向后兼容,它不能是抽象的。)它可以被提供者重载来初始化密钥对生成器。如果一个参数对这个密钥对生成器不合适,这样的重写会抛出一个InvalidAlgorithmParameterException。如果这个方法没有被重载,它总是抛出一个UnsupportedOperationException。

trans-unit.source: This concrete method has been added to this previously-defined abstract class. (For backwards compatibility, it cannot be abstract.) It may be overridden by a provider to unwrap a previously wrapped key. Such an override is expected to throw an InvalidKeyException if the given wrapped key cannot be unwrapped. If this method is not overridden, it always throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
trans-unit.target: 这个具体的方法已经被添加到这个之前定义的抽象类中。(为了向后兼容,它不能是抽象的。)它可以被提供者重载来解开一个先前封装的密钥。如果给定的封装键不能被解包,这样的重载将抛出一个InvalidKeyException。如果这个方法没有被重载,它总是抛出一个UnsupportedOperationException。

trans-unit.source: This concrete method has been added to this previously-defined abstract class. (For backwards compatibility, it cannot be abstract.) It may be overridden by a provider to wrap a key. Such an override is expected to throw an IllegalBlockSizeException or InvalidKeyException (under the specified circumstances), if the given key cannot be wrapped. If this method is not overridden, it always throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
trans-unit.target: 这个具体方法被添加到这个之前定义的抽象类中。(为了向后兼容,它不能是抽象的。)它可以被提供者重写来封装一个密钥。如果给定的密钥不能被封装,这样的重载将抛出IllegalBlockSizeException或InvalidKeyException(在指定情况下)。如果这个方法没有被重写,它总是抛出一个UnsupportedOperationException。

trans-unit.source: This concrete method has been added to this previously-defined abstract class. It throws an UnsupportedOperationException if it is not overridden by the provider.
trans-unit.target: 此具体方法已添加到此先前定义的抽象类中。如果提供者未重写它，则抛出 UnsupportedOperationException 。

trans-unit.source: This concrete method has been added to this previously-defined abstract class. This method calls the KeyPairGeneratorSpi initialize method, passing it params and random. That initialize method always throws an UnsupportedOperationException if it is not overridden by the provider.
trans-unit.target: 此具体方法已添加到此先前定义的抽象类中。此方法调用KeyPairGeneratorSpi initialize 方法，并将其传递给 params 和 random 。如果提供者未重写该 initialize 方法，则始终会引发UnsupportedOperationException。

trans-unit.source: This concrete method has been added to this previously-defined abstract class. This method calls the KeyPairGeneratorSpi initialize method, passing it params and a source of randomness (obtained from the highest-priority installed provider or system-provided if none of the installed providers supply one). That initialize method always throws an UnsupportedOperationException if it is not overridden by the provider.
trans-unit.target: 此具体方法已添加到此先前定义的抽象类中。此方法调用KeyPairGeneratorSpi initialize 方法，将其传递给 params 和随机性源（从安装优先级最高的提供程序获得，或者如果没有安装的提供程序提供任何系统，则由系统提供）。如果提供者未重写该 initialize 方法，则始终会引发UnsupportedOperationException。

trans-unit.source: This concrete method has been added to this previously-defined abstract class. This method calls the KeyPairGeneratorSpi initialize method, passing it params and random. That initialize method always throws an UnsupportedOperationException if it is not overridden by the provider.
trans-unit.target: 此具体方法已添加到此先前定义的抽象类中。此方法调用KeyPairGeneratorSpi initialize 方法，并将其传递给 params 和 random 。如果提供者未重写该 initialize 方法，则始终会引发UnsupportedOperationException。

trans-unit.source: This concrete method has been added to this previously-defined abstract class. This method calls the KeyPairGeneratorSpi initialize method, passing it params and a source of randomness (obtained from the highest-priority installed provider or system-provided if none of the installed providers supply one). That initialize method always throws an UnsupportedOperationException if it is not overridden by the provider.
trans-unit.target: 此具体方法已添加到此先前定义的抽象类中。此方法调用KeyPairGeneratorSpi initialize 方法，并向其传递 params 和随机性源（从安装优先级最高的提供程序获得，如果没有安装的提供程序提供，则从系统提供）。如果提供者未重写该 initialize 方法，则始终会引发UnsupportedOperationException。

trans-unit.source: This console
trans-unit.target: 这个控制台

trans-unit.source: This constant indicates that the transform defined by this object is an identity transform.
trans-unit.target: 这个常数表示这个对象所定义的变换是身份变换。

trans-unit.source: This constant indicates that the transform defined by this object is an identity transform. An identity transform is one in which the output coordinates are always the same as the input coordinates. If this transform is anything other than the identity transform, the type will either be the constant GENERAL_TRANSFORM or a combination of the appropriate flag bits for the various coordinate conversions that this transform performs.
trans-unit.target: 这个常数表示这个对象所定义的变换是身份变换。身份变换是指输出坐标总是与输入坐标相同的变换。如果这个变换不是身份变换,那么类型将是常量GENERAL_TRANSFORM,或者是这个变换所执行的各种坐标变换的相应标志位的组合。

trans-unit.source: This constant indicates that the transform defined by this object performs an arbitrary conversion of the input coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 该常数表示该对象所定义的变换对输入坐标进行任意转换。

trans-unit.source: This constant indicates that the transform defined by this object performs an arbitrary conversion of the input coordinates. If this transform can be classified by any of the above constants, the type will either be the constant TYPE_IDENTITY or a combination of the appropriate flag bits for the various coordinate conversions that this transform performs.
trans-unit.target: 这个常量表示这个对象定义的变换对输入坐标进行任意转换。如果这个变换可以用上述任何一个常数来分类,那么类型将是常数TYPE_IDENTITY或者是这个变换所执行的各种坐标转换的相应标志位的组合。

trans-unit.source: This constant is a bit mask for any of the rotation flag bits.
trans-unit.target: 这个常数是任何一个旋转标志位的位掩码。

trans-unit.source: This constant is a bit mask for any of the scale flag bits.
trans-unit.target: 这个常数是任何一个刻度标志位的位掩码。

trans-unit.source: This constant is associated with
trans-unit.target: 这个常数与

trans-unit.source: This constant is obsolete, and is included only for backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 这个常量已经过时了,只是为了向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: This constant is returned from the getNumberOfPages method if a Pageable implementation does not know the number of pages in its set.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Pageable 实现不知道其集合中的页数，则从 getNumberOfPages 方法返回此常量。

trans-unit.source: This constant specifies all of the bit mask-based ranges. Use EnumSet.allOf(NumericShaper.Range.class) to specify all of the enum-based ranges.
trans-unit.target: 该常数指定所有基于位掩码的范围。使用 EnumSet.allOf(NumericShaper.Range.class) 指定所有基于枚举的范围。

trans-unit.source: This constant specifies to add an attribute with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 该常量指定添加一个具有指定值的属性。

trans-unit.source: This constant specifies to delete the specified attribute values from the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 该常量指定从属性中删除指定的属性值。

trans-unit.source: This constant specifies to replace an attribute with specified values.
trans-unit.target: 这个常量指定用指定的值来替换一个属性。

trans-unit.source: This constant value indicates that the purpose of the file dialog window is to locate a file from which to read.
trans-unit.target: 该常量值表示文件对话框窗口的目的是定位读取文件。

trans-unit.source: This constant value indicates that the purpose of the file dialog window is to locate a file to which to write.
trans-unit.target: 该常量值表示文件对话框窗口的目的是定位一个要写入的文件。

trans-unit.source: This constraint is useful when building a certification path forward (from the target toward the trust anchor. If a partial path has been built, any candidate certificate must have a maxPathLen value greater than or equal to the number of certificates in the partial path.
trans-unit.target: 这个约束条件在建立一个向前的认证路径(从目标到信任锚点)时很有用,如果已经建立了一个部分路径,任何候选证书都必须有一个大于或等于部分路径中的证书数量的maxPathLen值。如果已经建立了部分路径,任何候选证书的 maxPathLen 值必须大于或等于部分路径中的证书数量。

trans-unit.source: This constraint is useful when building a certification path forward (from the target toward the trust anchor. If a partial path has been built, any candidate certificate must not include name constraints that would prohibit building a path to any of the names in the partial path.
trans-unit.target: 当建立一个向前的认证路径(从目标到信任锚的路径)时,这个约束是有用的。如果已经建立了部分路径,则任何候选证书都不得包含禁止建立通往部分路径中任何名称的路径的名称约束。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows the systemID to be set in addition to the input stream, which allows relative URIs to be processed.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数除了允许设置输入流外,还允许设置systemID,这样可以处理相对的URI。

trans-unit.source: This constructor constructs an IndexedPropertyDescriptor for a property that follows the standard Java conventions by having getFoo and setFoo accessor methods, for both indexed access and array access.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数为一个属性构造了一个IndexedPropertyDescriptor,它遵循标准的Java惯例,有getFoo和setFoo访问方法,用于索引访问和数组访问。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an EventSetDescriptor from scratch using java.lang.reflect.Method and java.lang.Class objects.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数使用java.lang.reflect.Method和java.lang.Class对象从头开始创建一个EventSetDescriptor。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an EventSetDescriptor from scratch using string names.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数使用字符串名称从头开始创建一个EventSetDescriptor。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an object with a default closure type of OPEN. It is provided only to enable serialization of subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建一个默认闭合类型为 OPEN 的对象。提供它仅用于启用子类的序列化。

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not attempt to check the class names for validity. Invalid class names may cause exceptions in subsequent calls to getMetadataFormat.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数不会尝试检查类名的有效性。无效的类名称可能会导致后续调用 getMetadataFormat 的异常。

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not check if the given bytes indeed specify a secret key of the specified algorithm. For example, if the algorithm is DES, this constructor does not check if key is 8 bytes long, and also does not check for weak or semi-weak keys. In order for those checks to be performed, an algorithm-specific
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不会检查给定的字节是否确实指定了指定算法的秘密密钥。例如，如果算法是DES，则此构造方法不检查 key 是否为8个字节长，也不检查弱密钥或半弱密钥。为了执行这些检查，特定于算法的

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not check if the given bytes indeed specify a secret key of the specified algorithm. For example, if the algorithm is DES, this constructor does not check if key is 8 bytes long, and also does not check for weak or semi-weak keys. In order for those checks to be performed, an algorithm-specific key specification class (in this case: DESKeySpec) must be used.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不会检查给定的字节是否确实指定了指定算法的秘密密钥。例如，如果算法是DES，则此构造方法不检查 key 是否为8个字节长，也不检查弱密钥或半弱密钥。为了执行这些检查，必须使用特定于算法的密钥规范类（在这种情况下： DESKeySpec ）。

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not do custom mapping. If the base type of the array is an SQL structured type and custom mapping is desired, the constructor SerialArray(Array array, Map map) should be used.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不执行自定义映射。如果数组的基本类型是SQL结构类型，并且需要自定义映射，则应使用构造函数 SerialArray(Array array, Map map) 。

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not throw an exception if fdObj is invalid. However, if the methods are invoked on the resulting stream to attempt I/O on the stream, an IOException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果此构造方法不抛出异常 fdObj 是 invalid 。但是，如果在结果流上调用这些方法以尝试对该流进行I / O，则会抛出 IOException 。

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not throw an exception if fdObj is invalid. However, if the methods are invoked on the resulting stream to attempt I/O on the stream, an IOException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果此构造方法不抛出异常 fdObj 是 invalid 。但是，如果在结果流上调用这些方法以尝试对该流进行I / O，则会抛出 IOException 。
