trans-unit.source: This constructor has to be used when the RelationSupport object will be registered as a MBean by the user, or when creating a user relation MBean whose class extends RelationSupport.
trans-unit.target: 当RelationSupport对象将被用户注册为MBean时,或者当创建用户关系MBean的类扩展RelationSupport时,必须使用这个构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This constructor has to be used when the user relation MBean implements the interfaces expected to be supported by a relation by delegating to a RelationSupport object.
trans-unit.target: 当用户关系MBean通过委托给RelationSupport对象来实现关系所期望支持的接口时,必须使用这个构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is a more convenient way to express the following (equivalent) code:
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数更方便地表达了以下(等价)代码。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by subclasses only. Application should call list() or getTerminal() to obtain a CardTerminal object.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数仅由子类调用。应用程序应调用list（）或getTerminal（）以获得CardTerminal对象。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by subclasses only. Application should call TerminalFactory.terminals() to obtain a CardTerminals object.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数仅由子类调用。应用程序应调用TerminalFactory.terminals（）以获得CardTerminals对象。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by subclasses only. Application should call the Card.getBasicChannel() and Card.openLogicalChannel() methods to obtain a CardChannel object.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数仅由子类调用。应用程序应调用Card.getBasicChannel（）和Card.openLogicalChannel（）方法以获得CardChannel对象。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by subclasses only. Application should call the CardTerminal.connect() method to obtain a Card object.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数仅由子类调用。应用程序应调用CardTerminal.connect（）方法以获得Card对象。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to MBeanServerPermission(name,null).
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数等效于 MBeanServerPermission(name,null) 。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to MBeanTrustPermission(name,null).
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数等效于 MBeanTrustPermission(name,null) 。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to a call to the two-argument constructor with a null first argument.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数等效于使用第一个参数为 null 的双参数构造函数的调用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to the four-argument constructor with the only difference of using the default port for the specified protocol. No validation of the inputs is performed by this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数等同于四个参数构造函数,唯一不同的是它使用了指定协议的默认端口。此构造函数不对输入进行验证。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is especially useful inside a startElement event.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数在 startElement 事件中特别有用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is especially useful when an application is creating its own exception from within a ContentHandler callback, and needs to wrap an existing exception that is not a subclass of SAXException.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序正在 ContentHandler 回调中创建自己的异常并且需要包装不是 SAXException 的子类的现有异常时，此构造函数特别有用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is especially useful when an application is creating its own exception from within a ContentHandler callback.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序在 ContentHandler 回调中创建自己的异常时，此构造函数特别有用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is especially useful when an application is creating its own exception from within a DocumentHandler callback.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序从DocumentHandler回调中创建自己的异常时,这个构造函数特别有用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is identical to Thread(ThreadGroup,Runnable,String) with the exception of the fact that it allows the thread stack size to be specified. The stack size is the approximate number of bytes of address space that the virtual machine is to allocate for this thread's stack. The effect of the stackSize parameter, if any, is highly platform dependent.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数与 Thread(ThreadGroup,Runnable,String) 相同，不同之处在于它允许指定线程堆栈的大小。堆栈大小是虚拟机要为此线程的堆栈分配的地址空间的大概字节数。 stackSize 参数（如果有）的效果高度依赖于平台。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is identical to Thread(ThreadGroup,Runnable,String,long) with the added ability to suppress, or not, the inheriting of initial values for inheritable thread-local variables from the constructing thread. This allows for finer grain control over inheritable thread-locals. Care must be taken when passing a value of false for inheritThreadLocals, as it may lead to unexpected behavior if the new thread executes code that expects a specific thread-local value to be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数与 Thread(ThreadGroup,Runnable,String,long) 相同，具有抑制或不抑制从构造线程继承可继承线程局部变量的初始值的功能。这允许对可继承线程局部进行更好的粒度控制。为 inheritThreadLocals 传递 false 值时必须小心，因为如果新线程执行期望继承特定线程局部值的代码，则可能导致意外行为。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is identical to Thread(ThreadGroup,Runnable,String) with the exception of the fact that it allows the thread stack size to be specified. The stack size is the approximate number of bytes of address space that the virtual machine is to allocate for this thread's stack. The effect of the stackSize parameter, if any, is highly platform dependent.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数与 Thread(ThreadGroup,Runnable,String) 相同，不同之处在于它允许指定线程堆栈大小。堆栈大小是虚拟机要为此线程的堆栈分配的地址空间的大概字节数。 stackSize 参数（如果有）的效果在很大程度上取决于平台。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is most useful for application writers, who will use it to create a persistent copy of an existing attribute list.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数对于应用程序编写者来说是最有用的,他们将使用它来创建一个现有属性列表的持久化副本。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is most useful for parser writers who need to wrap an exception that is not a subclass of SAXException.
trans-unit.target: 对于需要包装不是 SAXException 的子类的异常的解析器编写器，此构造函数最有用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is most useful for parser writers, who will use it to create a single, reusable attribute list that can be reset with the clear method between elements.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数对于解析器编写者来说是最有用的,他们会用它来创建一个单一的、可重用的属性列表,这个列表可以在元素之间用clear方法重置。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is most useful for parser writers.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数对解析器编写者最有用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not appropriate for an MXBean. Use MBeanServerInvocationHandler(MBeanServerConnection, ObjectName, boolean) for that. This constructor is equivalent to new MBeanServerInvocationHandler(connection, objectName, false).
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不适用于MXBean。为此使用 MBeanServerInvocationHandler(MBeanServerConnection, ObjectName, boolean) 。此构造函数等效于 new MBeanServerInvocationHandler(connection, objectName, false) 。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not appropriate for an MXBean. Use MBeanServerInvocationHandler(MBeanServerConnection, ObjectName, boolean) for that. This constructor is equivalent to new MBeanServerInvocationHandler(connection, objectName, false).
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不适用于MXBean。为此使用 MBeanServerInvocationHandler(MBeanServerConnection, ObjectName, boolean) 。此构造函数等效于 new MBeanServerInvocationHandler(connection, objectName, false) 。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is protected because most users should use a CertificateFactory to create CertPaths.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数受到保护，因为大多数用户应使用 CertificateFactory 来创建 CertPath 。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is provided to ease migration to StringBuilder. Obtaining a string from a string builder via the toString method is likely to run faster and is generally preferred.
trans-unit.target: 提供此构造函数可简化向 StringBuilder 的迁移。通过 toString 方法从字符串生成器获取字符串可能会运行得更快，通常是首选。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is provided to ease migration to StringBuilder. Obtaining a string from a string builder via the toString method is likely to run faster and is generally preferred.
trans-unit.target: 提供此构造函数可简化向 StringBuilder 的迁移。通过 toString 方法从字符串生成器获取字符串可能会运行得更快，通常是首选。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is typically used by ClassLoaders and DomainCombiners which delegate to Policy to actively associate the permissions granted to this domain. This constructor affords the Policy provider the opportunity to augment the supplied PermissionCollection to reflect policy changes.
trans-unit.target: ClassLoaders 和 DomainCombiners 通常使用此构造函数，它们委托给 Policy 来主动关联授予该域的权限。此构造函数使策略提供者有机会扩展提供的PermissionCollection以反映策略更改。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used for serialization only and should not be used by subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数只用于序列化,不应该被子类使用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used internally, and generally not useful outside of subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数在内部使用,在子类之外一般没有用处。

trans-unit.source: This constructor loads the implementations of ScriptEngineFactory visible to the given ClassLoader using the service provider mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数使用服务提供者机制 ClassLoader 对给定ClassLoader可见的 ScriptEngineFactory 实现。

trans-unit.source: This constructor must be called from a subclass that implements the given mbeanInterface.
trans-unit.target: 必须从实现给定 mbeanInterface 的子类中调用此构造方法。

trans-unit.source: This constructor parses the given string exactly as specified by the grammar in RFC 2396, Appendix A, except for the following deviations:
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数完全按照RFC 2396附录A中的语法规定解析给定的字符串，除了以下差异之外：

trans-unit.source: This constructor parses the given string exactly as specified by the grammar in RFC 2396, Appendix A, except for the following deviations:
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数完全按照RFC 2396附录A中的语法指定的方式解析给定的字符串，但以下差异除外：

trans-unit.source: This constructor recognizes the attribute type keywords defined in RFC 1779 and RFC 2253 (and listed in getName(String format)), as well as the T, DNQ or DNQUALIFIER, SURNAME, GIVENNAME, INITIALS, GENERATION, EMAILADDRESS, and SERIALNUMBER keywords whose Object Identifiers (OIDs) are defined in RFC 5280. Any other attribute type must be specified as an OID.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数识别在RFC 1779和RFC 2253中定义的属性类型关键字（并以 getName(String format) 列出），以及T，DNQ或DNQUALIFIER，SURNAME，GIVENNAME，INITIALS，GENERATION，EMAILADDRESS和SERIALNUMBER关键字作为对象标识符（OID）在RFC 5280中定义。必须将任何其他属性类型指定为OID。

trans-unit.source: This constructor recognizes the attribute type keywords defined in RFC 1779 and RFC 2253 (and listed in getName(String format)), as well as the T, DNQ or DNQUALIFIER, SURNAME, GIVENNAME, INITIALS, GENERATION, EMAILADDRESS, and SERIALNUMBER keywords whose Object Identifiers (OIDs) are defined in RFC 3280 and its successor. Any other attribute type must be specified as an OID.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数可识别在RFC 1779和RFC 2253中定义的属性类型关键字（并以 getName(String format) 列出），以及T，DNQ或DNQUALIFIER，SURNAME，GIVENNAME，INITIALS，GENERATION，EMAILADDRESS和SERIALNUMBER关键字作为对象标识符（OID）在RFC 3280及其后续版本中定义。任何其他属性类型都必须指定为OID。

trans-unit.source: This constructor recognizes the attribute type keywords specified in X500Principal(String) and also recognizes additional keywords that have entries in the keywordMap parameter. Keyword entries in the keywordMap take precedence over the default keywords recognized by X500Principal(String). Keywords MUST be specified in all upper-case, otherwise they will be ignored. Improperly specified keywords are ignored; however if a keyword in the name maps to an improperly specified Object Identifier (OID), an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. It is permissible to have 2 different keywords that map to the same OID.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数可以识别 X500Principal(String) 中指定的属性类型关键字，还可以识别在 keywordMap 参数中具有条目的其他关键字。 keywordMap中的关键字条目优先于X500Principal X500Principal(String) 识别的默认关键字。关键字必须全部用大写字母指定，否则将被忽略。指定不正确的关键字将被忽略；但是，如果名称中的关键字映射到不正确指定的对象标识符（OID），则会 IllegalArgumentException 。允许有2个不同的关键字映射到相同的OID。

trans-unit.source: This constructor recognizes the attribute type keywords specified in X500Principal(String) and also recognizes additional keywords that have entries in the keywordMap parameter. Keyword entries in the keywordMap take precedence over the default keywords recognized by X500Principal(String). Keywords MUST be specified in all upper-case, otherwise they will be ignored. Improperly specified keywords are ignored; however if a keyword in the name maps to an improperly specified Object Identifier (OID), an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. It is permissible to have 2 different keywords that map to the same OID.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数可以识别 X500Principal(String) 中指定的属性类型关键字，还可以识别在 keywordMap 参数中具有条目的其他关键字。 keywordMap中的关键字条目优先于X500Principal X500Principal(String) 识别的默认关键字。关键字必须全部大写，否则将被忽略。指定不正确的关键字将被忽略；但是，如果名称中的关键字映射到不正确指定的对象标识符（OID），则会引发 IllegalArgumentException 。允许有2个不同的关键字映射到相同的OID。

trans-unit.source: This constructor registers the list with the ToolTipManager, allowing for tooltips to be provided by the cell renderers.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数向 ToolTipManager 注册该列表，从而允许单元格渲染器提供工具提示。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the component's locale property to the value returned by JComponent.getDefaultLocale.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数将组件的locale属性设置为 JComponent.getDefaultLocale 返回的值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor should be used when the returned update count may exceed Integer.MAX_VALUE.
trans-unit.target: 当返回的更新计数可能超过 Integer.MAX_VALUE 时，应使用此构造方法。

trans-unit.source: This constructor simply calls this(tabularType, 101, 0.75f);
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数简单地调用 this(tabularType, 101, 0.75f);

trans-unit.source: This constructor supports the creation of arrays of primitive types when primitiveArray is true.
trans-unit.target: 当 primitiveArray 为 true 时，此构造方法支持创建基本类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: This constructor takes the name of a simple attribute, and Method objects for reading and writing the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数取一个简单属性的名称,以及用于读写属性的Method对象。

trans-unit.source: This constructor takes the name of a simple attribute, and Method objects for reading and writing the attribute. The Descriptor of the constructed object will include fields contributed by any annotations on the Method objects that contain the DescriptorKey meta-annotation.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数使用简单属性的名称以及用于读写属性的Method对象。构造对象的 Descriptor 将包含由包含 DescriptorKey 元注释的 Method 对象上的任何注释贡献的字段。

trans-unit.source: This constructor takes the name of a simple property, and Method objects for reading and writing the property.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数取一个简单属性的名称,以及用于读写属性的Method对象。

trans-unit.source: This constructor takes the name of a simple property, and method names for reading and writing the property, both indexed and non-indexed.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数取一个简单属性的名称,以及读写该属性的方法名,包括索引和非索引。

trans-unit.source: This constructor takes the name of a simple property, and method names for reading and writing the property.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数取一个简单属性的名称,以及读写该属性的方法名。

trans-unit.source: This constructor traverses the list of registered security Providers, starting with the most preferred Provider. A new SecureRandom object encapsulating the SecureRandomSpi implementation from the first Provider that supports a SecureRandom (RNG) algorithm is returned. If none of the Providers support a RNG algorithm, then an implementation-specific default is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此构造方法从最喜欢的提供程序开始，遍历已注册的安全提供程序的列表。返回一个新的 SecureRandom 对象，该对象封装了第一个支持 SecureRandom （RNG）算法的Provider的 SecureRandomSpi 实现。如果所有提供者都不支持RNG算法，则返回特定于实现的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor traverses the list of registered security Providers, starting with the most preferred Provider. A new SecureRandom object encapsulating the SecureRandomSpi implementation from the first Provider that supports a SecureRandom (RNG) algorithm is returned. If none of the Providers support a RNG algorithm, then an implementation-specific default is returned.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数从最喜欢的Provider开始,遍历注册的安全Provider列表。从第一个支持SecureRandom(RNG)算法的Provider那里返回一个封装SecureRandomSpi实现的新SecureRandom对象。如果没有任何一个Provider支持RNG算法,那么将返回一个特定于实现的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor will create an ActivationGroupDesc with a null group class name, which indicates the system's default ActivationGroup implementation.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数将创建一个具有 null 组类名称的 ActivationGroupDesc ，该名称表示系统的默认 ActivationGroup 实现。

trans-unit.source: This constructor will create new cookie manager with default cookie store and accept policy. The effect is same as CookieManager(null, null).
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数将使用默认cookie存储创建新的cookie管理器并接受策略。效果与 CookieManager(null, null) 。

trans-unit.source: This constructor will not modify environment or save a reference to it, but may save a clone. Caller should not modify mutable keys and values in environment after it has been passed to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数不会修改 environment 或保存对它的引用，但可以保存克隆。调用者传递给构造函数后，不应在 environment 修改可变键和值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor will not modify its parameters or save references to them, but may save a clone or copy. Caller should not modify mutable keys and values in environment after it has been passed to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数不会修改其参数或保存对其的引用，但可以保存克隆或副本。调用者传递给构造函数后，不应在 environment 修改可变键和值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor will throw ActivationException if there is no current activation group for this VM. To create an ActivationGroup use the ActivationGroup.createGroup method.
trans-unit.target: 如果此VM当前没有激活组，则此构造方法将抛出 ActivationException 。要创建 ActivationGroup ,请使用 ActivationGroup.createGroup 方法。

trans-unit.source: This contains generic meta-information about the document.
trans-unit.target: 这包含了文档的一般元信息。

trans-unit.source: This contains generic meta-information about the document. See the META element definition in HTML 4.0.
trans-unit.target: 这包含了关于文档的通用元信息。参见HTML 4.0中META元素的定义。

trans-unit.source: This context may be unavailable in some environments, in which case this method returns null.
trans-unit.target: 这个上下文在某些环境中可能不可用,在这种情况下,本方法返回null。

trans-unit.source: This context may be unavailable in some environments, in which case this method returns null. For example, when the underlying SSL provider does not provide an implementation of SSLSessionContext interface, this method returns null. A non-null session context is returned otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 在某些环境中,这个上下文可能不可用,在这种情况下,这个方法返回null.例如,当底层SSL提供商没有提供SSLSessionContext接口的实现时,这个方法返回null。例如,当底层SSL提供商没有提供SSLSessionContext接口的实现时,本方法返回null。否则将返回一个非空的会话上下文。

trans-unit.source: This continues until a result resource bundle is instantiated or the list of candidate bundle names is exhausted. If no matching resource bundle is found, the default control's getFallbackLocale method is called, which returns the current default locale. A new sequence of candidate locale names is generated using this locale and searched again, as above.
trans-unit.target: 这一直持续到实例化结果资源束或候选束名称的列表用尽为止。如果找不到匹配的资源包，则调用默认控件的 getFallbackLocale 方法，该方法返回当前的默认语言环境。使用该语言环境生成新的候选语言环境名称序列，并再次进行搜索，如上所述。

trans-unit.source: This continues until a result resource bundle is instantiated or the list of candidate bundle names is exhausted. If no matching resource bundle is found, the default control's getFallbackLocale method is called, which returns the current default locale. A new sequence of candidate locale names is generated using this locale and and searched again, as above.
trans-unit.target: 这一直持续到实例化结果资源束或候选束名称的列表用尽为止。如果找不到匹配的资源包，则调用默认控件的 getFallbackLocale 方法，该方法返回当前的默认语言环境。使用该语言环境生成新的候选语言环境名称序列，然后再次搜索，如上所述。

trans-unit.source: This control is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 这个控制是只读的。

trans-unit.source: This control is read-only. Relevant only when type has the value "Text" or "Password". See the readonly attribute definition in HTML 4.0.
trans-unit.target: 该控件是只读的。仅当 type 的值为“ Text”或“ Password”时才相关。请参阅HTML 4.0中的readonly属性定义。

trans-unit.source: This control is read-only. See the readonly attribute definition in HTML 4.0.
trans-unit.target: 这个控件是只读的。参见HTML 4.0中的readonly属性定义。

trans-unit.source: This controller
trans-unit.target: 该控制器

trans-unit.source: This convenience constructor works as if by invoking the seven-argument constructor as follows:
trans-unit.target: 这个方便构造函数的工作原理就像调用七参数构造函数一样,如下所示。

trans-unit.source: This convenience constructor works as if by invoking the three-argument constructor as follows:
trans-unit.target: 这个方便构造函数的工作原理就像调用三参数构造函数一样,如下所示。

trans-unit.source: This convenience factory method works as if by invoking the URI(String) constructor; any URISyntaxException thrown by the constructor is caught and wrapped in a new IllegalArgumentException object, which is then thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此便捷工厂方法的工作方式就像通过调用 URI(String) 构造函数一样；捕获由构造函数引发的所有 URISyntaxException ，并将其包装在新的 IllegalArgumentException 对象中，然后将其引发。

trans-unit.source: This convenience factory method works as if by invoking the URI(String) constructor; any URISyntaxException thrown by the constructor is caught and wrapped in a new IllegalArgumentException object, which is then thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此便捷工厂方法的工作方式就像通过调用 URI(String) 构造函数一样；捕获由构造函数引发的所有 URISyntaxException ，并将其包装在新的 IllegalArgumentException 对象中，然后将其引发。

trans-unit.source: This convenience method calls the static method.
trans-unit.target: 这个方便方法调用静态方法。

trans-unit.source: This convenience method is equivalent to:
trans-unit.target: 这种方便法相当于。

trans-unit.source: This convenience method simply locates the extension class loader, call it extClassLoader, and then returns
trans-unit.target: 此便捷方法只是找到扩展类加载器，将其 extClassLoader ，然后返回

trans-unit.source: This convenience method works as if by invoking createVirtualMachine(Connection, Process) method and specifying null as the process argument.
trans-unit.target: 此便捷方法的工作方式就像通过调用 createVirtualMachine(Connection, Process) 方法并指定 null 作为 process 参数一样。

trans-unit.source: This convenience method works as if by invoking startListening(null).
trans-unit.target: 此便捷方法的工作方式就像通过调用 startListening(null) 一样。

trans-unit.source: This convenience method works as if by invoking the open() method, invoking the connect method upon the resulting socket channel, passing it remote, and then returning that channel.
trans-unit.target: 此便捷方法的工作方式就像通过调用 open() 方法，在生成的套接字通道上调用 connect 方法，将其传递给 remote ，然后返回该通道一样。

trans-unit.source: This convenience method works as if by invoking the open() method, invoking the connect method upon the resulting socket channel, passing it remote, and then returning that channel.
trans-unit.target: 此便捷方法的工作方式就像通过调用 open() 方法，在生成的套接字通道上调用 connect 方法，将其传递给 remote ，然后返回该通道一样。

trans-unit.source: This convenience method works as if by invoking the two-argument counterpart as follows:
trans-unit.target: 这个方便方法的工作原理就像调用两个参数对应的方法一样,如下所示。

trans-unit.source: This convenience method works as if by invoking:
trans-unit.target: 这个方便方法的工作原理就像调用。

trans-unit.source: This convenience method works as if invoking it were equivalent to evaluating the expression resolve(URI.create(str)).
trans-unit.target: 这种便利方法的工作方式，如果调用它分别相当于计算表达式 resolve (URI. create (str)) 。

trans-unit.source: This convenience method works as if invoking it were equivalent to evaluating the expression resolve(URI.create(str)).
trans-unit.target: 这种便利方法的工作方式，如果调用它分别相当于计算表达式 resolve (URI. create (str)) 。

trans-unit.source: This convenience method works as if invoking it were equivalent to evaluating the expression new URL(this.toString()) after first checking that this URI is absolute.
trans-unit.target: 此便捷方法的工作方式类似于调用它等效于在首先检查此URI是绝对值之后评估表达式 new URL(this.toString()) 。

trans-unit.source: This convention does not apply to the unnamed package, whose associated preference node is <unnamed>. This node is not intended for long term use, but for convenience in the early development of programs that do not yet belong to a package, and for "throwaway" programs.
trans-unit.target: 此约定不适用于未命名的程序包，其关联的首选项节点为 <unnamed> 。该节点不打算长期使用，而是为了方便早期开发尚不属于程序包的程序以及“废弃”程序。

trans-unit.source: This conversion may be applied to char and Character. It may also be applied to the types byte, Byte, short, and Short, int and Integer when Character.isValidCodePoint(int) returns true. If it returns false then an IllegalFormatCodePointException will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此转换可以应用于 char 和 Character 。当 Character.isValidCodePoint(int) 返回 true 时，它也可以应用于类型 byte ， Byte ， short 和 Short ， int 和 Integer 。如果返回 false ,则将抛出 IllegalFormatCodePointException 。

trans-unit.source: This conversion may be applied to char and Character. It may also be applied to the types byte, Byte, short, and Short, int and Integer when Character.isValidCodePoint(int) returns true. If it returns false then an IllegalFormatCodePointException will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此转换可以应用于 char 和 Character 。当 Character.isValidCodePoint(int) 返回 true 时，它也可以应用于类型 byte ， Byte ， short 和 Short ， int 和 Integer 。如果返回 false ,则将抛出 IllegalFormatCodePointException 。

trans-unit.source: This conversion may be applied to long, Long, Calendar, Date and TemporalAccessor
trans-unit.target: 此转换可应用于 long ， Long ， Calendar ， Date 和 TemporalAccessor

trans-unit.source: This copies attribute's value and object's value are equal.
trans-unit.target: 这将复制属性的值和 object 的值相等。

trans-unit.source: This copies supported attribute's members and object's members are the same.
trans-unit.target: 此副本支持的属性的成员和 object 的成员相同。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to CIM Associators and AssociatorNames operations.
trans-unit.target: 这与CIM Associators和AssociatorNames操作相对应。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the size parameter to the Font constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这对应于 Font 构造函数的 size 参数。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the CIM "References" and "ReferenceNames" operations.
trans-unit.target: 这与CIM的 "References "和 "ReferenceNames "操作相对应。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the definition of "error" in section 1.2 of the W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation. For example, a validating parser would use this callback to report the violation of a validity constraint. The default behaviour is to take no action.
trans-unit.target: 这与 W3C XML 1.0 建议书第 1.2 节中的 "错误 "定义相对应。例如,一个验证解析器会使用这个回调来报告违反有效性约束的情况。默认的行为是不采取任何行动。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the definition of "fatal error" in section 1.2 of the W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation. For example, a parser would use this callback to report the violation of a well-formedness constraint.
trans-unit.target: 这与 W3C XML 1.0 建议书第 1.2 节中 "致命错误 "的定义相对应。例如,一个解析器将使用这个回调来报告违反良好格式性约束的情况。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the transform passed to Font.deriveFont(AffineTransform). Since that transform is mutable and TextAttribute values must not be, the TransformAttribute wrapper class is used.
trans-unit.target: 这对应于传递给 Font.deriveFont(AffineTransform) 的转换。由于该转换是可变的，而 TextAttribute 值一定不能，因此使用 TransformAttribute 包装器类。

trans-unit.source: This could include setting a security provider or defining the location of the system-wide security policy. Malicious code that has permission to set a new security provider may set a rogue provider that steals confidential information such as cryptographic private keys. In addition, malicious code with permission to set the location of the system-wide security policy may point it to a security policy that grants the attacker all the necessary permissions it requires to successfully mount an attack on the system.
trans-unit.target: 这可能包括设置安全提供者或定义全系统安全策略的位置。有权限设置新的安全提供者的恶意代码可能会设置一个盗取机密信息(如加密私钥)的流氓提供者。此外,拥有设置全系统安全策略位置权限的恶意代码可能会将其指向一个安全策略,该策略授予攻击者成功对系统发动攻击所需的所有必要权限。

trans-unit.source: This could print sensitive information to a printer, or simply waste paper.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会将敏感信息打印到打印机上,或者干脆浪费纸张。

trans-unit.source: This counts the AM/PM within the day, from 0 (AM) to 1 (PM). This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 该字段计算一天内的上午/下午,从0(上午)到1(下午)。该字段对所有日历系统具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: This counts the hour within the AM/PM, from 0 to 11. This is the hour that would be observed on a standard 12-hour digital clock. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 在AM/PM范围内计算小时,从0到11。这是标准12小时数字钟上的小时。该字段对所有日历系统具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: This counts the hour within the AM/PM, from 1 to 12. This is the hour that would be observed on a standard 12-hour analog wall clock. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 这是在AM/PM范围内计算小时,从1到12。这是在标准的12小时模拟挂钟上观察到的小时。该字段对所有日历系统具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: This counts the hour within the AM/PM, from 1 to 24. This is the hour that would be observed on a 24-hour analog wall clock. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 这是在AM/PM范围内的小时数,从1到24。这是24小时模拟挂钟上的小时。该字段对所有日历系统具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: This counts the hour within the day, from 0 to 23. This is the hour that would be observed on a standard 24-hour digital clock. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 这是在一天中计算的小时,从0到23。这是标准24小时数字钟上的小时。该字段对所有日历系统具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: This counts the hour within the day, from 1 to 24. This is the hour that would be observed on a 24-hour analog wall clock. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 这是在一天中计算小时,从1到24。这是24小时模拟挂钟上的小时。该字段对所有日历系统具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: This counts the microsecond within the day, from 0 to (24 * 60 * 60 * 1,000,000) - 1. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段对所有日历系统都有相同的意义,从0到(24*60*60*1,000,000)-1,计算一天中的微秒。

trans-unit.source: This counts the microsecond within the second, from 0 to 999,999. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 该字段对一秒内的微秒进行计数,从0到999,999。该字段对所有日历系统具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: This counts the millisecond within the day, from 0 to (24 * 60 * 60 * 1,000) - 1. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
This counts the millisecond within the second, from 0 to 999. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 这是在一秒内计算毫秒,从0到999。该字段对所有日历系统具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: This counts the minute within the day, from 0 to (24 * 60) - 1. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段对所有日历系统都有相同的意义。

trans-unit.source: This counts the minute within the hour, from 0 to 59. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 此处计算的是小时内的分钟,从0到59。该字段对所有日历系统具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: This counts the nanosecond within the day, from 0 to (24 * 60 * 60 * 1,000,000,000) - 1. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
This counts the nanosecond within the second, from 0 to 999,999,999. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 该字段对一秒内的纳秒进行计数,从0到999,999,999。该字段对所有日历系统具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: This counts the second within the day, from 0 to (24 * 60 * 60) - 1. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 该字段对所有日历系统具有相同的意义。

trans-unit.source: This counts the second within the minute, from 0 to 59. This field has the same meaning for all calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 在一分钟内计算秒数,从0到59。该字段对所有日历系统具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: This creates a local date based on the specified instant. First, the offset from UTC/Greenwich is obtained using the zone ID and instant, which is simple as there is only one valid offset for each instant. Then, the instant and offset are used to calculate the local date.
trans-unit.target: 这将根据指定的瞬间创建一个本地日期。首先,使用区域 ID 和即时信息获取UTC/格林威治的偏移量,这很简单,因为每个即时信息只有一个有效的偏移量。然后,使用瞬间和偏移量来计算本地日期。

trans-unit.source: This creates a local date-time based on the specified instant. First, the offset from UTC/Greenwich is obtained using the zone ID and instant, which is simple as there is only one valid offset for each instant. Then, the instant and offset are used to calculate the local date-time.
trans-unit.target: 这将根据指定的瞬间创建一个本地的日期-时间。首先,使用区域 ID 和即时信息获取UTC/格林威治的偏移量,这很简单,因为每个即时信息只有一个有效的偏移量。然后,使用瞬间和偏移量来计算当地的日期-时间。

trans-unit.source: This creates a local time based on the specified instant. First, the offset from UTC/Greenwich is obtained using the zone ID and instant, which is simple as there is only one valid offset for each instant. Then, the instant and offset are used to calculate the local time.
trans-unit.target: 这将根据指定的瞬间创建一个本地时间。首先,使用区域 ID 和即时时获得与 UTC/Greenwich 的偏移量,这很简单,因为每个即时时只有一个有效的偏移量。然后,使用即时时间和偏移量来计算当地时间。

trans-unit.source: This creates a new SinglePixelPackedSampleModel with a subset of the bands of this SinglePixelPackedSampleModel.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个新的SinglePixelPackedSampleModel,其中包含该SinglePixelPackedSampleModel的子集带。

trans-unit.source: This creates a new SinglePixelPackedSampleModel with a subset of the bands of this SinglePixelPackedSampleModel. The new SinglePixelPackedSampleModel can be used with any DataBuffer that the existing SinglePixelPackedSampleModel can be used with. The new SinglePixelPackedSampleModel/DataBuffer combination will represent an image with a subset of the bands of the original SinglePixelPackedSampleModel/DataBuffer combination.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个新的SinglePixelPackedSampleModel,其中包含该SinglePixelPackedSampleModel的子集带。新的SinglePixelPackedSampleModel可以与现有SinglePixelPackedSampleModel可以使用的任何DataBuffer一起使用。新的SinglePixelPackedSampleModel/DataBuffer组合将用原始SinglePixelPackedSampleModel/DataBuffer组合的子集带表示图像。

trans-unit.source: This creates a progress monitor to monitor the progress of reading the input stream. If it's taking a while, a ProgressDialog will be popped up to inform the user. If the user hits the Cancel button an InterruptedIOException will be thrown on the next read. All the right cleanup is done when the stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个进度监控器来监控读取输入流的进度。如果耗时较长,将弹出一个ProgressDialog来通知用户。如果用户点击 "取消 "按钮,在下一次读取时将会抛出一个中断IOException。当流关闭时,所有正确的清理工作都会完成。

trans-unit.source: This creates a zoned date-time based on the specified temporal. A TemporalAccessor represents an arbitrary set of date and time information, which this factory converts to an instance of ChronoZonedDateTime.
trans-unit.target: 这将基于指定的时间创建分区的日期时间。甲 TemporalAccessor 表示任意组的日期和时间信息，其中该工厂转换到的一个实例 ChronoZonedDateTime 。

trans-unit.source: This creates a zoned date-time by combining the LocalDateTime and ZoneOffset. This combination uniquely specifies an instant without ambiguity.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个分区的日期-时间 combining 的 LocalDateTime 和 ZoneOffset 。这种组合唯一地指定了一个瞬间，没有歧义。

trans-unit.source: This creates a zoned date-time by combining the LocalDateTime and ZoneOffset. This combination uniquely specifies an instant without ambiguity.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个分区的日期-时间 combining 的 LocalDateTime 和 ZoneOffset 。这种组合唯一地指定了一个瞬间，没有歧义。

trans-unit.source: This creates a zoned date-time ensuring that the offset is valid for the local date-time according to the rules of the specified zone. If the offset is invalid, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个分区的日期-时间,确保偏移量根据指定区域的规则对本地日期-时间有效。如果偏移量无效,将产生一个异常。

trans-unit.source: This creates a zoned date-time matching the input local date and time as closely as possible. Time-zone rules, such as daylight savings, mean that not every local date-time is valid for the specified zone, thus the local date-time may be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个与输入的本地日期和时间尽可能匹配的分区日期时间。时区规则(如夏令时)意味着并非每个本地日期时间都适用于指定区域,因此本地日期时间可能会被调整。

trans-unit.source: This creates a zoned date-time matching the input local date-time as closely as possible. Time-zone rules, such as daylight savings, mean that not every local date-time is valid for the specified zone, thus the local date-time may be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个与输入的本地日期时间尽可能匹配的分区日期时间。时区规则,如夏令时,意味着并非每个本地日期时间都适用于指定的区域,因此本地日期时间可能会被调整。

trans-unit.source: This creates a zoned date-time matching the local date-time of the seven specified fields as closely as possible. Time-zone rules, such as daylight savings, mean that not every local date-time is valid for the specified zone, thus the local date-time may be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个与七个指定字段的本地日期时间尽可能匹配的分区日期时间。时区规则(如夏令时)意味着并非每个本地日期时间都适用于指定区域,因此本地日期时间可能会被调整。

trans-unit.source: This creates a zoned date-time with the same instant as that specified. Calling ChronoZonedDateTime.toInstant() will return an instant equal to the one used here.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个与指定日期相同时间的分区日期时间。调用 ChronoZonedDateTime.toInstant() 将返回一个等于此处所用时刻的时刻。

trans-unit.source: This creates a zoned date-time with the same instant as that specified. Calling ChronoZonedDateTime.toInstant() will return an instant equal to the one used here.

trans-unit.source: This creates an instance based on years, months and days.

trans-unit.source: This creates an offset date-time using the local date-time and offset. The zone ID is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 这将使用本地日期时间和偏移量创建一个偏移的日期时间。区段 ID 将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This creates an offset date-time with the same instant as that specified. Finding the offset from UTC/Greenwich is simple as there is only one valid offset for each instant.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个与指定瞬间相同的偏移日期-时间。寻找UTC/格林威治的偏移很简单,因为每个瞬间只有一个有效的偏移。

trans-unit.source: This creates an offset date-time with the specified local date-time and offset.

trans-unit.source: This creates an offset time with the four specified fields.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个带有四个指定字段的偏移时间。

trans-unit.source: This creates an offset time with the same instant as that specified. Finding the offset from UTC/Greenwich is simple as there is only one valid offset for each instant.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个与指定瞬间相同的偏移时间。找出UTC/格林威治的偏移时间很简单,因为每个瞬间只有一个有效的偏移时间。

trans-unit.source: This creates the simplest possible ZonedDateTime using the offset as the zone ID.
trans-unit.target: 使用偏移量作为区域ID，这将创建最简单的 ZonedDateTime 。

trans-unit.source: This date operates using one of several variants of the Hijrah calendar.

trans-unit.source: This date operates using the Japanese Imperial calendar. This calendar system is primarily used in Japan.

trans-unit.source: This date operates using the Minguo calendar. This calendar system is primarily used in the Republic of China, often known as Taiwan. Dates are aligned such that 0001-01-01 (Minguo) is 1912-01-01 (ISO).
trans-unit.target: 该日期使用Minguo日历运行。此日历系统主要在中华民国（通常称为台湾）中使用。对齐日期以使 0001-01-01 (Minguo) 1912-01-01 (ISO) ）为1912-01-01（ISO）。

trans-unit.source: This date operates using the Thai Buddhist calendar. This calendar system is primarily used in Thailand. Dates are aligned such that 2484-01-01 (Buddhist) is 1941-01-01 (ISO).
trans-unit.target: 该日期使用泰国佛教日历运行。该日历系统主要在泰国使用。对齐日期以使 2484-01-01 (Buddhist) 为 1941-01-01 (ISO) 。

trans-unit.source: This default handling mechanism is disabled when a custom cursor is set by the setCursor(java.awt.Cursor) method. Alternatively, you can provide custom cursor behavior by providing custom implementations of the DragSource and the DragSourceContext classes.

trans-unit.source: This default implementation of the initialize method assumes all state held in objects of this type is exposed via the matching pairs of "setter" and "getter" methods in the order they are returned by the Introspector. If a property descriptor defines a "transient" attribute with a value equal to Boolean.TRUE the property is ignored by this default implementation. Note that this use of the word "transient" is quite independent of the field modifier that is used by the ObjectOutputStream.
trans-unit.target: 默认方法是 initialize 方法的默认实现，假定此类型的对象中保留的所有状态都是通过Introspector返回的匹配对“ setter”和“ getter”方法对公开的。如果属性描述符定义的“瞬态”属性的值等于 Boolean.TRUE ，则此默认实现将忽略该属性。请注意，单词“ transient”的这种使用与 ObjectOutputStream 所使用的field修饰符完全无关。

trans-unit.source: This deprecated class is maintained for compatibility. In previous versions of JMX, there was one DefaultLoaderRepository shared by all MBean servers. As of JMX 1.2, that functionality is approximated by using MBeanServerFactory.findMBeanServer(java.lang.String) to find all known MBean servers, and consulting the ClassLoaderRepository of each one. It is strongly recommended that code referencing DefaultLoaderRepository be rewritten.
trans-unit.target: 维护此不推荐使用的类是为了兼容性。在以前的JMX版本中，所有MBean服务器都共享一个 DefaultLoaderRepository 。从JMX 1.2开始，使用 MBeanServerFactory.findMBeanServer(java.lang.String) 来查找所有已知的MBean服务器，并查询每一个的 ClassLoaderRepository 来近似使用该功能。强烈建议重写引用 DefaultLoaderRepository 的代码。

trans-unit.target: 维护此不推荐使用的类是为了兼容性。在以前的JMX版本中，所有MBean服务器都共享一个 DefaultLoaderRepository 。从JMX 1.2开始，使用 MBeanServerFactory.findMBeanServer(java.lang.String) 来查找所有已知的MBean服务器，并查询每一个的 ClassLoaderRepository 来近似使用该功能。强烈建议重写引用 DefaultLoaderRepository 的代码。

trans-unit.source: This describes the interface to Characters events.
trans-unit.target: 这描述了字符事件的接口。

trans-unit.source: This describes the interface to Characters events. All text events get reported as Characters events. Content, CData and whitespace are all reported as Characters events. IgnorableWhitespace, in most cases, will be set to false unless an element declaration of element content is present for the current element.
trans-unit.target: 这描述了字符事件的接口。所有的文本事件都会被报告为Character事件。Content、CData和whitespace都被报告为Characters事件。IgnorableWhitespace,在大多数情况下,将被设置为false,除非当前元素存在元素内容声明。

trans-unit.source: This design can be improved by noticing that in the recursive case, the task has nothing to do after forking its right task, so can directly invoke its left task before returning. (This is an analog of tail recursion removal.) Also, because the task returns upon executing its left task (rather than falling through to invoke tryComplete) the pending count is set to one:
trans-unit.target: 可以注意到在递归情况下，该任务在派生其右任务后无需执行任何操作，因此可以在返回之前直接调用其左任务，从而改进此设计。（这类似于尾部递归移除。）而且，由于任务是在执行其左任务时返回的（而不是掉下来调用 tryComplete ），因此未决计数设置为1：

trans-unit.source: This design can be improved by noticing that in the recursive case, the task has nothing to do after forking its right task, so can directly invoke its left task before returning. (This is an analog of tail recursion removal.) Also, when the last action in a task is to fork or invoke a subtask (a "tail call"), the call to tryComplete() can be optimized away, at the cost of making the pending count look "off by one".
trans-unit.target: 可以注意到在递归情况下，该任务在派生其右任务后无需执行任何操作，因此可以在返回之前直接调用其左任务，从而改进此设计。（这是尾部递归移除的一个模拟。）此外，当任务中的最后一个动作是派生或调用子任务时（“尾部调用”），可以优化对 tryComplete() 的调用，但这样做的代价是使待处理的计数看起来“一减”。

trans-unit.source: This determines the amount of the progress bar that should be filled based on the percent done gathered from the model.
trans-unit.target: 这决定了应该根据从模型中收集的完成百分比来填充进度条的数量。

trans-unit.source: This determines the amount of the progress bar that should be filled based on the percent done gathered from the model. This is a common operation so it was abstracted out. It assumes that your progress bar is linear. That is, if you are making a circular progress indicator, you will want to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 这是根据从模型中收集到的完成百分比来决定应该填充进度条的数量。这是一个常见的操作,所以它被抽象出来了。它假设你的进度条是线性的。也就是说,如果你正在制作一个圆形的进度指示器,你会想要覆盖这个方法。

trans-unit.source: This determines the value passed to the Bidi constructor to select the primary direction of the text in the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 这将确定传递给 Bidi 构造函数的值，以选择段落中文本的主要方向。

trans-unit.source: This determines whether the temporal accessor supports this field. If this returns false, then the temporal cannot be queried for this field.
trans-unit.target: 这决定了temporal访问器是否支持这个字段。如果返回false,那么就不能查询这个字段的temporal。

trans-unit.source: This disables the lookup of services implemented by the provider. They are no longer accessible due to removal of the properties specifying their names and locations. This may change the behavior or disable execution of other parts of the program that would normally utilize the Provider, as described under the "removeProvider.{provider name}" permission.
trans-unit.target: 这将禁用由提供者实施的服务的查询。由于删除了指定其名称和位置的属性,它们不再被访问。这可能会改变程序中通常会使用提供者的其他部分的行为或使其无法执行,如 "removeProvider.{provider name}"权限中所述。

trans-unit.source: This disables the lookup of services implemented by the provider. This may thus change the behavior or disable execution of other parts of the program that would normally utilize the Provider, as described under the "removeProvider.{provider name}" permission.

trans-unit.source: This doc's print data representation object is obtained, then an input stream for reading the print data from the print data representation object as a stream of bytes is created and returned. However, if the print data representation object is itself an input stream, then the print data representation object is simply returned.
trans-unit.target: 获得本文档的打印数据表示对象后,将创建并返回一个输入流,用于从打印数据表示对象中读取作为字节流的打印数据。但是,如果打印数据表示对象本身就是一个输入流,那么就会简单地返回打印数据表示对象。

trans-unit.source: This document supports incremental loading. The TokenThreshold property controls how much of the parse is buffered before trying to update the element structure of the document. This property is set by the EditorKit so that subclasses can disable it.

trans-unit.source: This edit class works by asking an object to store it's state in Hashtables before and after editing occurs. Upon undo or redo the object is told to restore it's state from these Hashtables.
