trans-unit.source: This entry grants any code running as both "duke" and "0" permission to read and write files in duke's home directory, as well as permission to make socket connections to "duke.com".
trans-unit.target: 该条目授予任何以 "duke "和 "0 "身份运行的代码读写duke主目录中的文件的权限,以及与 "duke.com "进行套接字连接的权限。

trans-unit.source: This entry represents a single LoginModule entry configured for the application specified in the getAppConfigurationEntry(String appName) method from the Configuration class.
trans-unit.target: 此项代表为 Configuration 类的 getAppConfigurationEntry(String appName) 方法中指定的应用程序配置的单个 LoginModule 条目。

trans-unit.source: This enum constant is associated with
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举常量与

trans-unit.source: This enum provides access to the localized textual form of the day-of-week. Some locales also assign different numeric values to the days, declaring Sunday to have the value 1, however this class provides no support for this. See WeekFields for localized week-numbering.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举提供对星期几本地化文本形式的访问。某些语言环境还为日期分配了不同的数值，从而声明星期日为1，但是此类不提供支持。有关本地化的星期编号，请参见 WeekFields 。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides constants of the four Unicode normalization forms that are described in Unicode Standard Annex #15 — Unicode Normalization Forms and two methods to access them.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举提供了Unicode标准附件＃15 — Unicode规范化形式中描述的四种Unicode规范化形式的常量，以及访问它们的两种方法。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides constants of the four Unicode normalization forms that are described in Unicode Standard Annex #15 — Unicode Normalization Forms and two methods to access them.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举提供了Unicode标准附件＃15 — Unicode规范化形式中描述的四种Unicode规范化形式的常量，以及访问它们的两种方法。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides constants to select a filtering mode for locale matching.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举提供了常量来选择locale匹配的过滤模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides constants to select a filtering mode for locale matching. Refer to RFC 4647 Matching of Language Tags for details.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举提供常量以选择用于区域设置匹配的过滤模式。有关详细信息，请参阅RFC 4647语言标记匹配。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides constants to select a filtering mode for locale matching. Refer to RFC 4647 Matching of Language Tags for details.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举提供常量以选择用于区域设置匹配的过滤模式。有关详细信息，请参阅RFC 4647语言标记匹配。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents a common concept that is found in many calendar systems. As such, this enum may be used by any calendar system that has the day-of-week concept defined exactly equivalent to the ISO calendar system.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举代表了许多日历系统中的一个共同概念,因此,这个枚举可以被任何拥有与ISO日历系统完全相同的星期概念的日历系统使用。因此,任何日历系统都可以使用这个枚举,其定义的星期概念与ISO日历系统完全相同。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents a common concept that is found in many calendar systems. As such, this enum may be used by any calendar system that has the month-of-year concept defined exactly equivalent to the ISO-8601 calendar system.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举代表了许多日历系统中的一个共同概念,因此,任何日历系统都可以使用这个枚举,其定义的年月概念与ISO-8601日历系统完全相同。因此,任何日历系统都可以使用这个枚举,其定义的年月概念与ISO-8601日历系统完全相同。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the cause of a FocusEvent- the reason why it occurred.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示 FocusEvent 的原因-发生它的原因。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the cause of a FocusEvent- the reason why it occurred. Possible reasons include mouse events, keyboard focus traversal, window activation. If no cause is provided then the reason is UNKNOWN.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示 FocusEvent 的原因-发生它的原因。可能的原因包括鼠标事件，遍历键盘焦点，窗口激活。如果没有提供原因，则原因为 UNKNOWN 。

trans-unit.source: This environment of an applet represents the document that contains the applet.
trans-unit.target: 小程序的这个环境代表了包含小程序的文档。

trans-unit.source: This error will be thrown in the following situations:
trans-unit.target: 在以下情况下,会出现该错误。

trans-unit.source: This event allows up to three name components for each element:
trans-unit.target: 该事件允许每个元素最多有三个名称组件。

trans-unit.source: This event id indicates that a meaningful action occurred.
trans-unit.target: 这个事件id表示发生了一个有意义的动作。

trans-unit.source: This event id indicates that an item's state changed.
trans-unit.target: 这个事件id表示一个物品的状态发生了变化。

trans-unit.source: This event id indicates that object's text changed.
trans-unit.target: 该事件id表示对象的文字发生了变化。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that a component was added to the container.
trans-unit.target: 该事件表明一个组件被添加到容器中。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that a component was removed from the container.
trans-unit.target: 该事件表明一个组件被从容器中移除。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that an SSL handshake completed on a given SSL connection.
trans-unit.target: 该事件表示在给定的SSL连接上完成了SSL握手。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that an SSL handshake completed on a given SSL connection. All of the core information about that handshake's result is captured through an "SSLSession" object. As a convenience, this event class provides direct access to some important session attributes.
trans-unit.target: 该事件表明在给定的SSL连接上完成了一次SSL握手。所有关于握手结果的核心信息都是通过一个 "SSLSession "对象捕获的。为了方便起见,这个事件类提供了对一些重要会话属性的直接访问。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that the Component is no longer the focus owner.
trans-unit.target: 该事件表明该组件不再是焦点所有者。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that the Component is now the focus owner.
trans-unit.target: 该事件表明该组件现在是焦点所有者。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that the component was made visible.
trans-unit.target: 该事件表明该组件已变得可见。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that the component was rendered invisible.
trans-unit.target: 该事件表明该组件被显示为不可见。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that the component's position changed.
trans-unit.target: 该事件表明组件的位置发生了变化。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that the component's size changed.
trans-unit.target: 该事件表明组件的大小发生了变化。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that the user wants some action to occur.
trans-unit.target: 该事件表示用户希望发生一些操作。

trans-unit.source: This event is always sent. There is no corresponding EventRequest. The enclosing singleton EventSet always has a suspend policy of EventRequest.SUSPEND_NONE.
trans-unit.target: 此事件始终发送。没有相应的 EventRequest 。单封闭 EventSet 这样总是有一个暂停的政策 EventRequest.SUSPEND_NONE 。

trans-unit.source: This event is generated by a Container object (such as a Panel) when the Container is added, removed, moved, or resized, and passed down the hierarchy. It is also generated by a Component object when that object's addNotify, removeNotify, show, or hide method is called. The ANCESTOR_MOVED and ANCESTOR_RESIZED events are dispatched to every HierarchyBoundsListener or HierarchyBoundsAdapter object which registered to receive such events using the Component's addHierarchyBoundsListener method. (HierarchyBoundsAdapter objects implement the HierarchyBoundsListener interface.) The HIERARCHY_CHANGED events are dispatched to every HierarchyListener object which registered to receive such events using the Component's addHierarchyListener method. Each such listener object gets this HierarchyEvent when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 当添加，删除，移动或调整容器的大小并将其向下传递到层次结构时，该事件由容器对象（例如面板）生成。当组件对象的 addNotify ， removeNotify ， show 或 hide 方法被调用时，它也会由该对象生成。该 ANCESTOR_MOVED 和 ANCESTOR_RESIZED 事件被分派到每一个 HierarchyBoundsListener 或 HierarchyBoundsAdapter 注册，以接收使用组件的此类事件对象 addHierarchyBoundsListener 方法。 （ HierarchyBoundsAdapter 对象实现了 HierarchyBoundsListener 接口。）将 HIERARCHY_CHANGED 事件调度到使用该组件的 addHierarchyListener 方法注册为接收此类事件的每个 HierarchyListener 对象。事件发生时，每个此类侦听器对象都会获取此 HierarchyEvent 。

trans-unit.source: This event is propagated to a SSLSessionBindingListener.
trans-unit.target: 该事件被传播到SSLSessionBindingListener。

trans-unit.source: This event is propagated to a SSLSessionBindingListener. When a listener object is bound or unbound to an SSLSession by SSLSession.putValue(String, Object) or SSLSession.removeValue(String), objects which implement the SSLSessionBindingListener will be receive an event of this type. The event's name field is the key in which the listener is being bound or unbound.
trans-unit.target: 此事件传播到SSLSessionBindingListener。当通过 SSLSession.putValue(String, Object) 或 SSLSession.removeValue(String) 将侦听器对象绑定到或未绑定到SSLSession时，实现SSLSessionBindingListener的对象将收到此类型的事件。事件的 name 字段是绑定或取消绑定侦听器的键。

trans-unit.source: This event is propagated to a SSLSessionBindingListener. When a listener object is bound or unbound to an SSLSession by SSLSession.putValue(String, Object) or SSLSession.removeValue(String), objects which implement the SSLSessionBindingListener will be receive an event of this type. The event's name field is the key in which the listener is being bound or unbound.
trans-unit.target: 此事件传播到SSLSessionBindingListener。当通过 SSLSession.putValue(String, Object) 或 SSLSession.removeValue(String) 将侦听器对象绑定到或未绑定到SSLSession时，实现SSLSessionBindingListener的对象将收到此类型的事件。事件的 name 字段是绑定或取消绑定侦听器的键。

trans-unit.source: This event type is used by the BeanContextServiceRevokedListener in order to identify the service being revoked.
trans-unit.target: BeanContextServiceRevokedListener 使用此事件类型来标识要吊销的服务。

trans-unit.source: This event type is used by the BeanContextServicesListener in order to identify the service being registered.
trans-unit.target: 该事件类型由BeanContextServicesListener使用,以便识别正在注册的服务。

trans-unit.source: This example code demonstrates the creation of a GSSCredential implementation for a specific entity, querying of its fields, and its release when it is no longer needed:
trans-unit.target: 这个示例代码演示了为一个特定实体创建一个GSSCredential的实现,查询它的字段,以及当它不再需要时释放它。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a configuration by resolving a module named "myapp" with the configuration for the boot layer as the parent. It then creates a new layer with the modules in this configuration. All modules are defined to the same class loader.
trans-unit.target: 本示例通过将名为“ myapp ”的模块作为启动层的配置作为父级来解析来创建配置。然后，它将使用此配置中的模块创建一个新层。所有模块都定义为相同的类加载器。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a hashtable of numbers. It uses the names of the numbers as keys:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子创建了一个数字的哈希特表。它使用数字的名称作为键。

trans-unit.source: This example creates and uses a date in a named non-ISO calendar system.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子在一个命名的非ISO日历系统中创建和使用一个日期。

trans-unit.source: This example creates and uses a date in a specific ThaiBuddhist calendar system.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子在一个特定的泰国佛教日历系统中创建和使用一个日期。

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates the type-safe way to obtain an empty list:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子说明了获得空列表的类型安全方法。

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates the type-safe way to obtain an empty map:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子说明了获得空地图的类型安全方法。

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates the type-safe way to obtain an empty navigable set:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子说明了获得空可导航集的类型安全方法。

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates the type-safe way to obtain an empty set:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子说明了获得空集的类型安全方法。

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates the type-safe way to obtain an empty sorted set:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子说明了获得空排序集的类型安全方法。

trans-unit.source: This example lists today's date for all of the available calendars.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子列出了所有可用日历的今天的日期。

trans-unit.source: This example lists todays date for all of the available calendars.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子列出了所有可用日历的今日日期。

trans-unit.source: This example provides "com.example.app.MyResources" resource bundle of the French locale. Traditionally resource bundles of all locales are packaged in the same package as the resource bundle base name. When deploying resource bundles in more than one modules and two modules containing a package of the same name, split package, is not supported, resource bundles in each module can be packaged in a different package as shown in this example where this provider packages the resource bundles in per-language package, i.e. com.example.app.fr for French locale.
trans-unit.target: 本示例提供了法语区域设置的“ com.example.app.MyResources ”资源包。传统上，所有语言环境的资源包都与资源包基本名称打包在同一包中。当在多个模块中部署资源包，并且不支持两个包含相同名称的包split package的模块时，可以将每个模块中的资源包打包到一个不同的包中，如本示例所示，其中此提供程序将资源打包捆绑在每种语言包中，即 com.example.app.fr (对于法语语言环境）。

trans-unit.source: This example was produced by running the program:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子是通过运行程序产生的。

trans-unit.source: This example would select the <bar> element in an XML document such as the following:
trans-unit.target: 本示例将在XML文档中选择 <bar> 元素，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: This exception can be thrown by the various operations of VirtualMachine when the operation fails in the target VM. If there is a communication error, a regular IOException will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当目标VM中的操作失败时， VirtualMachine 的各种操作都可能引发此异常。如果出现通信错误，则将抛出常规IOException。

trans-unit.source: This exception can be thrown during any interaction with the InitialContext, not only when the InitialContext is constructed. For example, the implementation of the initial context might lazily retrieve the context only when actual methods are invoked on it. The application should not have any dependency on when the existence of an initial context is determined.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常可以在与InitialContext的任何交互过程中被抛出,而不仅仅是在InitialContext被构造时。例如,初始上下文的实现可能只在实际的方法被调用到它上时才会懒惰地检索上下文。应用程序不应该对初始上下文的存在何时被确定有任何依赖性。

trans-unit.source: This exception does not correspond to a standard SQLState.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常与标准的SQLState不对应。

trans-unit.source: This exception has been retrofitted to conform to the general purpose exception-chaining mechanism. The
trans-unit.target: 这一例外情况已进行了改造,以符合通用例外情况链机制。在此基础上,对这一例外情况进行了改造,以符合通用的例外链机制。

trans-unit.source: This exception includes the text being parsed and the error index.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常包括被解析的文本和错误索引。

trans-unit.source: This exception indicates one of a variety of certificate problems.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常表明了各种证书问题中的一种。

trans-unit.source: This exception indicates that the name being specified does not conform to the naming syntax of a naming system.
trans-unit.target: 这种异常表明,指定的名称不符合命名系统的命名语法。

trans-unit.source: This exception indicates that the name being specified does not conform to the naming syntax of a naming system. This exception is thrown by any of the methods that does name parsing (such as those in Context, DirContext, CompositeName and CompoundName).
trans-unit.target: 此异常表示指定的名称不符合命名系统的命名语法。任何进行名称解析的方法(如 Context、DirContext、CompositeName 和 CompoundName 中的方法)都会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is mainly used by data input streams to signal end of stream. Note that many other input operations return a special value on end of stream rather than throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常主要被数据输入流用来作为流结束的信号。请注意,许多其他的输入操作在流结束时返回一个特殊的值,而不是抛出一个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is no longer thrown
trans-unit.target: 这个异常不再被抛出

trans-unit.source: This exception is not related to the AccessControlException or SecurityException thrown by access controllers or security managers when access to a file is denied.
trans-unit.target: 当拒绝访问文件时，此异常与访问控制器或安全管理器抛出的 AccessControlException 或 SecurityException 不相关。

trans-unit.source: This exception is raised when a role in a relation does not exist, or is not readable, or is not settable.
trans-unit.target: 当一个关系中的角色不存在,或不可读,或不可设置时,就会引发这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is raised when an access is done to the Relation Service and that one is not registered.
trans-unit.target: 当对关系服务进行访问,而这个访问没有注册时,就会产生这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is raised when an invalid Relation Service is provided.
trans-unit.target: 当提供了无效的关系服务时,就会引发这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is raised when relation id provided for a relation is already used.
trans-unit.target: 当为一个关系提供的关系ID已经被使用时,就会引发这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is raised when there is no relation for a given relation id in a Relation Service.
trans-unit.target: 当一个Relationship Service中的给定关系ID没有关系时,就会出现这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is raised when there is no relation type with given name in Relation Service.
trans-unit.target: 当在Relationship Service中没有给定名的关系类型时,就会引发这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is raised when there is no role info with given name in a given relation type.
trans-unit.target: 当给定的关系类型中没有带名字的角色信息时,就会引发这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is raised when, in a role info, its minimum degree is greater than its maximum degree.
trans-unit.target: 当角色信息中的最小度数大于最大度数时,就会出现这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is seen by the execution engine, but not seen by the end user nor through the JShell API.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常被执行引擎看到,但终端用户和JShell API都看不到。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by VirtualMachine.loadAgent or VirtualMachine.loadAgentLibrary, loadAgentPath methods if the agent, or agent library, cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法加载代理或代理库，则 VirtualMachine.loadAgent 或 VirtualMachine.loadAgentLibrary ， loadAgentPath 方法会抛出此异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by VirtualMachine.loadAgent, VirtualMachine.loadAgentLibrary, VirtualMachine.loadAgentPath methods if an agent, or agent library, cannot be initialized. When thrown by VirtualMachine.loadAgentLibrary, or VirtualMachine.loadAgentPath then the exception encapsulates the error returned by the agent's Agent_OnAttach function. This error code can be obtained by invoking the returnValue method.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法初始化代理或代理库，则 VirtualMachine.loadAgent ， VirtualMachine.loadAgentLibrary ， VirtualMachine.loadAgentPath 方法会引发此异常。当由 VirtualMachine.loadAgentLibrary 或 VirtualMachine.loadAgentPath 抛出时，异常封装了代理的 Agent_OnAttach 函数返回的错误。可以通过调用 returnValue 方法获得此错误代码。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by doPrivileged(PrivilegedExceptionAction) and doPrivileged(PrivilegedExceptionAction, AccessControlContext context) to indicate that the action being performed threw a checked exception.
trans-unit.target: doPrivileged(PrivilegedExceptionAction) 和 doPrivileged(PrivilegedExceptionAction, AccessControlContext context) 引发此异常，以指示正在执行的操作引发了已检查的异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by doPrivileged(PrivilegedExceptionAction) and doPrivileged(PrivilegedExceptionAction, AccessControlContext context) to indicate that the action being performed threw a checked exception. The exception thrown by the action can be obtained by calling the getException method. In effect, an PrivilegedActionException is a "wrapper" for an exception thrown by a privileged action.
trans-unit.target: doPrivileged(PrivilegedExceptionAction) 和 doPrivileged(PrivilegedExceptionAction, AccessControlContext context) 引发此异常，以指示正在执行的操作引发了已检查的异常。可以通过调用 getException 方法获得操作引发的异常。实际上， PrivilegedActionException 是特权操作引发的异常的“包装器”。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by LoginModules if authentication failed. For example, a LoginModule throws this exception if the user entered an incorrect password.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，则LoginModules会引发此异常。例如，如果用户输入了错误的密码，则 LoginModule 会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by LoginModules when they determine that a Credential has expired. For example, a LoginModule authenticating a user in its login method may determine that the user's password, although entered correctly, has expired. In this case the LoginModule throws this exception to notify the application. The application can then take the appropriate steps to assist the user in updating the password.
trans-unit.target: LoginModules确定 Credential 已过期时，将抛出此异常。例如，使用 login 方法对用户进行身份验证的 LoginModule 可以确定用户的密码（尽管输入正确）已过期。在这种情况下， LoginModule 抛出此异常以通知应用程序。然后，应用程序可以采取适当的步骤来帮助用户更新密码。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by LoginModules when they determine that an account has expired. For example, a LoginModule, after successfully authenticating a user, may determine that the user's account has expired. In this case the LoginModule throws this exception to notify the application. The application can then take the appropriate steps to notify the user.
trans-unit.target: LoginModules确定帐户已过期时，将引发此异常。例如， LoginModule 在成功验证用户身份之后，可以确定该用户的帐户已过期。在这种情况下， LoginModule 抛出此异常以通知应用程序。然后，应用程序可以采取适当的步骤来通知用户。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by a SASL mechanism implementation to indicate that the SASL exchange has failed due to reasons related to authentication, such as an invalid identity, passphrase, or key.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常是由SASL机制实现抛出的,表示SASL交换由于与身份验证有关的原因而失败,例如无效的身份、口令或密钥。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by credentials implementing the Destroyable interface when the destroy method fails.
trans-unit.target: 当 destroy 方法失败时，实现 Destroyable 接口的凭据将抛出此异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by credentials implementing the Refreshable interface when the refresh method fails.
trans-unit.target: 当 refresh 方法失败时，实现 Refreshable 接口的凭据将引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by methods to indicate that a binding cannot be added because the name is already bound to another object.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常是由方法抛出的,表示不能添加绑定,因为名称已经绑定到另一个对象上了。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by the AccessController to indicate that a requested access (to a critical system resource such as the file system or the network) is denied.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常是由AccessController抛出的,表示请求的访问(对关键系统资源,如文件系统或网络)被拒绝了。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by the RMI runtime when activation fails during a remote call to an activatable object.
trans-unit.target: 当在远程调用可激活对象的过程中激活失败时,RMI运行时就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by various methods in the java.awt.dnd package.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常是由java.awt.dnd包中的各种方法抛出的。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by various methods in the java.awt.dnd package. It is usually thrown to indicate that the target in question is unable to undertake the requested operation that the present time, since the underlying DnD system is not in the appropriate state.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常是由java.awt.dnd包中的各种方法抛出的。它通常被抛出,以表明相关目标无法在当前进行请求的操作,因为底层的DnD系统不在适当的状态。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown if a key in the keystore cannot be recovered.
trans-unit.target: 如果keystore中的密钥不能被恢复,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown if an entry in the keystore cannot be recovered.
trans-unit.target: 如果keystore中的条目不能被恢复,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown if the native CMM returns an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果本机CMM返回一个错误,则会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown to indicate that the operation reached a point in the name where the operation cannot proceed any further.
trans-unit.target: 抛出这个异常是为了表明操作达到了名称中的一个点,操作无法继续进行。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown to indicate that the operation reached a point in the name where the operation cannot proceed any further. When performing an operation on a composite name, a naming service provider may reach a part of the name that does not belong to its namespace. At that point, it can construct a CannotProceedException and then invoke methods provided by javax.naming.spi.NamingManager (such as getContinuationContext()) to locate another provider to continue the operation. If this is not possible, this exception is raised to the caller of the context operation.
trans-unit.target: 抛出这个异常是为了表明操作达到了名称中的某个点,在这个点上,操作无法继续进行。在对复合名称执行操作时,命名服务提供商可能会到达名称中不属于其命名空间的部分。这时,它可以构造一个CannotProceedException,然后调用javax.naming.spi.NamingManager提供的方法(如getContinuationContext())来定位另一个提供商继续操作。如果无法做到这一点,则会向上下文操作的调用者提出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown to indicate that the result being returned or returned so far is partial, and that the operation cannot be completed.
trans-unit.target: 抛出这个异常,表示正在返回的结果或到目前为止返回的结果是部分的,操作无法完成。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown to indicate that the result being returned or returned so far is partial, and that the operation cannot be completed. For example, when listing a context, this exception indicates that returned results only represents some of the bindings in the context.
trans-unit.target: 抛出这个异常,表示正在返回的结果或到目前为止返回的结果是部分的,操作无法完成。例如,当列出上下文时,这个异常表示返回的结果只代表上下文中的部分绑定。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when JarSigner.sign(java.util.zip.ZipFile, java.io.OutputStream) fails.
trans-unit.target: JarSigner.sign(java.util.zip.ZipFile, java.io.OutputStream) 失败时，抛出此异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a Cipher operating in an AEAD mode (such as GCM/CCM) is unable to verify the supplied authentication tag.
trans-unit.target: 当以AEAD模式运行的 Cipher （例如GCM / CCM）无法验证提供的身份验证标签时，将引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a call is received that does not match the available skeleton. It indicates either that the remote method names or signatures in this interface have changed or that the stub class used to make the call and the skeleton receiving the call were not generated by the same version of the stub compiler (rmic).
trans-unit.target: 当收到与可用框架不匹配的呼叫时，抛出此异常。它表明此接口中的远程方法名称或签名已更改，或者用于进行调用的存根类和接收该调用的框架不是由相同版本的存根编译器（ rmic ）生成的。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a call is received that does not match the available skeleton. It indicates either that the remote method names or signatures in this interface have changed or that the stub class used to make the call and the skeleton receiving the call were not generated by the same version of the stub protocol.
trans-unit.target: 当接收到一个与可用骨架不匹配的调用时,就会抛出这个异常。它表明该接口中的远程方法名或签名发生了变化,或者用于进行调用的存根类和接收调用的骨架不是由同一版本的存根协议生成的。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a component of the name cannot be resolved because it is not bound.
trans-unit.target: 当名称的一个组件因为没有绑定而无法解析时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a context implementation does not support the operation being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 当一个上下文实现不支持被调用的操作时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a context implementation does not support the operation being invoked. For example, if a server does not support the Context.bind() method it would throw OperationNotSupportedException when the bind() method is invoked on it.
trans-unit.target: 当一个上下文实现不支持被调用的操作时,就会抛出这个异常。例如,如果一个服务器不支持Context.bind()方法,当在其上调用bind()方法时,就会抛出OperationNotSupportedException。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a loop was detected while attempting to resolve a link, or an implementation specific limit on link counts has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 当在试图解析链接时检测到一个循环,或者达到了链接数的特定实现限制时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a loop was detected will attempting to resolve a link, or an implementation specific limit on link counts has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 当检测到一个循环试图解决一个链接,或者已经达到了链接数量的特定实现限制时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a malformed link was encountered while resolving or constructing a link.
trans-unit.target: 当解析或构建链接时遇到畸形链接时,会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a method does not terminate within the specified time limit.
trans-unit.target: 当一个方法没有在指定的时间限制内终止时,会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a method does not terminate within the specified time limit. This can happen, for example, if the user specifies that the method should take no longer than 10 seconds, and the method fails to complete with 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 当一个方法没有在指定的时间限制内终止时,就会抛出这个异常。例如,如果用户指定该方法的时间不超过10秒,而该方法在10秒内未能完成,就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a method in some ways violates the schema.
trans-unit.target: 当一个方法在某些方面违反了模式时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a method in some ways violates the schema. An example of schema violation is modifying attributes of an object that violates the object's schema definition. Another example is renaming or moving an object to a part of the namespace that violates the namespace's schema definition.
trans-unit.target: 当一个方法在某些方面违反了模式时,就会抛出这个异常。违反模式的一个例子是修改对象的属性,这违反了对象的模式定义。另一个例子是重命名或移动对象到命名空间的一部分,这违反了命名空间的模式定义。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a method produces a result that exceeds a size-related limit.
trans-unit.target: 当一个方法产生的结果超过了与大小相关的限制时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a method produces a result that exceeds a size-related limit. This can happen, for example, if the result contains more objects than the user requested, or when the size of the result exceeds some implementation-specific limit.
trans-unit.target: 当一个方法产生的结果超过了与大小相关的限制时,就会抛出这个异常。例如,如果结果中包含的对象比用户请求的多,或者结果的大小超过了某些特定实现的限制,就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a method terminates abnormally due to a user or system specified limit.
trans-unit.target: 当一个方法由于用户或系统指定的限制而异常终止时,会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a method terminates abnormally due to a user or system specified limit. This is different from a InsufficientResourceException in that LimitExceededException is due to a user/system specified limit. For example, running out of memory to complete the request would be an insufficient resource. The client asking for 10 answers and getting back 11 is a size limit exception.
trans-unit.target: 当一个方法由于用户或系统指定的限制而异常终止时,就会抛出这个异常,它不同于InsufficientResourceException,因为LimitExceededException是由于用户/系统指定的限制。这与InsufficientResourceException不同,LimitExceededException是由于用户/系统指定的限制。例如,完成请求所需的内存耗尽就是资源不足。客户端请求10个答案而得到11个答案是大小限制异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a naming operation proceeds to a point where a context is required to continue the operation, but the resolved object is not a context.
trans-unit.target: 当命名操作进行到一个需要上下文来继续操作的地方,但解析的对象不是上下文时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a naming operation proceeds to a point where a context is required to continue the operation, but the resolved object is not a context. For example, Context.destroy() requires that the named object be a context. If it is not, NotContextException is thrown. Another example is a non-context being encountered during the resolution phase of the Context methods.
trans-unit.target: 当命名操作进行到需要一个上下文来继续操作,但解析的对象不是上下文时,就会抛出这个异常。例如,Context.destroy()要求命名对象是一个上下文。如果它不是,就会抛出NotContextException。另一个例子是在Context方法的解析阶段遇到了一个非上下文。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a particular XML mechanism is requested but is not available in the environment.
trans-unit.target: 当请求了一个特定的XML机制,但在环境中不可用时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a particular cryptographic algorithm is requested but is not available in the environment.
trans-unit.target: 当请求使用特定的加密算法但环境中没有可用的加密算法时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a particular padding mechanism is expected for the input data but the data is not padded properly.
trans-unit.target: 当预期输入数据会有特定的填充机制,但数据没有正确填充时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a particular padding mechanism is requested but is not available in the environment.
trans-unit.target: 当要求使用特定的填充机制,但环境中没有可用的填充机制时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a particular security provider is requested but is not available in the environment.
trans-unit.target: 当请求一个特定的安全提供者,但环境中没有可用的安全提供者时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an XML formatted string is being parsed into ModelMBean objects or when XML formatted strings are being created from ModelMBean objects.
trans-unit.target: 当一个XML格式的字符串被解析到ModelMBean对象中,或者当XML格式的字符串被从ModelMBean对象中创建时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an XML formatted string is being parsed into ModelMBean objects or when XML formatted strings are being created from ModelMBean objects. It is also used to wrapper exceptions from XML parsers that may be used.
trans-unit.target: 当一个XML格式的字符串被解析到ModelMBean对象中或当XML格式的字符串被从ModelMBean对象中创建时,就会抛出这个异常。它还用于包装可能使用的XML解析器的异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to add or modify an attribute set that has been specified incompletely or incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: 当试图添加或修改一个已被不完全指定或不正确指定的属性集时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to add or modify an attribute set that has been specified incompletely or incorrectly. This could happen, for example, when attempting to add or modify a binding, or to create a new subcontext without specifying all the mandatory attributes required for creation of the object. Another situation in which this exception is thrown is by specification of incompatible attributes within the same attribute set, or attributes in conflict with that specified by the object's schema.
trans-unit.target: 当试图添加或修改一个已被不完全指定或不正确指定的属性集时,就会抛出这个异常。例如,当试图添加或修改绑定时,或在没有指定创建对象所需的所有强制属性的情况下创建新的子上下文时,就可能发生这种情况。抛出这种异常的另一种情况是在同一属性集中指定了不兼容的属性,或者与对象的模式指定的属性相冲突。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to add to create an attribute with an invalid attribute identifier.
trans-unit.target: 当试图添加创建一个无效属性标识符的属性时,会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to add to create an attribute with an invalid attribute identifier. The validity of an attribute identifier is directory-specific.
trans-unit.target: 当试图添加创建一个属性时,会抛出这个异常,而这个属性的标识符是无效的。属性标识符的有效性与目录有关。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to add, or remove, or modify an attribute, its identifier, or its values that conflicts with the attribute's (schema) definition or the attribute's state.
trans-unit.target: 当试图添加、删除或修改一个属性、它的标识符或它的值与属性的(模式)定义或属性的状态相冲突时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to add, or remove, or modify an attribute, its identifier, or its values that conflicts with the attribute's (schema) definition or the attribute's state. It is thrown in response to DirContext.modifyAttributes(). It contains a list of modifications that have not been performed, in the order that they were supplied to modifyAttributes(). If the list is null, none of the modifications were performed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 当试图添加、删除或修改一个属性、它的标识符或它的值与属性的(模式)定义或属性的状态发生冲突时,就会抛出这个异常。它是在响应DirContext.modifyAttributes()时抛出的。它包含了一个尚未执行的修改列表,按照提供给 modifyAttributes()的顺序。如果该列表为空,则表示没有任何修改被成功执行。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an authentication error occurs while accessing the naming or directory service.
trans-unit.target: 当访问命名或目录服务时发生验证错误时,会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an authentication error occurs while accessing the naming or directory service. An authentication error can happen, for example, when the credentials supplied by the user program are invalid or otherwise fail to authenticate the user to the naming/directory service.
trans-unit.target: 当访问命名或目录服务时发生认证错误时,就会抛出这个异常。例如,当用户程序提供的凭证无效或无法对命名/目录服务进行用户认证时,就会发生认证错误。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an authentication error occurs while accessing the naming or directory service. An authentication error can happen, for example, when the credentials supplied by the user program is invalid or otherwise fails to authenticate the user to the naming/directory service.
trans-unit.target: 当访问命名或目录服务时发生认证错误时,就会抛出这个异常。例如,当用户程序提供的凭证无效或无法对命名/目录服务进行用户认证时,就会发生认证错误。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an error occurs in accessing or processing an ICC_Profile object.
trans-unit.target: 当访问或处理 ICC_Profile 对象时发生错误时，抛出此异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an error occurs in accessing or processing an ICC_Profile object.
trans-unit.target: 当访问或处理ICC_Profile对象时发生错误时,会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an operation attempts to add an attribute that already exists.
trans-unit.target: 当一个操作试图添加一个已经存在的属性时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an output buffer provided by the user is too short to hold the operation result.
trans-unit.target: 当用户提供的输出缓冲区太短,无法容纳操作结果时,就会产生这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when attempting to access an attribute that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 当试图访问一个不存在的属性时,会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when attempting to communicate with a directory or naming service and that service is not available.
trans-unit.target: 当试图与目录或命名服务进行通信而该服务不可用时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when attempting to communicate with a directory or naming service and that service is not available. It might be unavailable for different reasons. For example, the server might be too busy to service the request, or the server might not be registered to service any requests, etc.
trans-unit.target: 当试图与目录或命名服务通信而该服务不可用时,就会抛出这个异常。它可能由于不同的原因而不可用。例如,服务器可能太忙了,无法为请求提供服务,或者服务器可能没有注册,无法为任何请求提供服务,等等。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when attempting to destroy a context that is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 当试图销毁一个不为空的上下文时,会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when attempting to perform an operation for which the client has no permission.
trans-unit.target: 当试图执行一个客户机没有权限的操作时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when attempting to perform an operation for which the client has no permission. The access control/permission model is dictated by the directory/naming server.
trans-unit.target: 当试图执行客户端没有权限的操作时,就会抛出这个异常。访问控制/权限模型是由目录/命名服务器决定的。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when no initial context implementation can be created.
trans-unit.target: 当无法创建初始上下文实现时,会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when no initial context implementation can be created. The policy of how an initial context implementation is selected is described in the documentation of the InitialContext class.
trans-unit.target: 当无法创建初始上下文实现时,会抛出这个异常。如何选择初始上下文实现的策略在InitialContext类的文档中描述。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when resources are not available to complete the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: 当没有资源可用来完成请求的操作时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when resources are not available to complete the requested operation. This might due to a lack of resources on the server or on the client. There are no restrictions to resource types, as different services might make use of different resources. Such restrictions might be due to physical limits and/or administrative quotas. Examples of limited resources are internal buffers, memory, network bandwidth.
trans-unit.target: 当没有资源完成请求的操作时,就会抛出这个异常。这可能是由于服务器上或客户端上缺乏资源。对资源类型没有限制,因为不同的服务可能会使用不同的资源。这种限制可能是由于物理限制和/或管理配额。有限资源的例子有内部缓冲区、内存、网络带宽。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the client is unable to communicate with the directory or naming service.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端无法与目录或命名服务进行通信时,会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the client is unable to communicate with the directory or naming service. The inability to communicate with the service might be a result of many factors, such as network partitioning, hardware or interface problems, failures on either the client or server side. This exception is meant to be used to capture such communication problems.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端无法与目录或命名服务通信时,就会抛出这个异常。无法与服务通信的原因可能有很多,如网络分区、硬件或接口问题、客户端或服务器端的故障等。这个异常是用来捕捉这种通信问题的。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the length of data provided to a block cipher is incorrect, i.e., does not match the block size of the cipher.
trans-unit.target: 当提供给块密码的数据长度不正确,即与密码的块大小不匹配时,会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the naming operation being invoked has been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 当被调用的命名操作被中断时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the naming operation being invoked has been interrupted. For example, an application might interrupt a thread that is performing a search. If the search supports being interrupted, it will throw InterruptedNamingException. Whether an operation is interruptible and when depends on its implementation (as provided by the service providers). Different implementations have different ways of protecting their resources and objects from being damaged due to unexpected interrupts.
trans-unit.target: 当被调用的命名操作被中断时,就会抛出这个异常。例如,应用程序可能会中断一个正在执行搜索的线程,如果搜索支持被中断,它将抛出InterruptedNamingException。如果搜索支持被中断,它将抛出InterruptedNamingException。一个操作是否可中断以及何时中断取决于它的实现(由服务提供者提供)。不同的实现有不同的方式来保护自己的资源和对象不因意外中断而受损。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the particular flavor of authentication requested is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 当请求的特定认证方式不被支持时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the particular flavor of authentication requested is not supported. For example, if the program is attempting to use strong authentication but the directory/naming supports only simple authentication, this exception would be thrown. Identification of a particular flavor of authentication is provider- and server-specific. It may be specified using specific authentication schemes such those identified using SASL, or a generic authentication specifier (such as "simple" and "strong").
trans-unit.target: 当请求的特定认证方式不被支持时,就会抛出这个异常。例如,如果程序试图使用强身份验证,但目录/命名只支持简单身份验证,就会抛出这个异常。识别特定的身份验证风味是提供商和服务器特有的。它可以使用特定的认证方案来指定,例如使用SASL来识别的方案,或者使用通用的认证指定器(例如 "简单 "和 "强")。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the specification of a search filter is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 当搜索过滤器的规格无效时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the specification of a search filter is invalid. The expression of the filter may be invalid, or there may be a problem with one of the parameters passed to the filter.
trans-unit.target: 当搜索过滤器的规格无效时,就会抛出这个异常。过滤器的表达式可能无效,或者传递给过滤器的某个参数有问题。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the specification of the SearchControls for a search operation is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 当搜索操作的SearchControls规格无效时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the specification of the SearchControls for a search operation is invalid. For example, if the scope is set to a value other than OBJECT_SCOPE, ONELEVEL_SCOPE, SUBTREE_SCOPE, this exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当搜索操作的SearchControls的规格无效时,就会抛出这个异常。例如,如果作用域被设置为OBJECT_SCOPE、ONELEVEL_SCOPE、SUBTREE_SCOPE以外的值,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when there is a configuration problem.
trans-unit.target: 当出现配置问题时,会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when there is a configuration problem. This can arise when installation of a provider was not done correctly, or if there are configuration problems with the server, or if configuration information required to access the provider or service is malformed or missing. For example, a request to use SSL as the security protocol when the service provider software was not configured with the SSL component would cause such an exception. Another example is if the provider requires that a URL be specified as one of the environment properties but the client failed to provide it.
trans-unit.target: 当出现配置问题时,会抛出此异常。当没有正确安装提供商,或服务器存在配置问题,或访问提供商或服务所需的配置信息格式错误或丢失时,就会出现这种异常。例如,当服务提供商软件没有配置SSL组件时,要求使用SSL作为安全协议会导致这种异常。另一个例子是,如果提供商要求将 URL 指定为环境属性之一,但客户机未能提供它。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown whenever a GSS-API error occurs, including any mechanism specific error.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生GSS-API错误,包括任何机制特定的错误,都会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown whenever a GSS-API error occurs, including any mechanism specific error. It may contain both the major and the minor GSS-API status codes. Major error codes are those defined at the GSS-API level in this class. Minor error codes are mechanism specific error codes that can provide additional information. The underlying mechanism implementation is responsible for setting appropriate minor status codes when throwing this exception. Aside from delivering the numeric error codes to the caller, this class performs the mapping from their numeric values to textual representations.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生GSS-API错误(包括任何机制特定的错误)时,就会抛出这个异常。它可能包含主要和次要的GSS-API状态代码。主要错误代码是指在该类的GSS-API级别上定义的错误代码。次要错误代码是可以提供额外信息的机制特定错误代码。底层机制实现负责在抛出该异常时设置适当的次要状态码。除了将数字错误代码传递给调用者之外,这个类还执行从它们的数值到文本表示的映射。

trans-unit.source: This exception is to report bad locations within a document model (that is, attempts to reference a location that doesn't exist).
trans-unit.target: 这个例外是为了报告文档模型中的坏位置(即试图引用一个不存在的位置)。

trans-unit.source: This exception is used to describe problems encounter while resolving links.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常用于描述解决链接时遇到的问题。

trans-unit.source: This exception is used to describe problems encounter while resolving links. Addition information is added to the base NamingException for pinpointing the problem with the link.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常用于描述解决链接时遇到的问题。附加信息被添加到基本的NamingException中,以便准确定位链接的问题。

trans-unit.source: This exception is used to describe problems encountered while resolving links.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常用来描述解决链接时遇到的问题。

trans-unit.source: This exception is used to describe problems encountered while resolving links. Additional information is added to the base NamingException for pinpointing the problem with the link.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常用于描述解决链接时遇到的问题。额外的信息被添加到基本的NamingException中,以确定链接的问题。

trans-unit.source: This exception is used to indicate a problems with the configured time-zone rules.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常用来表示配置的时区规则有问题。

trans-unit.source: This exception is used to indicate problems with creating, querying and manipulating date-time objects.
trans-unit.target: 此异常用于指示创建、查询和操作日期-时间对象时出现的问题。

trans-unit.source: This exception may also be thrown when two method handles are composed, and the system detects that their types cannot be matched up correctly. This amounts to an early evaluation of the type mismatch, at method handle construction time, instead of when the mismatched method handle is called.
trans-unit.target: 当两个方法句柄组成后,系统检测到它们的类型不能正确匹配时,也会抛出这个异常。这相当于在方法句柄构造时,而不是在调用不匹配的方法句柄时,提前评估类型不匹配。

trans-unit.source: This exception may be thrown as a result of a timeout when attaching to a target VM, or waiting to accept a connection from a target VM.
trans-unit.target: 当附加到目标虚拟机或等待接受来自目标虚拟机的连接时,可能会由于超时而抛出此异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception may be thrown as a result of an asynchronous close of a Connection while an I/O operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 在进行I / O操作时，由于 Connection 的异步关闭而可能引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception may be thrown by a LoginModule if it determines that authentication is being attempted on a locked account.
trans-unit.target: 如果LoginModule确定一个被锁定的账户正在尝试认证,那么这个异常可能会被抛出。

trans-unit.source: This exception may be thrown by a LoginModule if it is unable to locate a credential necessary to perform authentication.
trans-unit.target: 如果LoginModule无法找到执行身份验证所需的凭证,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception may be thrown by a LoginModule if it is unable to locate an account necessary to perform authentication.
trans-unit.target: 如果LoginModule无法找到执行认证所需的账户,那么这个异常可能会被抛出。

trans-unit.source: This exception may be thrown by methods that have detected concurrent modification of an object when such modification is not permissible.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常可能会被检测到对对象进行并发修改的方法抛出,而这种修改是不允许的。

trans-unit.source: This exception may include information for locating the error in the original XML document, as if it came from a Locator object. Note that although the application will receive a SAXParseException as the argument to the handlers in the ErrorHandler interface, the application is not actually required to throw the exception; instead, it can simply read the information in it and take a different action.
trans-unit.target: 此异常可能包含用于在原始XML文档中定位错误的信息，就好像该错误来自 Locator 对象一样。请注意，尽管应用程序将收到的SAXParseException作为参数的处理程序 ErrorHandler 接口，应用程序实际上是不需要抛出异常;相反，它可以简单地读取其中的信息并采取不同的操作。

trans-unit.source: This exception will be thrown by the FileInputStream, FileOutputStream, and RandomAccessFile constructors when a file with the specified pathname does not exist. It will also be thrown by these constructors if the file does exist but for some reason is inaccessible, for example when an attempt is made to open a read-only file for writing.
trans-unit.target: 当具有指定路径名的文件不存在时， FileInputStream ， FileOutputStream 和 RandomAccessFile 构造函数将抛出此异常。如果该文件确实存在，但由于某种原因而无法访问，例如，当试图打开一个只读文件进行写入时，这些构造方法也会抛出该文件。

trans-unit.source: This exception, designed for use by the JCA/JCE engine classes, is thrown when an invalid parameter is passed to a method.
trans-unit.target: 这个异常是为JCA/JCE引擎类设计的,当一个无效的参数被传递给一个方法时,会被抛出。

trans-unit.source: This factory method is primarily intended for use from applets. Because the resulting Logger is anonymous it can be kept private by the creating class. This removes the need for normal security checks, which in turn allows untrusted applet code to update the control state of the Logger. For example an applet can do a setLevel or an addHandler on an anonymous Logger.
trans-unit.target: 这个工厂方法主要是为了在小程序中使用。由于生成的记录仪是匿名的,因此可以由创建类保持私有。这消除了对正常安全检查的需求,这反过来又允许不受信任的applet代码更新Logger的控制状态。例如,一个小程序可以在匿名的Logger上进行setLevel或addHandler操作。

trans-unit.source: This factory method looks up the resource bundle in the cache for the specified baseName, targetLocale and loader. If the requested resource bundle instance is found in the cache and the time-to-live periods of the instance and all of its parent instances have not expired, the instance is returned to the caller. Otherwise, this factory method proceeds with the loading process below.
trans-unit.target: 此工厂方法在高速缓存中查找指定的 baseName ， targetLocale 和 loader 的资源包。如果在高速缓存中找到了请求的资源包实例，并且该实例及其所有父实例的生存时间尚未到期，则将该实例返回给调用方。否则，此工厂方法将继续下面的加载过程。

trans-unit.source: This factory obtains a range where both the minimum and maximum value may vary.
trans-unit.target: 本厂获得的范围内,最小值和最大值都可能不同。

trans-unit.source: This factory obtains a range where the minimum and maximum values are fixed. For example, the ISO month-of-year always runs from 1 to 12.
trans-unit.target: 这个工厂获得的范围,最小值和最大值是固定的。例如,ISO年月日总是从1到12。

trans-unit.source: This factory obtains a range where the minimum value is fixed and the maximum value may vary. For example, the ISO day-of-month always starts at 1, but ends between 28 and 31.
trans-unit.target: 该工厂获得一个范围,其中最小值是固定的,最大值可能会有所不同。例如,ISO月份日总是从1开始,但在28和31之间结束。

trans-unit.source: This feature controls how a ValidatorHandler introduces namespace bindings that were not present in the original SAX event stream. When this feature is set to true, it must make sure that the user's ContentHandler will see the corresponding xmlns* attribute in the Attributes object of the ContentHandler.startElement(String,String,String,Attributes) callback. Otherwise, xmlns* attributes must not be added to Attributes that's passed to the user-specified ContentHandler.
trans-unit.target: 此功能控制 ValidatorHandler 如何引入原始SAX事件流中不存在的名称空间绑定。当此功能设置为true时，必须确保用户的 ContentHandler 将在 ContentHandler.startElement(String,String,String,Attributes) 回调的 Attributes 对象中看到相应的 xmlns* 属性。否则，不得将 xmlns* 属性添加到传递给用户指定的 ContentHandler 的 Attributes 中。

trans-unit.source: This feature is set to false by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此功能设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: This field allows the day-of-quarter value to be queried and set. The day-of-quarter has values from 1 to 90 in Q1 of a standard year, from 1 to 91 in Q1 of a leap year, from 1 to 91 in Q2 and from 1 to 92 in Q3 and Q4.
trans-unit.target: 该字段可以查询和设置季度日的值,标准年Q1的季度日值为1~90,Q2的季度日值为1~91,Q3和Q4的季度日值为1~92。季度日的值在标准年的第1季度从1到90,在闰年的第1季度从1到91,在第2季度从1到91,在第3和第4季度从1到92。

trans-unit.source: This field allows the quarter-of-year value to be queried and set. The quarter-of-year has values from 1 to 4.
trans-unit.target: 该字段允许查询和设置年限值。季度年值的范围为1至4。

trans-unit.source: This field allows the week of the week-based-year value to be queried and set. The week-of-week-based-year has values from 1 to 52, or 53 if the week-based-year has 53 weeks.
trans-unit.target: 该字段允许查询和设置以周为单位的年值。以周为单位的年的值从1到52,如果以周为单位的年有53周,则为53。

trans-unit.source: This field allows the week-based-year value to be queried and set.
trans-unit.target: 该字段允许查询和设置以周为单位的年份值。

trans-unit.source: This field can be set for an MBeanNotificationInfo, in which case it indicates the Open Type that the user data will have.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 MBeanNotificationInfo 设置此字段，在这种情况下，它指示 user data 将具有的Open Type 。

trans-unit.source: This field can be set for an MBeanNotificationInfo, in which case it indicates the Open Type that the user data will have.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 MBeanNotificationInfo 设置此字段，在这种情况下，它指示 user data 将具有的Open Type 。

trans-unit.source: This field can be used with any calendar system.
trans-unit.target: 此字段可用于任何日历系统。

trans-unit.source: This field duplicates the function of the accessibleAWTFocusHandler field in java.awt.Component.AccessibleAWTComponent, so it has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段与java.awt.Component.AccessibleAWTComponent中的accessableAWTFocusHandler字段的功能重复,所以它已经被废弃。

trans-unit.source: This field hides the EventObject.source field in the parent class to make it non-transient and therefore part of the serialized form.
trans-unit.target: 此字段在父类中隐藏 EventObject.source 字段，以使其非瞬态，因此是序列化表单的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This field hides the EventObject.source field in the parent class to make it non-transient and therefore part of the serialized form.
trans-unit.target: 此字段在父类中隐藏 EventObject.source 字段，以使其非瞬态，因此是序列化表单的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This field holds a gridbag constraints instance containing the default values, so if a component does not have gridbag constraints associated with it, then the component will be assigned a copy of the defaultConstraints.
trans-unit.target: 该字段包含一个包含默认值的gridbag约束实例，因此，如果组件没有与其关联的gridbag约束，则将为该组件分配 defaultConstraints 的副本。

trans-unit.source: This field holds the layout information for the gridbag.
trans-unit.target: 该字段保存了网格袋的布局信息。

trans-unit.source: This field holds the layout information for the gridbag. The information in this field is based on the most recent validation of the gridbag. If layoutInfo is null this indicates that there are no components in the gridbag or if there are components, they have not yet been validated.
trans-unit.target: 此字段保存网格袋的布局信息。该字段中的信息基于对gridbag的最新验证。如果 layoutInfo 为 null ，则表明在网格袋中没有组件，或者如果有组件，则尚未验证它们。

trans-unit.source: This field holds the overrides to the column minimum width.
trans-unit.target: 该字段保留了对列最小宽度的覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This field holds the overrides to the column minimum width. If this field is non-null the values are applied to the gridbag after all of the minimum columns widths have been calculated. If columnWidths has more elements than the number of columns, columns are added to the gridbag to match the number of elements in columnWidth.
trans-unit.target: 该字段将替代值保留为列的最小宽度。如果此字段为非 null ，则在计算所有最小列宽之后，将值应用于gridbag。如果columnWidths的元素数大于列数，则将列添加到Gridbag中以匹配columnWidth中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: This field holds the overrides to the column weights.
trans-unit.target: 该字段保存着对列权重的覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This field holds the overrides to the column weights. If this field is non-null the values are applied to the gridbag after all of the columns weights have been calculated. If columnWeights[i] > weight for column i, then column i is assigned the weight in columnWeights[i]. If columnWeights has more elements than the number of columns, the excess elements are ignored - they do not cause more columns to be created.
trans-unit.target: 该字段保存对列权重的替代。如果此字段为非 null ，则在计算完所有列的权重之后，将值应用于gridbag。如果 columnWeights[i] > 列i的权重，则在 columnWeights[i] 为列i分配权重。如果 columnWeights 的元素数多于列数，则多余的元素将被忽略-它们不会导致创建更多的列。

trans-unit.source: This field holds the overrides to the row minimum heights.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段保留了对行最小高度的覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This field holds the overrides to the row minimum heights. If this field is non-null the values are applied to the gridbag after all of the minimum row heights have been calculated. If rowHeights has more elements than the number of rows, rows are added to the gridbag to match the number of elements in rowHeights.
trans-unit.target: 此字段将替代值保留为行的最小高度。如果此字段为非 null ，则在计算所有最小行高之后，将值应用于gridbag。如果 rowHeights 的元素数多于行数，则将行添加到Gridbag中以匹配 rowHeights 中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: This field holds the overrides to the row weights.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段保存了对行权重的覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This field holds the overrides to the row weights. If this field is non-null the values are applied to the gridbag after all of the rows weights have been calculated. If rowWeights[i] > weight for row i, then row i is assigned the weight in rowWeights[i]. If rowWeights has more elements than the number of rows, the excess elements are ignored - they do not cause more rows to be created.
trans-unit.target: 该字段保存对行权重的替代。如果此字段为非 null ，则在计算所有行权重之后，将值应用于gridbag。如果 rowWeights[i] > 行i的权重，则在 rowWeights[i] 为行i分配权重。如果 rowWeights 的元素数多于行数，则多余的元素将被忽略-它们不会导致创建更多的行。

trans-unit.source: This field is true if there is a security check in progress; false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在进行安全检查，则此字段为 true ;否则为false。否则为 false 。

trans-unit.source: This field is initialized to null. It should not be manipulated directly: it should be accessed and updated using getAltName() and setAltName().
trans-unit.target: 该字段初始化为空。不应直接操作:应使用getAltName()和setAltName()访问和更新。

trans-unit.source: This field is initialized to null. It should not be manipulated directly: it should be accessed and updated using getAltNameCtx() and setAltNameCtx().
trans-unit.target: 该字段初始化为空。不应直接操作:应使用getAltNameCtx()和setAltNameCtx()访问和更新。

trans-unit.source: This field is initialized to null. It should not be manipulated directly: it should be accessed and updated using getEnvironment() and setEnvironment().
trans-unit.target: 这个字段被初始化为null.它不应该被直接操作:应该使用getEnvironment(和setEnvironment()来访问和更新。它不应该被直接操作:应该使用getEnvironment()和setEnvironment()来访问和更新。

trans-unit.source: This field is initialized to null. It should not be manipulated directly: it should be accessed and updated using getRemainingName() and setRemainingName().
trans-unit.target: 该字段初始化为空。不应直接操作:应使用getRemainingName()和setRemainingName()访问和更新。

trans-unit.source: This field is no longer used to reserve arrays and kept for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段不再用于保留数组,保留是为了向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: This field is no longer used to reserve arrays and kept for backward compatibility. Previously, this was the maximum number of grid positions (both horizontal and vertical) that could be laid out by the grid bag layout. Current implementation doesn't impose any limits on the size of a grid.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段不再用于保留数组,保留是为了向后兼容。以前,这是网格袋布局所能布置的最大网格位置数(包括水平和垂直)。当前的实现并没有对网格的大小进行任何限制。

trans-unit.source: This field is obsolete, and its use is discouraged since its specification is incompatible with the 1.4 focus APIs.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段已经过时了,不鼓励使用它,因为它的规范与1.4焦点API不兼容。

trans-unit.source: This field is obsolete, and its use is discouraged since its specification is incompatible with the 1.4 focus APIs. The current FocusManager is no longer a property of the UI. Client code must query for the current FocusManager using KeyboardFocusManager.getCurrentKeyboardFocusManager(). See the Focus Specification for more information.
trans-unit.target: 该字段已过时，并且不鼓励使用该字段，因为其规范与1.4 focus API不兼容。当前的FocusManager不再是UI的属性。客户端代码必须使用 KeyboardFocusManager.getCurrentKeyboardFocusManager() 查询当前的FocusManager 。有关更多信息，请参见焦点规范。

trans-unit.source: This field is obsolete, please use the JScrollPane field instead.
trans-unit.target: 该字段已过时，请改用 JScrollPane 字段。

trans-unit.source: This field is retained for compatibility but should not be referenced.
trans-unit.target: 保留此字段是为了兼容,但不应被引用。

trans-unit.source: This field is set by the setInstanceFollowRedirects method. Its value is returned by the getInstanceFollowRedirects method.
trans-unit.target: 此字段由 setInstanceFollowRedirects 方法设置。其值由 getInstanceFollowRedirects 方法返回。

trans-unit.source: This field is set by the setUseCaches method. Its value is returned by the getUseCaches method.
trans-unit.target: 此字段由 setUseCaches 方法设置。其值由 getUseCaches 方法返回。

trans-unit.source: This field is strictly defined to have the same meaning in all calendar systems. This is necessary to ensure interoperation between calendars.
trans-unit.target: 该字段被严格定义为在所有日历系统中具有相同的含义。这对于确保各日历之间的互操作是必要的。

trans-unit.source: This field is the sequential count of days where 1970-01-01 (ISO) is zero. Note that this uses the
trans-unit.target: 这个字段是1970-01-01(ISO)为零的天数的顺序计数。请注意,这使用的是

trans-unit.source: This field is the sequential count of months where the first month in proleptic-year zero has the value zero. Later months have increasingly larger values. Earlier months have increasingly small values. There are no gaps or breaks in the sequence of months. Note that this uses the
trans-unit.target: 这个字段是按顺序计数的月份,其中临近年零的第一个月的值为零。后面的月份的值越来越大,前面的月份的值越来越小。较早的月份的值越来越小。在月的序列中没有空白或中断。注意,这使用的是

trans-unit.source: This field is unused.
trans-unit.target: 此字段未使用。

trans-unit.source: This field is unused; to get the component with focus use the getComponentWithFocus method.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段是未使用的;要获得有焦点的组件,请使用getComponentWithFocus方法。

trans-unit.source: This field is used by the iterator and list iterator implementation returned by the iterator and listIterator methods. If the value of this field changes unexpectedly, the iterator (or list iterator) will throw a ConcurrentModificationException in response to the next, remove, previous, set or add operations. This provides
trans-unit.target: 该字段由 iterator 和 listIterator 方法返回的迭代器和列表迭代器实现使用。如果此字段的值意外更改，则迭代器（或列表迭代器）将抛出 ConcurrentModificationException ,以响应 next ， remove ， previous ， set 或 add 操作。这提供

trans-unit.source: This field is used to represent the micro-of-day handling any fraction of the second. Implementations of TemporalAccessor should provide a value for this field if they can return a value for SECOND_OF_DAY filling unknown precision with zero.
trans-unit.target: 该字段用于表示秒的任何部分的微处理。如果 TemporalAccessor 的实现可以返回 SECOND_OF_DAY 的值以零填充未知精度，则应为该字段提供一个值。

trans-unit.source: This field is used to represent the micro-of-day handling any fraction of the second. Implementations of TemporalAccessor should provide a value for this field if they can return a value for SECOND_OF_DAY filling unknown precision with zero.
trans-unit.target: 此字段用于表示秒的任何部分的微处理。如果 TemporalAccessor 的实现可以返回 SECOND_OF_DAY 的值以零填充未知精度，则应为该字段提供一个值。

trans-unit.source: This field is used to represent the micro-of-second handling any fraction of the second. Implementations of TemporalAccessor should provide a value for this field if they can return a value for SECOND_OF_MINUTE, SECOND_OF_DAY or INSTANT_SECONDS filling unknown precision with zero.
trans-unit.target: 此字段用于表示微秒的处理秒的任何分数。如果 TemporalAccessor 的实现可以返回 SECOND_OF_MINUTE ， SECOND_OF_DAY 或 INSTANT_SECONDS 的值以零填充未知精度，则应为该字段提供一个值。

trans-unit.source: This field is used to represent the micro-of-second handling any fraction of the second. Implementations of TemporalAccessor should provide a value for this field if they can return a value for SECOND_OF_MINUTE, SECOND_OF_DAY or INSTANT_SECONDS filling unknown precision with zero.

Implementations of TemporalAccessor should provide a value for this field if they can return a value for SECOND_OF_MINUTE, SECOND_OF_DAY or INSTANT_SECONDS filling unknown precision with zero.

trans-unit.target: 此字段用于表示纳秒级处理秒的任何分数。如果 TemporalAccessor 的实现可以返回 SECOND_OF_DAY 的值以零填充未知精度，则应为该字段提供一个值。

trans-unit.target: 此字段用于表示毫微秒的处理秒的任何分数。如果 TemporalAccessor 的实现可以返回 SECOND_OF_MINUTE ， SECOND_OF_DAY 或 INSTANT_SECONDS 的值以零填充未知精度，则应为该字段提供一个值。
