trans-unit.source: This field is used when the component is smaller than its display area.
trans-unit.target: 该字段在组件小于其显示区域时使用。

trans-unit.source: This field is used when the component is smaller than its display area. It determines where, within the display area, to place the component.
trans-unit.target: 该字段在组件小于其显示区域时使用。它决定了组件在显示区域内的位置。

trans-unit.source: This field is used when the component's display area is larger than the component's requested size.
trans-unit.target: 当组件的显示区域大于组件所要求的尺寸时,使用该字段。

trans-unit.source: This field is used when the component's display area is larger than the component's requested size. It determines whether to resize the component, and if so, how.
trans-unit.target: 当组件的显示区域大于组件的要求尺寸时,使用该字段。它决定是否要调整组件的大小,如果要调整,如何调整。

trans-unit.source: This field predates the general-purpose exception chaining facility. The initCause(Throwable) and getCause() methods are now the preferred means of accessing this information.
trans-unit.target: 该字段早于通用异常链接工具。现在， initCause(Throwable) 和 getCause() 方法是访问此信息的首选方法。

trans-unit.source: This field predates the general-purpose exception chaining facility. The Throwable.getCause() method is now the preferred means of obtaining this information.
trans-unit.target: 该字段早于通用异常链接工具。现在， Throwable.getCause() 方法是获取此信息的首选方法。

trans-unit.source: This field predates the general-purpose exception chaining facility. The Throwable.getCause() method is now the preferred means of obtaining this information.
trans-unit.target: 该字段早于通用异常链接工具。现在， Throwable.getCause() 方法是获取此信息的首选方法。

trans-unit.source: This field predates the general-purpose exception chaining facility. The Throwable.getCause() method is now the preferred means of obtaining this information.
trans-unit.target: 该字段早于通用异常链接工具。现在， Throwable.getCause() 方法是获取此信息的首选方法。

trans-unit.source: This field predates the general-purpose exception chaining facility. The Throwable.getCause() method is now the preferred means of obtaining this information.
trans-unit.target: 该字段早于通用异常链接工具。现在， Throwable.getCause() 方法是获取此信息的首选方法。

trans-unit.source: This field predates the general-purpose exception chaining facility. The initCause(Throwable) and getCause() methods are now the preferred means of accessing this information.
trans-unit.target: 该字段早于通用异常链接工具。现在， initCause(Throwable) 和 getCause() 方法是访问此信息的首选方法。

trans-unit.source: This field reflects the correct GMT offset value of the time zone of this Calendar if the TimeZone implementation subclass supports historical GMT offset changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 TimeZone 实现子类支持历史GMT偏移更改，则此字段反映此 Calendar 的时区的正确GMT偏移值。

trans-unit.source: This field reflects the correct daylight saving offset value of the time zone of this Calendar if the TimeZone implementation subclass supports historical Daylight Saving Time schedule changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 TimeZone 实现子类支持历史性的夏时制时间表更改，则此字段反映此 Calendar 的时区的正确的夏时制偏移量值。

trans-unit.source: This field should be true if this node did not exist in the backing store prior to the creation of this object.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建此对象之前此节点在后备存储中不存在，则此字段应为 true 。

trans-unit.source: This field should be true if this node did not exist in the backing store prior to the creation of this object. The field is initialized to false, but may be set to true by a subclass constructor (and should not be modified thereafter). This field indicates whether a node change event should be fired when creation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果此节点在创建此对象之前不存在于后备存储中，则此字段应为 true 。该字段初始化为false，但是可以由子类构造函数设置为true（此后不应修改）。此字段指示创建完成后是否应触发节点更改事件。

trans-unit.source: This field specifies the external padding of the component, the minimum amount of space between the component and the edges of its display area.
trans-unit.target: 该字段指定组件的外部填充,即组件与其显示区域边缘之间的最小空间量。

trans-unit.source: This field specifies the internal padding of the component, how much space to add to the minimum width of the component.
trans-unit.target: 该字段指定组件的内部填充,组件的最小宽度要增加多少空间。

trans-unit.source: This field specifies the internal padding of the component, how much space to add to the minimum width of the component. The width of the component is at least its minimum width plus ipadx pixels.
trans-unit.target: 该字段指定组件的内部填充，要添加多少空间以最小化组件的宽度。组件的宽度至少是其最小宽度加上 ipadx 像素。

trans-unit.source: This field specifies the internal padding, that is, how much space to add to the minimum height of the component.
trans-unit.target: 该字段指定了内部填充,也就是为组件的最小高度添加多少空间。

trans-unit.source: This field specifies the internal padding, that is, how much space to add to the minimum height of the component. The height of the component is at least its minimum height plus ipady pixels.
trans-unit.target: 该字段指定内部填充，即要添加多少空间到组件的最小高度。组件的高度至少是其最小高度加上 ipady 像素。

trans-unit.source: This field was not used in previous releases and there are currently no plans to support it in the future.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段在以前的版本中没有使用,目前没有计划在未来支持它。

trans-unit.source: This file channel
trans-unit.target: 该文件通道

trans-unit.source: This file contains one line for each plugin, for example,
trans-unit.target: 这个文件中,每个插件都包含一行,例如。

trans-unit.source: This file contains the single line:
trans-unit.target: 这个文件包含单行。

trans-unit.source: This file manager creates file objects representing regular files, zip file entries, or entries in similar file system based containers. Any file object returned from a file manager implementing this interface must observe the following behavior:
trans-unit.target: 该文件管理器在常规文件，zip文件条目或基于类似文件系统的容器中的条目中创建代表文件对象。从实现此接口的文件管理器返回的任何文件对象都必须遵守以下行为：

trans-unit.source: This file manager creates file objects representing regular files, zip file entries, or entries in similar file system based containers. Any file object returned from a file manager implementing this interface must observe the following behavior:
trans-unit.target: 该文件管理器在常规文件，zip文件条目或基于类似文件系统的容器中的条目中创建代表文件对象。从实现此接口的文件管理器返回的任何文件对象都必须遵守以下行为：

trans-unit.source: This file was automatically generated by AutoMulti.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件是由AutoMulti自动生成的。

trans-unit.source: This file-locking API is intended to map directly to the native locking facility of the underlying operating system. Thus the locks held on a file should be visible to all programs that have access to the file, regardless of the language in which those programs are written.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件锁定API的目的是直接映射到底层操作系统的本地锁定设施。因此,文件上的锁对所有可以访问该文件的程序都是可见的,无论这些程序是用什么语言编写的。

trans-unit.source: This filter compares the attribute name of the specified attribute change notification with each enabled attribute name. If the attribute name equals one of the enabled attribute names, the notification must be sent to the listener and this method returns true.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器将指定的属性更改通知的属性名称与每个启用的属性名称进行比较。如果属性名称等于已启用的属性名称之一，则必须将通知发送到侦听器，并且此方法返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: This filter compares the type of the specified notification with each enabled type. If the notification type matches one of the enabled types, the notification should be sent to the listener and this method returns true.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器将指定通知的类型与每个启用的类型进行比较。如果通知类型与启用的类型之一匹配，则应将通知发送给侦听器，并且此方法返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: This filter will have no parent: you must assign a parent before you start a parse or do any configuration with setFeature or setProperty, unless you use this as a pure event consumer rather than as an XMLReader.
trans-unit.target: 此过滤器将没有父对象：您必须先分配父对象，然后才能开始解析或使用setFeature或setProperty进行任何配置，除非您将其用作纯事件使用者而不是 XMLReader 。

trans-unit.source: This fine grain notification tells listeners the exact range of cells, rows, or columns that changed.
trans-unit.target: 这种细粒度的通知会告诉听众改变的单元格、行或列的确切范围。

trans-unit.source: This flag bit indicates that the transform defined by this object performs a general scale in addition to the conversions indicated by other flag bits.
trans-unit.target: 此标志位表示该对象所定义的变换除了其他标志位所表示的转换外,还执行一般的比例尺。

trans-unit.source: This flag bit indicates that the transform defined by this object performs a general scale in addition to the conversions indicated by other flag bits. A general scale multiplies the length of vectors by different amounts in the x and y directions without changing the angle between perpendicular vectors. This flag bit is mutually exclusive with the TYPE_UNIFORM_SCALE flag.
trans-unit.target: 该标志位表示该对象所定义的变换除了其他标志位所表示的变换外,还执行了通用比例尺。一般比例尺将向量的长度在x和y方向上乘以不同的数量,而不改变垂直向量之间的角度。这个标志位与TYPE_UNIFORM_SCALE标志是互斥的。

trans-unit.source: This flag bit indicates that the transform defined by this object performs a mirror image flip about some axis which changes the normally right handed coordinate system into a left handed system in addition to the conversions indicated by other flag bits.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志位表示这个对象所定义的变换,除了其他标志位所表示的变换外,还执行了关于某个轴的镜像翻转,将通常的右手坐标系变为左手坐标系。

trans-unit.source: This flag bit indicates that the transform defined by this object performs a mirror image flip about some axis which changes the normally right handed coordinate system into a left handed system in addition to the conversions indicated by other flag bits. A right handed coordinate system is one where the positive X axis rotates counterclockwise to overlay the positive Y axis similar to the direction that the fingers on your right hand curl when you stare end on at your thumb. A left handed coordinate system is one where the positive X axis rotates clockwise to overlay the positive Y axis similar to the direction that the fingers on your left hand curl. There is no mathematical way to determine the angle of the original flipping or mirroring transformation since all angles of flip are identical given an appropriate adjusting rotation.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志位表示这个对象所定义的变换除了其他标志位所表示的变换外,还执行了关于某个轴的镜像翻转,将通常的右手坐标系变为左手坐标系。右手坐标系是指正X轴逆时针旋转覆盖正Y轴的坐标系,类似于当你盯着拇指末端时右手手指弯曲的方向。左手坐标系是指正X轴顺时针旋转覆盖正Y轴,类似于左手手指弯曲的方向。没有数学方法可以确定原始翻转或镜像变换的角度,因为给定适当的调整旋转,所有的翻转角度都是相同的。

trans-unit.source: This flag bit indicates that the transform defined by this object performs a quadrant rotation by some multiple of 90 degrees in addition to the conversions indicated by other flag bits.
trans-unit.target: 该标志位表示该对象所定义的变换除了其他标志位所表示的变换外,还执行了90度的倍数的象限旋转。

trans-unit.source: This flag bit indicates that the transform defined by this object performs a quadrant rotation by some multiple of 90 degrees in addition to the conversions indicated by other flag bits. A rotation changes the angles of vectors by the same amount regardless of the original direction of the vector and without changing the length of the vector. This flag bit is mutually exclusive with the TYPE_GENERAL_ROTATION flag.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志位表示这个对象所定义的变换除了其他标志位所表示的变换外,还执行了90度的某个倍数的象限旋转。旋转使向量的角度发生了相同的变化,不管向量的原始方向如何,也不改变向量的长度。这个标志位与TYPE_GENERAL_ROTATION标志互斥。

trans-unit.source: This flag bit indicates that the transform defined by this object performs a rotation by an arbitrary angle in addition to the conversions indicated by other flag bits.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志位表示除了其他标志位所表示的转换之外,这个对象所定义的变换还执行了一个任意角度的旋转。

trans-unit.source: This flag bit indicates that the transform defined by this object performs a rotation by an arbitrary angle in addition to the conversions indicated by other flag bits. A rotation changes the angles of vectors by the same amount regardless of the original direction of the vector and without changing the length of the vector. This flag bit is mutually exclusive with the TYPE_QUADRANT_ROTATION flag.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志位表示这个对象所定义的变换除了其他标志位所表示的变换外,还执行了一个任意角度的旋转。旋转使向量的角度发生变化,不管向量的原始方向如何,也不改变向量的长度。这个标志位与TYPE_QUADRANT_ROTATION标志是互斥的。

trans-unit.source: This flag bit indicates that the transform defined by this object performs a translation in addition to the conversions indicated by other flag bits.
trans-unit.target: 该标志位表示该对象所定义的变换除了其他标志位所指示的变换外,还执行了变换。

trans-unit.source: This flag bit indicates that the transform defined by this object performs a translation in addition to the conversions indicated by other flag bits. A translation moves the coordinates by a constant amount in x and y without changing the length or angle of vectors.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志位表示这个对象所定义的变换除了其他标志位所表示的变换之外,还执行了一个转换。转换将坐标在x和y上移动一个固定的量,而不改变向量的长度或角度。

trans-unit.source: This flag bit indicates that the transform defined by this object performs a uniform scale in addition to the conversions indicated by other flag bits.
trans-unit.target: 该标志位表示该对象所定义的变换除了其他标志位所表示的变换外,还执行统一的刻度。

trans-unit.source: This flag bit indicates that the transform defined by this object performs a uniform scale in addition to the conversions indicated by other flag bits. A uniform scale multiplies the length of vectors by the same amount in both the x and y directions without changing the angle between vectors. This flag bit is mutually exclusive with the TYPE_GENERAL_SCALE flag.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志位表示除了其他标志位所表示的转换之外,这个对象所定义的变换还执行了统一比例尺。统一比例尺在x和y两个方向上将向量的长度乘以相同的量,而不改变向量之间的角度。这个标志位与TYPE_GENERAL_SCALE标志互斥。

trans-unit.source: This flag corresponds to '#' ('\u0023') in the format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 该标志对应于格式说明符中的 '#' （ '\u0023' ）。

trans-unit.source: This flag corresponds to '-' ('\u002d') in the format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 该标志对应于格式说明符中的 '-' （ '\u002d' ）。

trans-unit.source: This flag corresponds to 'S' ('\u0053') in the format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 该标志对应于格式说明符中的 'S' （ '\u0053' ）。

trans-unit.source: This flag determines whether or not the Parser will be strict in enforcing SGML compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志决定了解析器是否会严格执行SGML兼容性。

trans-unit.source: This flag determines whether or not the Parser will be strict in enforcing SGML compatibility. If false, it will be lenient with certain common classes of erroneous HTML constructs. Strict or not, in either case an error will be recorded.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志决定了解析器是否会严格执行SGML兼容性。如果为假,它将对某些常见的错误的HTML结构类别持宽松态度。严格或不严格,在任何一种情况下都会记录一个错误。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that a static image which was previously drawn is now complete and can be drawn again in its final form.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate的infoflags参数中的这个标志表示之前绘制的静态图像现在已经完成,可以以最终的形式再次绘制。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that a static image which was previously drawn is now complete and can be drawn again in its final form. The x, y, width, and height arguments to the imageUpdate callback method should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate的infoflags参数中的这个标志表示之前绘制的静态图像现在已经完成,可以以最终的形式再次绘制。imageUpdate回调方法的x、y、width和height参数应该被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that an image which was being tracked asynchronously has encountered an error.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate的infoflags参数中的这个标志表示正在异步跟踪的图像遇到了错误。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that an image which was being tracked asynchronously has encountered an error. No further information will become available and drawing the image will fail. As a convenience, the ABORT flag will be indicated at the same time to indicate that the image production was aborted.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate 的 infoflags 参数中的这个标志表示正在异步跟踪的图像遇到了错误。将不会有进一步的信息,绘制图像将失败。为了方便起见,ABORT标志将同时表示图像制作被中止。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that an image which was being tracked asynchronously was aborted before production was complete.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate的infoflags参数中的这个标志表示正在异步跟踪的图像在制作完成之前就被中止了。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that an image which was being tracked asynchronously was aborted before production was complete. No more information will become available without further action to trigger another image production sequence. If the ERROR flag was not also set in this image update, then accessing any of the data in the image will restart the production again, probably from the beginning.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate的infoflags参数中的这个标志表示正在异步跟踪的图像在制作完成前被中止。如果没有进一步的操作来触发另一个图像制作序列,将不会有更多的信息。如果在这次图像更新中没有设置ERROR标志,那么访问图像中的任何数据都将重新开始制作,可能从头开始。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that another complete frame of a multi-frame image which was previously drawn is now available to be drawn again.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate的infoflags参数中的这个标志表示之前绘制的多帧图像的另一个完整帧现在可以被再次绘制。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that another complete frame of a multi-frame image which was previously drawn is now available to be drawn again. The x, y, width, and height arguments to the imageUpdate callback method should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate的infoflags参数中的这个标志表示之前绘制的多帧图像的另一个完整帧现在可以被再次绘制。imageUpdate回调方法的x、y、width和height参数应该被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that more pixels needed for drawing a scaled variation of the image are available.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate的infoflags参数中的这个标志表示绘制图像的缩放变化所需的更多像素是可用的。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that more pixels needed for drawing a scaled variation of the image are available. The bounding box of the new pixels can be taken from the x, y, width, and height arguments to the imageUpdate callback method.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate的infoflags参数中的这个标志表示有更多的像素可以用来绘制图像的缩放变化。新像素的边界框可以从imageUpdate回调方法的x、y、width和height参数中获取。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that the height of the base image is now available and can be taken from the height argument to the imageUpdate callback method.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate的infoflags参数中的这个标志表示现在可以使用基础图像的高度,可以从imageUpdate回调方法的高度参数中获取。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that the properties of the image are now available.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate的infoflags参数中的这个标志表示图像的属性现在可用。

trans-unit.source: This flag in the infoflags argument to imageUpdate indicates that the width of the base image is now available and can be taken from the width argument to the imageUpdate callback method.
trans-unit.target: imageUpdate的infoflags参数中的这个标志表示现在可以使用基础图像的宽度,可以从imageUpdate回调方法的width参数中获取。

trans-unit.source: This flag indicates that the Alt key was down when the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 该标志表示事件发生时Alt键被关闭。

trans-unit.source: This flag indicates that the Alt key was down when the event occurred. For mouse events, this flag indicates that the middle mouse button was pressed or released.
trans-unit.target: 该标志表示事件发生时Alt键被按下。对于鼠标事件,该标志表示鼠标中键被按下或释放。

trans-unit.source: This flag indicates that the Control key was down when the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 该标志表示事件发生时,控制键处于关闭状态。

trans-unit.source: This flag indicates that the Meta key was down when the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 该标志表示事件发生时,Meta键已失效。

trans-unit.source: This flag indicates that the Meta key was down when the event occurred. For mouse events, this flag indicates that the right button was pressed or released.
trans-unit.target: 该标志表示事件发生时,元键是向下的。对于鼠标事件,该标志表示右键被按下或释放。

trans-unit.source: This flag indicates that the Shift key was down when the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 该标志表示事件发生时,Shift键已放下。

trans-unit.source: This flag is used to reset the alreadyNotifieds monitor attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此标志用于重置已经 alreadyNotifieds 监视器属性。

trans-unit.source: This flag is used to reset the alreadyNotifieds monitor attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此标志用于重置已经 alreadyNotifieds 监视器属性。

trans-unit.source: This form of getHeaderField exists because some connection types (e.g., http-ng) have pre-parsed headers. Classes for that connection type can override this method and short-circuit the parsing.
trans-unit.target: 之所以存在这种形式的 getHeaderField ,是因为某些连接类型（例如 http-ng ）具有预先解析的标头。该连接类型的类可以覆盖此方法，并使分析短路。

trans-unit.source: This form of curve is commonly known as a Bézier curve.
trans-unit.target: 这种形式的曲线通常称为贝塞尔曲线。

trans-unit.source: This form of the method acceptChanges is similar to the form that takes no arguments; however, unlike the other form, this form can be used only when the underlying data source is a JDBC data source. The updated Connection properties must be used by the SyncProvider to reset the RowSetWriter configuration to ensure that the contents of the CachedRowSet object are synchronized correctly.
trans-unit.target: 方法 acceptChanges 的这种形式类似于不带参数的形式。但是，与其他形式不同，仅当基础数据源是JDBC数据源时才可以使用此形式。 SyncProvider 必须使用更新的 Connection 属性来重置 RowSetWriter 配置，以确保 CachedRowSet 对象的内容正确同步。

trans-unit.source: This format string is the first argument to the format method. It contains three format specifiers "%1$tm", "%1$te", and "%1$tY" which indicate how the arguments should be processed and where they should be inserted in the text. The remaining portions of the format string are fixed text including "Dukes Birthday: " and any other spaces or punctuation. The argument list consists of all arguments passed to the method after the format string. In the above example, the argument list is of size one and consists of the Calendar object c.
trans-unit.target: 此格式字符串是 format 方法的第一个参数。它包含三个格式说明符“ %1$tm ”，“ %1$te ”和“ %1$tY ”，它们指示应如何处理参数以及将其插入文本的位置。格式字符串的其余部分是固定文本，包括 "Dukes Birthday: " 和任何其他空格或标点符号。参数列表由格式字符串之后传递给方法的所有参数组成。在上面的示例中，参数列表的大小为1，由 Calendar 对象 c 组成。

trans-unit.source: This formats the date-time to a String using the rules of the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 这将使用格式化器的规则将日期-时间格式化为一个字符串。

trans-unit.target: 该格式器

trans-unit.source: This fragment is not technically part of the URL. Rather, it indicates that after the specified resource is retrieved, the application is specifically interested in that part of the document that has the tag chapter1 attached to it. The meaning of a tag is resource specific.
trans-unit.target: 从技术上讲，此片段不是URL的一部分。相反，它表示在检索到指定的资源之后，应用程序对文档的附加有标记 chapter1 那部分特别感兴趣。标签的含义是特定于资源的。

trans-unit.source: This framework allows multiple classes implementing predicates to be used in combination to achieved the required filtering result with out the need for query language processing.
trans-unit.target: 这个框架允许多个实现谓词的类组合使用,以达到所需的过滤结果,而不需要查询语言处理。

trans-unit.source: This function allows the prefix to be specified and the proper resolution to occur. Specifically, when the standard resolution fails, the resolution is retried taking the prefix into consideration. There are two ways that resolution occurs, explicit resolution with the JNI function RegisterNatives and the normal automatic resolution. For RegisterNatives, the JVM will attempt this association:
trans-unit.target: 此功能允许指定前缀并出现适当的分辨率。具体来说，当标准分辨率失败时，将考虑前缀以重试该分辨率。发生解析的方式有两种，使用JNI函数 RegisterNatives 的显式解析和常规自动解析。对于 RegisterNatives ，JVM将尝试以下关联：

trans-unit.source: This function does not cause any initialization except that which would occur under the customary JVM semantics. In other words, redefining a class does not cause its initializers to be run. The values of preexisting static variables will remain as they were prior to the call. However, completely uninitialized (new) static variables will be assigned their default value.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数不会引起任何初始化,除了在习惯的JVM语义下会发生的初始化。换句话说,重新定义一个类不会导致其初始化器被运行。先前存在的静态变量的值将保持在调用之前的状态。然而,完全未初始化的(新)静态变量将被分配其默认值。

This function reruns the transformation process (whether or not a transformation has previously occurred). This retransformation follows these steps:

This function reruns the transformation process (whether or not a transformation has previously occurred). This retransformation follows these steps:

trans-unit.source: This function is called when a mousePressed was detected in the track, not in the thumb.
trans-unit.target: 当轨道中检测到mousePressed,而不是拇指中检测到mousePressed时,该函数被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called when a mousePressed was detected in the track, not in the thumb. The default behavior is to scroll by block. You can override this method to stop it from scrolling or to add additional behavior.
trans-unit.target: 当检测到鼠标被按下时,该函数被调用,而不是在拇指上。默认行为是按块滚动。你可以重写这个方法来停止滚动或添加额外的行为。

trans-unit.source: This function may cause the component's opaque property to change.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可能会导致组件的不透明属性改变。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the collation element that the iterator is currently pointing to and then updates the internal pointer to point to the next element. previous() updates the pointer first and then returns the element. This means that when you change direction while iterating (i.e., call next() and then call previous(), or call previous() and then call next()), you'll get back the same element twice.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回迭代器当前指向的整理元素,然后更新内部指针指向下一个元素,forever()先更新指针,然后返回元素。这意味着当你在迭代时改变方向(即调用next()后再调用forever(),或者调用forever()后再调用next())时,你将两次返回同一个元素。

trans-unit.source: This function updates the iterator's internal pointer to point to the collation element preceding the one it's currently pointing to and then returns that element, while next() returns the current element and then updates the pointer. This means that when you change direction while iterating (i.e., call next() and then call previous(), or call previous() and then call next()), you'll get back the same element twice.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数更新迭代器的内部指针,使其指向当前所指向的元素之前的整理元素,然后返回该元素,而next()则返回当前元素,然后更新指针。这意味着当你在迭代时改变方向(即调用next()后再调用previous(),或者调用previous()后再调用next())时,你将两次得到同一个元素。

trans-unit.source: This gives behavior equivalent to most operating system command interpreters, or the standard C library function system().
trans-unit.target: 这提供了与大多数操作系统命令解释器或标准C库函数 system() 等效的行为。

trans-unit.source: This gives code access to classes in packages to which it normally does not have access and the dynamic proxy class is in the system protection domain. Malicious code may use these classes to help in its attempt to compromise security in the system.
trans-unit.target: 这使得代码可以访问它通常无法访问的包中的类,动态代理类属于系统保护域。恶意代码可能会利用这些类来帮助其试图破坏系统的安全。

trans-unit.source: This gives code access to classes in packages to which it normally does not have access. Malicious code may use these classes to help in its attempt to compromise security in the system.
trans-unit.target: 这使得代码可以访问通常无法访问的包中的类。恶意代码可能会使用这些类来帮助其试图破坏系统的安全。

trans-unit.source: This gives code access to protected, sensitive methods that may disclose information about other classes or the execution stack.
trans-unit.target: 这使得代码可以访问受保护的敏感方法,这些方法可能会泄露其他类或执行栈的信息。

trans-unit.source: This global lock is used by both BeanContext and BeanContextServices implementors to serialize changes in a BeanContext hierarchy and any service requests etc.
trans-unit.target: BeanContext 和 BeanContextServices 实现者都使用此全局锁来序列化 BeanContext 层次结构中的更改以及任何服务请求等。

trans-unit.source: This grants code permission to define a class in a particular package. This is dangerous because malicious code with this permission may define rogue classes in trusted packages like java.security or java.lang, for example.
trans-unit.target: 这将授予代码权限以在特定程序包中定义类。这很危险，因为具有此权限的恶意代码可能会在受信任的程序包（例如 java.security 或 java.lang )中定义流氓类。

trans-unit.source: This grants code permission to query a class for its public, protected, default (package) access, and private fields and/or methods. Although the code would have access to the private and protected field and method names, it would not have access to the private/protected field data and would not be able to invoke any private methods. Nevertheless, malicious code may use this information to better aim an attack. Additionally, it may invoke any public methods and/or access public fields in the class. This could be dangerous if the code would normally not be able to invoke those methods and/or access the fields because it can't cast the object to the class/interface with those methods and fields.
trans-unit.target: 这允许代码查询一个类的公共的、保护的、默认的(包)访问权限,以及私有的字段和/或方法。虽然代码可以访问私有和受保护的字段和方法名称,但它不能访问私有/受保护的字段数据,也不能调用任何私有方法。然而,恶意代码可能会使用这些信息来更好地瞄准攻击。此外,它可能会调用任何公共方法和/或访问类中的公共字段。如果代码通常无法调用这些方法和/或访问字段,因为它无法将对象投向具有这些方法和字段的类/接口,那么这可能是危险的。

trans-unit.source: This grants code with a suitably privileged Lookup object permission to define classes in the same package as the Lookup's lookup class.
trans-unit.target: 这将授予具有适当特权的 Lookup 对象权限的代码，以在与 Lookup 的lookup类相同的程序包中定义类。

trans-unit.source: This grants the permission to access resources in the system modules in the runtime image.
trans-unit.target: 这将授予访问运行时映像中系统模块中资源的权限。

trans-unit.source: This handshake status only applies to DTLS.
trans-unit.target: 这种握手状态只适用于DTLS。

trans-unit.source: This hashtable maintains the association between a component and its gridbag constraints.
trans-unit.target: 这个哈希特表维护了一个组件和它的网格袋约束之间的关联。

trans-unit.source: This hashtable maintains the association between a component and its gridbag constraints. The Keys in comptable are the components and the values are the instances of GridBagConstraints.
trans-unit.target: 此哈希表维护组件与其网格袋约束之间的关联。 comptable 中的键是组件，值是 GridBagConstraints 的实例。

trans-unit.source: This helper class provides a utility implementation of the java.beans.beancontext.BeanContext interface.
trans-unit.target: 这个帮助类提供了java.beans.beancontext.BeanContext接口的实用实现。

trans-unit.target: 这个助手类提供了java.beans.beancontext.BeanContextServices接口的实用实现。

trans-unit.source: This hint could control the choice of alpha blending calculations that sacrifice some precision to use fast lookup tables or lower precision SIMD instructions. This hint could also control whether or not the color and alpha values are converted into a linear color space during the calculations for a more linear visual effect at the expense of additional per-pixel calculations.
trans-unit.target: 这个提示可以控制alpha混合计算的选择,牺牲一些精度来使用快速查找表或较低精度的SIMD指令。该提示还可以控制在计算过程中是否将颜色和alpha值转换为线性颜色空间,以牺牲额外的每像素计算来获得更线性的视觉效果。

trans-unit.source: This idiom obviates the need for using a string to describe the preferences node and decreases the likelihood of a run-time failure. (If the class name is misspelled, it will typically result in a compile-time error.)
trans-unit.target: 这个成语避免了使用字符串来描述偏好节点的必要性,降低了运行时失败的可能性。如果类名拼写错误,通常会导致编译时错误)。

trans-unit.source: This implementation also restricts all non-exported packages of modules loaded by the platform class loader or its ancestors. A "non-exported package" refers to a package that is not exported to all modules. Specifically, it refers to a package that either is not exported at all by its containing module or is exported in a qualified fashion by its containing module.
trans-unit.target: 此实现还限制了平台类加载器或其祖先加载的所有未导出模块软件包。“未导出的程序包”是指未导出到所有模块的程序包。具体来说，它指的是一个软件包，要么根本不被其包含的模块导出，要么被其包含的模块以合格的方式导出。

trans-unit.source: This implementation calls a recursive helper method that locks this node, invokes flushSpi() on it, unlocks this node, and recursively invokes this method on each "cached child." A cached child is a child of this node that has been created in this VM and not subsequently removed. In effect, this method does a depth first traversal of the "cached subtree" rooted at this node, calling flushSpi() on each node in the subTree while only that node is locked. Note that flushSpi() is invoked top-down.
trans-unit.target: 本实施例调用一个递归的帮助方法,该方法锁定这个节点,在其上调用flushSpi(),解锁这个节点,并在每个 "缓存子节点 "上递归调用这个方法。缓存的子节点是指这个节点在这个虚拟机中被创建且随后没有被删除的子节点。实际上,这个方法对以这个节点为根的 "缓存子树 "进行深度第一遍遍的遍历,在子树中的每个节点上调用flushSpi(),而只有该节点被锁定。注意,flushSpi()是自上而下调用的。

trans-unit.source: This implementation calls a recursive helper method that locks this node, invokes syncSpi() on it, unlocks this node, and recursively invokes this method on each "cached child." A cached child is a child of this node that has been created in this VM and not subsequently removed. In effect, this method does a depth first traversal of the "cached subtree" rooted at this node, calling syncSpi() on each node in the subTree while only that node is locked. Note that syncSpi() is invoked top-down.
trans-unit.target: 本实施例调用一个递归的帮助方法,该方法锁定这个节点,在其上调用syncSpi(),解锁这个节点,并在每个 "缓存子节点 "上递归调用这个方法。缓存的子节点是指这个节点在这个虚拟机中被创建且随后没有被删除的子节点。实际上,这个方法对以这个节点为根的 "缓存子树 "进行深度第一遍遍历,在子树中的每个节点上调用syncSpi(),而只有该节点被锁定。注意,syncSpi()是自上而下调用的。

trans-unit.source: This implementation can be made to throw runtime exceptions in the face of concurrent modification, as described in the specification for the (protected) modCount field.

trans-unit.source: This implementation can be made to throw runtime exceptions in the face of concurrent modification, as described in the specification for the (protected) modCount field.

trans-unit.source: This implementation checks that the key and value are legal, obtains this preference node's lock, checks that the node has not been removed, invokes putSpi(String,String), and if there are any preference change listeners, enqueues a notification event for processing by the event dispatch thread.
trans-unit.target: 此实现检查键和值是否合法，获取此首选项节点的锁，检查该节点是否尚未删除，调用 putSpi(String,String) ，如果有任何首选项更改侦听器，则将一个通知事件排队以供处理事件调度线程。

trans-unit.source: This implementation checks that the key and value are legal, obtains this preference node's lock, checks that the node has not been removed, invokes putSpi(String,String), and if there are any preference change listeners, enqueues a notification event for processing by the event dispatch thread.
trans-unit.target: 此实现检查键和值是否合法，获取此首选项节点的锁，检查该节点是否尚未删除，调用 putSpi(String,String) ，如果有任何首选项更改侦听器，则排队通知事件以供处理事件调度线程。

trans-unit.source: This implementation checks to see that this node is the root; if so, it throws an appropriate exception. Then, it locks this node's parent, and calls a recursive helper method that traverses the subtree rooted at this node. The recursive method locks the node on which it was called, checks that it has not already been removed, and then ensures that all of its children are cached: The childrenNamesSpi() method is invoked and each returned child name is checked for containment in the child-cache. If a child is not already cached, the childSpi(String) method is invoked to create a Preferences instance for it, and this instance is put into the child-cache. Then the helper method calls itself recursively on each node contained in its child-cache. Next, it invokes removeNodeSpi(), marks itself as removed, and removes itself from its parent's child-cache. Finally, if there are any node change listeners, it enqueues a notification event for processing by the event dispatch thread.
trans-unit.target: 此实现检查以确认该节点是根节点；如果是这样，它将引发适当的异常。然后，它锁定该节点的父节点，并调用一个遍历此节点的子树的递归帮助器方法。递归方法锁定在其上被调用的节点，检查是否尚未删除它，然后确保其所有子代都被缓存：调用 childrenNamesSpi() 方法，并检查每个返回的子代名称是否包含在其中。子缓存。如果尚未缓存子级， childSpi(String) 调用childSpi（String）方法为其创建一个 Preferences 实例，并将此实例放入子级缓存中。然后，helper方法在其子缓存中包含的每个节点上递归调用自身。接下来，它调用 removeNodeSpi() ，将自身标记为已删除，并将其从其父级的子缓存中删除。最后，如果有任何节点更改侦听器，它将排队一个通知事件，以供事件分发线程进行处理。

trans-unit.source: This implementation checks to see that this node is the root; if so, it throws an appropriate exception. Then, it locks this node's parent, and calls a recursive helper method that traverses the subtree rooted at this node. The recursive method locks the node on which it was called, checks that it has not already been removed, and then ensures that all of its children are cached: The childrenNamesSpi() method is invoked and each returned child name is checked for containment in the child-cache. If a child is not already cached, the childSpi(String) method is invoked to create a Preferences instance for it, and this instance is put into the child-cache. Then the helper method calls itself recursively on each node contained in its child-cache. Next, it invokes removeNodeSpi(), marks itself as removed, and removes itself from its parent's child-cache. Finally, if there are any node change listeners, it enqueues a notification event for processing by the event dispatch thread.
trans-unit.target: 此实现检查以确保该节点是根节点；如果是这样，它将引发适当的异常。然后，它锁定该节点的父节点，并调用一个遍历此节点的子树的递归帮助器方法。递归方法锁定在其上被调用的节点，检查是否尚未将其删除，然后确保对其所有子级进行缓存：调用 childrenNamesSpi() 方法，并检查每个返回的子名称是否包含在其中。子缓存。如果尚未缓存子级， childSpi(String) 调用childSpi（String）方法为其创建一个 Preferences 实例，然后将该实例放入子级缓存中。然后，helper方法在其子缓存中包含的每个节点上递归调用自身。接下来，它调用 removeNodeSpi() ，将自身标记为已删除，并将其从其父级的子缓存中删除。最后，如果有任何节点更改侦听器，它将排队一个通知事件，以供事件分发线程进行处理。

trans-unit.source: This implementation compares the path of its URI to the given simple name. This method returns true if the given kind is equal to the kind of this object, and if the path is equal to simpleName + kind.extension or if it ends with "/" + simpleName + kind.extension.

trans-unit.source: This implementation determines which is the smaller of this set and the specified collection, by invoking the size method on each. If this set has fewer elements, then the implementation iterates over this set, checking each element returned by the iterator in turn to see if it is contained in the specified collection. If it is so contained, it is removed from this set with the iterator's remove method. If the specified collection has fewer elements, then the implementation iterates over the specified collection, removing from this set each element returned by the iterator, using this set's remove method.
trans-unit.target: 此实现通过在每个集合上调用 size 方法来确定哪个是该集合和指定集合中的较小者。如果此集合具有较少的元素，则实现将对此集合进行迭代，依次检查迭代器返回的每个元素，以查看其是否包含在指定的集合中。如果包含此类内容，则使用迭代器的 remove 方法将其从此集中删除。如果指定的集合具有较少的元素，则实现将迭代指定的集合，并使用此集合的 remove 方法从此集合中删除迭代器返回的每个元素。

trans-unit.source: This implementation employs an efficient non-blocking algorithm based on one described in Simple, Fast, and Practical Non-Blocking and Blocking Concurrent Queue Algorithms by Maged M. Michael and Michael L. Scott.
trans-unit.target: 此实现采用一种有效的非阻塞算法，该算法基于Maged M. Michael和Michael L. Scott的“ 简单，快速和实用的非阻塞和阻塞并发队列算法”中描述的算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation enforces a more restrictive OID syntax than defined in RFC 1779 and 2253. It uses the more correct syntax defined in RFC 4512, which specifies that OIDs contain at least 2 digits:
trans-unit.target: 此实现强制实施比RFC 1779和2253中定义的更为严格的OID语法。它使用RFC 4512中定义的更正确的语法，该语法指定OID至少包含2位数字：

trans-unit.source: This implementation executes waitFor() in a separate thread repeatedly until it returns successfully. If the execution of waitFor is interrupted, the thread's interrupt status is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现在单独的线程中重复执行 waitFor() ，直到成功返回为止。如果 waitFor 的执行被中断，则线程的中断状态将保留。

trans-unit.source: This implementation expects two sources of asynchronous notification. The timer thread fires asynchronously, and causes the caret to simply repaint the most recent bounding box. The caret also tracks change as the document is modified. Typically this will happen on the event dispatch thread as a result of some mouse or keyboard event. The caret behavior on both synchronous and asynchronous documents updates is controlled by UpdatePolicy property. The repaint of the new caret location will occur on the event thread in any case, as calls to modelToView are only safe on the event thread.
trans-unit.target: 此实现需要两个异步通知源。计时器线程异步触发，并导致插入符号仅重新绘制最近的边界框。插入符号还跟踪文档被修改时的更改。通常，由于某些鼠标或键盘事件，这将在事件分发线程上发生。同步和异步文档更新上的插入符行为均由 UpdatePolicy 属性控制。在任何情况下，新插入符位置的重绘都将在事件线程上发生，因为对 modelToView 的调用仅在事件线程上是安全的。

trans-unit.source: This implementation extracts the number's value using Number.longValue() for all integral type values that can be converted to long without loss of information, including BigInteger values with a bit length of less than 64, and Number.doubleValue() for all other types. It then calls format(long,java.lang.StringBuffer,java.text.FieldPosition) or format(double,java.lang.StringBuffer,java.text.FieldPosition). This may result in loss of magnitude information and precision for BigInteger and BigDecimal values.
trans-unit.target: 此实现使用 Number.longValue() 提取可转换为 long 且不损失信息的所有整数类型值的数字值，包括 bit length 小于64的 BigInteger 值，以及所有其他类型的 Number.doubleValue() 。然后 format(long,java.lang.StringBuffer,java.text.FieldPosition) 它调用format（long，java.lang.StringBuffer，java.text.FieldPosition）或 format(double,java.lang.StringBuffer,java.text.FieldPosition) 。这可能会导致丢失量值信息以及 BigInteger 和 BigDecimal 值的精度。
